synopsis: She does not realise she is crying until Vernon presses an open bottle into her hand for Harry while he settles himself down on another chair with Dudley and the letter. "What are we going to do, Vernon?" "We're going to raise is a wizard is what, Pet. But first of all, I think we best get our hands on a second cot and get some of Dudleys' clothes back out of the loft. "

synopsis: When Sirius Black escapes from Azkaban, the first place the Aurors look for him is on the other side of the Atlantic where his daughter and her godfather are trying to get on with their lives. author: reviews

author: reviews

What does he have to do? only deage himself back to 16 and start his sixth year over again as a gryffindor to figure out whats going on with Harry. He accepts, but he doesnt expect his entire life to change along the way.

synopsis: When she was 12 years old, at her third Malfoy soiree, Astoria Greengrass had slipped into an upstairs drawing room, caught Draco Malfoy's eye, and realized, very quickly, that she was in grave danger of falling in love with him. "Through chaos as it swirls, it's us against the world." - Us Against the World, Coldplay
title: Us Against the World

synopsis: The last person that Hermione Granger expected to see at a muggle club was Draco Malfoy. "Sometimes you've just gotta make it for yourself. Sometimes honey, it just takes someone else." - Hellhole Ratrace, Girls

synopsis: Sirius Black doesn't want his godson to suffer the same fate - losing the woman you loved to someone else because of stupidity and blindness. So, he pulls a prank on Harry to let him see the one witch who's always been there for him since he was five in a different light. As they say, absence makes the heart grow fonder. AU Story.

(Oneshot, rated M for mild smut)

Jamais entendu parler.

Il regardait les visages mornes et austères, désemparés face à la journée qui s'annonçait. Et il regardait la femme en rouge. Il ne connaissait ni son prénom ni où elle allait. Mais elle suffisait à faire de sa journée quelque chose de plus gai.

synopsis: None of Remus Lupin's clothes are particularly noteworthy or fashionable, not when compared with Sirius Black and his heeled boots or James Potter and his Quidditch jersey or Peter Pettigrew and his colourful shoes, but he doesn't much care because his red jumper is comfortable. In which Remus searches for his jumper but we all know where it is. Remus/Sirius.

synopsis: Little thing I thought of. This is a version of What Is This Feeling, from Wicked. The rest is explained in the note before the song starts.

But it's done now, so why not publish it?

Being suspended from her job as a Healer was one step, but when family secrets come out it may push her over the edge. Draco/OC

synopsis: Harry and Ron, on stakeout as Aurors, encounter a strange Muggle event.

title: Promises

author: reviews
synopsis: It will take Regulus many years to forgive his brother for turning his back on their family and the Divine Plan, and even longer to understand how Sirius could change so. Demon!AU. Oneshot.
title: These Wings Will Not Be Sheared

author: idon'tedit
characters: [OC, Cedric D.] Harry P., Severus S.
synopsis: Harry had a twin, her name was Bianca Potter. They adventured before in the original Chosen, and this is a what-if type adventure with plot points changed to explore what could have happened. The biggest change from the get go, is both of them being raised together at the Dursley's. AU. Darkfic. adventure/angst/romance/cedric-lives
title: Chosen: Redux

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: Harry, Ron, and Hermione share an evening at the Burrow. A special night where they can feel free of homework and Voldemort and just have fun being normal teenage kids.
title: It Felt Good To Be Kids Once In A While

author: RedPandaPrincess
synopsis: The year is 1989. Severus Snape has been Potions Master for 8 years after the Dark Lord killed Lily and James Potter. Our story follows a Slytherin student, Winifred Gray. She's a talented potioneer and Snape soon takes her under his wing as an apprentice. When a student disappears, it looks like Freddie is in trouble and Snape may be the only one who can help her...
title: Whisper

author: AyyurGoupil
synopsis: Septembre 1991. Rentrée des classes. Mais pas dans n'importe quelle école. Tout commence dans un wagon, en direction d'un chateau aussi mystérieux que fascinant. Tout commence avec des rencontres. Atheris Rosier, tout comme son père avant elle, franchit les portes de Poudlard. Son sang pulse dans ses veines. C'est ici que tout commence. ... (résumé complet sur Wattpad !)
title: Les Épines de la réalité

author: reviews
synopsis: It had started as an accident , then as a joke, then as friends, then as more than friends. But it was a rule, when one of them told the other that their world was ending then the other has to come over, right ? Right.
title: IF THE WORLD WAS ENDING YOU'D COME OVER, RIGHT ?

author: Lire.Cest.Refuser.De.Mourire
synopsis: Lorsque Lily et James Potter perdent tragiquement la vie, en cette triste nuit d'Halloween, ils ne laissent pas seulement le petit Harry orphelin, mais trois petits enfants condamnés à vivre sans leurs parents. •L'univers de Harry Potter appartient à JK Rowling.•
title: Liés par le sang, par le cœur et par la magie

author: PlumedeSorbier
synopsis: C'était un soir comme tous les autres, les Maraudeurs s'étaient réunis à la maison de James et Lily Potter pour discuter entre eux et pour profiter de voir le petit Harry âgé de seulement quatre mois. Remus se retrouve dehors en compagnie de Sirius, le jeune loup-garou est pensif à propos de ce dernier. Au point d'avoir le coeur brisé.
title: Un soir comme tant d'autres

author: reviews
synopsis: The gifts that Harry received from the Dursleys - whenever he did get any - was nothing short of an insult and truly symbolized how much worth he had in their household.
title: The Worth of a Family

author: GrayStone5
synopsis: A normal, slightly nerdy boy loved to read the Harry Potter book series and adore the movies. He loved almost everything about magic in general and absolutely loved to the Harry Potter magical. The boy has always dreamed of one day going to Hogwarts. And so his wish was heard, therefore a higher entity granted him a chance to live in the world he has always fantasized about.
title: Reincarnated as Theodore Nott: The Gamer

author: reviews
synopsis: Astoria Greengrass is running late to meet her Daphne in the Great Hall. But what happens when she encounters a young girl out sunbathing by the Black Lake? Will she have run into love?
title: Ran Into Love

author: yoxo
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M., Neville L.
synopsis: Ellos eran tan brillantes que la luz que desprendían lastimaba, era por eso que había decidido permanecer en las comodidades que ofrecía la oscuridad, después de todo las estrellas brillan mejor en una noche oscura.
title: Luz En Oscuridad

author: EvilDime
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Peter P.
synopsis: Harry trifft vor seinem ersten Schuljahr nicht auf die Weasleys und findet nicht zum Gleis. Nachdem er allein in London ausgeraubt und verprügelt wurde, flüchtet er als Ratte in die Kanalisation. Ein Jahr später trifft er auf Krätze und die Ratten freunden sich mit einander an...
title: Ratten

author: nestie
characters: Angelina J., Blaise Z., Marcus F., Padma P.
synopsis: Short stories. Forgotten characters and rare pairings. Blaise must clear his name. Angelina has a choice to postpone. Pansy knows how to read the room, she just chooses not to. Flint's gone soft. Dean goes for the truth. Padma doesn't.
title: The forbidden ones

author: HecateA
characters: Fleur D., Bill W., Victoire W.
synopsis: The year since the Battle of Hogwarts has been hell for Bill and Fleur, who are left clinging to each other and desperate for a win. Never, however, would they have imagined it coming from here. Changeling!AU
title: The Sea Gives Us What We Need

author: reviews
characters: Severus S., Albus D., Minerva M., Charity B.
synopsis: Tom piąty. Uczniowie wyjeżdżają na przerwę świąteczną, a niektórzy nauczyciele... mają serdecznie dosyć Umbridge.
title: I nie waż się wychodzić bez czapki, czyli historia przedświąteczna

author: luckei1
synopsis: Sometimes the way into someone's heart is the longest way. Written for "Hermione Big Bang" in 2009.
title: Ways and Means

author: 3butterbeersplease
synopsis: Olivia (Liv) Audrey (OC) returns to Hogwarts to be Harry Potter's secret bodyguard again as he competes in the Tri-Wizard Tournament. Meanwhile, Remus Lupin helps Sirius Black sneak back into the country to be closer to his godson. (OCXRL). Sequel to The Bodyguard (read that one first).
title: The Bodyguard 2

author: reviews
synopsis: Sirius et Severus doivent effectuer des travaux d'intérêts généraux pour payer leur dette à la société. Ils deviennent alors, sur demande du Ministère, des experts luttant contre les forces du Mal pour aider les sorciers et les moldus. Entre engueulades, situations rocambolesques et grand danger, ils vont devoir se supporter au quotidien pour espérer un avenir meilleur.
title: BLACK & ROGUE : Experts contre les forces du Mal

author: Ravenschildmoon
characters: Draco M., Ginny W., Albus S. P., Scorpius M.
synopsis: A missing scene from 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child' when Scorpius and Albus are retrieved from the lake after the Dark World
title: Dodo, l'enfant do

author: Ultimatedaywriter
synopsis: Harry finds a book that he likes and emulates it. As it happens the book was more cultivation for dummies and less novel. Unfortunately, the mortal and wizarding world isn't ready for a Immortal. Get ready for lots of accidental deaths. Accidental Harem, lemons, and Eldritch horrors. MA
title: Darkest of Edge

author: Swooping Evil
synopsis: A story following the life of Minerva McGonagall after the First Wizarding War until the end of the Second Wizarding War. New chapters come out every Friday.
title: Minerva

author: Ms. Loony Lovegood
synopsis: "Eits, mau ke mana? Tidakkah kau merindukan bibirku, Granger?" Draco Malfoy menyeringai dan Hermione bersumpah ia ingin sekali menghapus seringai menjengkelkan itu dengan sebuah tonjokan. Lagi./"Oh, shut up, Malfoy!"/OS, sequel of 'Damn You, Granger'/RnR?
title: Shut Up, Malfoy!

author: reviews
synopsis: Mr and Mrs Dursley, of number 4, Privet Drive, were proud to say that they were perfectly normal, thank you very...oh, wrong Dursleys. In the years after the War, 4 Privet Drive becomes home to a whole new family of Dursleys: Mr Dudley Dursley, Mrs Amanda Dursley, and their three children, Dudley Junior, Dudley the Second, and Dudlina. And if one of them happens to be magic...well.
title: The Magical Dudlina Dursley

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Ginny W., Luna L.
synopsis: Ficmas 2019 - Day 2
title: Mistletoe

author: reviews
synopsis: Fabian remembers Amelia and her family.
title: He remembers

author: reviews
characters: Ron W., Molly W., Gideon P., Fabian P.
synopsis: Ron wrote Molly a letter to tell her about Harry's awful relatives and lack of Christmas expectations. What was her thoughts upon seeing that letter, and how did it remind her of her own brothers? Written for the IWSC PR4
title: If You Find Some Comfort In It

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco finds out the unthinkable has taken place at Hogwarts. This stranger is not welcome here and Draco will have him removed as soon as he can owl his father.
title: Life's Surprises

author: reviews
synopsis: Slytherins can't get into the Gryffindor common room, so Draco comes up with another way to get Hermione's attention. (Or: "Say Anything" but with snowballs because wizards don't have boomboxes.)
title: (Snow)Balls to the Wall

author: MinnieMey
characters: Ron W., Hermione G., Theodore N., Daphne G.
synopsis: Ron et Hermione font un pari après une énième dispute. Elle qui n'a aucun sex-appeal, selon les dires du rouquin, saura-t-elle draguer le garçon le plus transparent de tout Poudlard ? Allez, pari tenu ! [Théomione]
title: Ce n'était qu'un pari

author: Ashmem
characters: [Ron W., Hermione G.] Harry P., Sirius B.
synopsis: In which a boy with a fated lightning bolt shaped scar has to carry the weight of the world on his shoulders whilst simultaneously dragging his problems along silently beside him. This summer has been made just a little harder, and with the still healing scars of the Tri-Wizard Tournament, Harry is not coping nor fending well in any sense.
title: Deeds of the Hallows

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., James P., Lily Evans P., Ginny W.
synopsis: This isn't the most conventional Christmas tradition, but Harry is pleased with the way his family has come together. Oneshot.
title: Another Year of Christmas Roses

author: reviews
synopsis: During the battle at the Ministry of Magic Harry was captured and he wasn't the only one. Seeing that the teen was used by the light and abused by his family Voldemort changes his plans. He also finds out that the teen is his horcrux. He puts his best followers as his guards. They fall for him.
title: For Us to Share
pairing: Harry P., Rodolphus L., Rabastan L.

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Tom R. Jr.] Ron W., Astoria G.
synopsis: Part of the 'Darling, Can I Call You Home' universe. / In which Tom tries out for the Slytherin Quidditch team during sixth-year specifically to impress Harry, and maybe develops a Quidditch kink in the aftermath. (COMPLETE.)
title: A Daring Escapade into the Realm of Quidditch

author: Allthestoriesaretrue666
synopsis: Set in sixth year, Draco receives a message from his father telling him to kill Dumbledore. However, Draco's secret is discovered. Lots of Drarry ;) Please review! This is my first fanfic, and I would like to make my future writing better. Thanks!
title: The Letter

author: reviews
synopsis: Severus Snape has no hope for humanity, least of all his own.
title: Snape

author: reviews
synopsis: Ron Weasel is really nasty to Hermione and she breaks up with him. Believing that she must be an Ice Queen as Ron said, she is shown her real nature by a mixture of ex-Death Eaters and Slytherins. Happy ending guaranteed for Hermione Granger and Thorfinn Rowle. No happy ending for the Weasel! (Rated Mature for adult language in parts and adult situations)
title: Slyther-ella
pairing: Hermione G., T. Rowle, Antonin D.

author: Sagisugerplumfairy
synopsis: We all know that Tom Riddle is evil but can he go beyond murder? What can possibly worse?
title: Shattered

author: reviews
synopsis: If you had asked her in her first year at Hogwarts, Hermione Granger would have said that Fred Weasley was simply the mischievous older brother of her best friend, Ron. After second year, he would quickly become the most important person in her life. Follow the unlikely pair through their time at Hogwarts and beyond in a tale fraught with tragedy, tears, treachery, and romance.
title: Don't Threaten Me With a Good Time

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Luna L.
synopsis: Harry gets engaged to Luna. Hermione is happy for them, but Ron feels paranoid that Harry's having a more successful life than he is. Despite being with Hermione, Ron's still not married and he's mad that Harry's getting married before he is.
title: Harry Potter's Wedding

author: reviews
synopsis: Una tensa conversación en la sala común de Hufflepuff, en la Navidad de 1998. "Este fic participa en el minirreto de diciembre para La Copa de las Casas 2019/20 del foro La Noble y Ancestral Casa de los Black".
title: De consecuencias y cambios

author: Pottershop
synopsis: Harry se casó con el amor de su vida; tiene una vida plena y feliz. Cuatro años después Ginny aparece con una noticia inesperada que pone en riesgo su matrimonio. (HINNY. y Luna&Neville)
title: Volver a verte

author: AnotherAldebaran
synopsis: The war is won, but at what cost? Hermione is given a choice to put things to right, at the cost of her whole life, or to let it be. Will Severus do the right thing, this time around? Long fic planned, WIP. Updates will be irregular but 60k words written so far.
title: Turning Time

author: reviews
synopsis: Muggle!AU, Cops and Robbers!AU. Marlene McKinnon, has been wrongly accused of bank fraud. The perpetrator was her ex-boyfriend Sirius Black. But when a certain local sheriff finds Marlene at the grocery store will she find love? How will this couple be able to be together, and will they get caught? Will Marlene find love with the sheriff, or heartbreak?
title: Jailbird Love

author: reviews
synopsis: A short Bellamione one-shot: Two witches find themselves sitting in a solicitor's office. In front from them lies waiting to be signed the document which will end their marriage. What happens in that very moment?
title: Divorce

author: the stargate time traveller
synopsis: "The House is like your family." The most basic rule at Hogwarts. Only for Harry Potter, there's a definition of family which is the complete opposite of what many define the word as. A series of one-shots as Harry goes through his years, and becomes increasingly cynical about the magical world, Hogwarts, and family in general.
title: The House is like your Family

author: Angel Nat-Chan
synopsis: Harry needs help to make a decision and casts a spell with interesting results... SLASH RATED MATURE
title: Duo Consilium

author: Palkey
synopsis: Harry has a family who love him and he loves them, but when he gets sorted into Slytherin house things get a bit difficult. Surrounded by enemies Harry must be careful not to lose track of what's important. AU SlytherinHarry HPDG
title: The Dark Path

author: Liz Jean Tonks
synopsis: Abraxas allowed Lucius to stay with the Blacks over the summer. However, seeing his son's grades he changes his mind... /One-Shot
title: Punishment outranks Promise

author: CallistoPen
synopsis: Harry Potter commits suicide in that clearing in the Forbidden Forest, ready to meet his family in the Beyond. Instead he gets saddled with Death on a ride in the past during World War II and the horrors of the Grindelwald Era. Time Travel. HP/TR Slash. Tragedy. Death.
title: Stormy Heart

author: Hauru Keiko
synopsis: Drago Malfoy et Harry Potter, ces deux meilleurs ennemis qui vont se chercher se combattre dans un duel mais la fin deviendra surprenante. Peut-être que dans la profondeur de leurs relation on trouvera quelque chose de peut-être plus charnel
title: Le serpent et le griffon

author: reviews
synopsis: Après la guerre tout ne tient qu'à un fil, Harry quitte le monde sorcier et commence une véritable vie dans le monde moldu. Cependant quand il se rend dans son club préféré avec comme objectif y rencontrer son nouveau soumis il est plus que surprit quand il se rend compte de qui il s'agit. Mais il n'est vraiment pas au bout de ses surprises, rien ne s'arrêtera en si bon chemin.
title: Ainsi va la vie

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Draco M.] [Ron W., Hermione G.]
synopsis: Ron Weasley has been watching his best friend over the years, hoping for him to find his happiness. He just never expected him to find it with Draco Malfoy. He planned to wait and see, until something happened to Harry and there was no more time to wait. Part of the series That's Life Together. Takes place August, 2004.
title: Ron's Adjudication

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Peter P.
synopsis: When the Full Moon falls on Christmas Eve, the Marauders decide to stay at school with Remus over the break. James only wishes that there was something more they could do for him. Oneshot, Christmas gift for a friend.
title: Until It's Christmas For Us All

author: wandererwoul
characters: Hermione G., James P., Bill W., Victoire W.
synopsis: One-shots y relatos sobre todas las generaciones de la saga de Harry Potter.
title: La historia que nunca termina

author: XxTomarry-FiFtEeNxX OFFICIAL
characters: [Harry P., Tom R. Jr., Lucius M., Draco M.]
synopsis: “Nope. Sorry. I can’t go to hell. Satan has a restraining order agaisnt me since the last time I showed up.” Insane!Intelligent!Harry and Hermione. Dom!Harry/Sub!Male!Harem, OCs and OOCness. Creature!Harry,Voldemort,Lucius,Draco,OC
title: ArE YoU iNsAnE lIkE mE?
pairing: Harry P., Tom R. Jr., Lucius M., Draco M.

author: Maurader101
characters: [Harry P., Ginny W.] [Ron W., Hermione G.]
synopsis: **Please READ & REVIEW your Opinions are desired and respected!** Set in Harry's 6th year at Hogwarts. Surprises and an unknown power all to be unveiled. The unknown leaves Harry dazed and confused. money, home, family, friends, and love all swirl around Harry. and the threat of the Lord Voldemort. *THIS STORY IS COMPLETE -Sequel STARTED * EDITED IN THE SPIRIT OF BRITISH ENGLISH*
title: Harry Potter and the Unknown Power

author: reviews
synopsis: Apprendre qu'Hermione était une sorcière les avait secoués. Pour autant, elle resterait à jamais la même pour eux : leur fille chérie.
title: Telle que tu es (par Marina Ka-Fai)

author: reviews
synopsis: No, Harry se consideraba una persona madura y racional, pero es que simplemente esa situación lo sobrepasaba, pues ¡¿Cómo convivir bajo el mismo techo con la horrenda mascota de tu novio la cual te odia! Sí, definitivamente estaba dispuesto a aprender a cocinar conejo asado si ese animal seguía intentado acaparar toda la atención de Draco. ¡Que era su novio, joder!
title: Convivencia y celos

author: Conspicuous Euphoria
characters: James P., Lily Evans P., Sirius B.
synopsis: A short story describing Sirius Black's feelings when he had watched James Potter having an intimate moment with himself.
title: Naked Feelings

author: reviews
synopsis: [...]Harry never remembered that. But he figured that it didn't matter. After all, Speech is Silver, but Silence is Golden.
title: Silence is Golden

author: tweety-src-clt9
synopsis: Hermione's bitchy cousins want Harry Potter. So, as a courtesy, they challenge her to change her status as Harry's best friend to his lover before the year ends. If not, she has to help her cousins score a date with him. Whoever said that it was just blokes who make bets about women they fancy? Will Hermione be the Queen of the Yule Season or will she lose again?
title: Queen of the Yule Season

author: NahoBell
synopsis: Tras el inevitable rompimiento entre Draco Malfoy y Hermione Granger, el primero traza un elaborado plan para recuperarla...todo con ayuda de sus amigos. Sin embargo, lo que menos se espera es que, sus ahora aliados, pronto se conviertan en sus rivales.
title: The Conquest

author: Ashmem
characters: [Ron W., Hermione G.] Sirius B., Remus L.
synopsis: During the summer after the Triwizard Tournament, Albus Dumbledore brings news of a mysterious volume appearing in the Department of Mysteries. Within its pages, many of Hogwarts students' names pop up countless times. Follow the residents of Number Twelve Grimmauld Place as they uncover the mystery that is soon to be known as the past, present, and future.
title: Missing Moments: Harry Potter Edition

author: Dawn1000
synopsis: The one Narcissa loves and the one she married are two very different people. She can't help but compare them as she questions whether or not she made the right choice.
title: ille non est eius (he is not her)

author: lilysmoonstorm
synopsis: A series of one-shots that accompany The Moonlit Series. These stories are designed to be supplemental pieces to go along with the series [[please check out the series or else none of these will make ANY sense]]
title: The Moonlit Series - One Shots

author: reviews
synopsis: There is a correlation between Tom's Horcruxes and the Seven Deadly Sins.
title: Seven Sins

author: reviews
synopsis: With Neville's parents dead, and a defeated Lord Voldemort, Neville's first year at Hogwarts is strangely exciting. With his own story to tell, and a mysterious attacker roaming, Neville will have to get through first year in one piece.
title: Strange Things

author: WolfgangNH
characters: [Harry P., Hermione G.] [Remus L., N. Tonks]
synopsis: Harry and Hermione have returned to their homes after freeing Sirius and facing the terrors of werewolves and dementors. They are are still suffering the effects of that night then events change their lives going into Fourth Year at Hogwarts. Wolf calls and black marks start to haunt England, and those in the protected walls of Hogwarts. This is a M rated story.
title: Night of the Wolf

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco's curiosity is piqued when Hermione struggles to describe the smell of the amortentia potion. But when she finally manages to do so at the end of class, Draco makes it his personal mission to find the source of the scent, learning a few surprising things in the process. / Takes place during their sixth year. / Sequel to "Homework Help"
title: A Custom-Ordered Amortentia

author: The Humpl
synopsis: Hermione Granger is a brilliant witch. Too brilliant for her own good. A project gone international puts her in the sights of many dangerous folk.
title: The Mistake That Was

author: reviews
synopsis: Okay, he's not Father Christmas, but he did have a very good reason for breaking into the house.
title: Harry, Baby, Hurry Through the Window Tonight

author: Captain Voxland
synopsis: A Les Misérables AU: Sirius is freed from prison but his heart is stone until he meets a young girl and his life changes after he takes care of her. (I don't own Les Misérables or any of the lyrics. If I did I wound not suck at writing storys lol) Also sorry if I mess anything up with the story of Les Mis
title: Les Dogfather

author: reviews
synopsis: Just a little nonsense starring the Marauders attending the Muggle Studies class.
title: It's Remus' fault!

author: Lady Maria Stark
synopsis: Esta es una historia sobre Rose Weasley y Scorpius Malfoy sin lo peor del Scorose y con lo mejor del Scorose. Amor, locura y sexo, amigas.
title: Todas las razones por las que Rose Weasley odia a Scorpius Malfoy

author: HermesDay
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P.
synopsis: On Halloween night, James makes a decision which will change everything. With his life tumbling down around him, James struggles to keep his friends and family safe while at the same time facing impossible questions. Who can he trust if he can't trust his friends? How can he be there for Harry when he feels that somehow he shouldn't be? And why can't he cast a patronus?
title: Little Things

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Tom R. Jr.] Ron W.
synopsis: Sequel to 'Sugar, It's Cold Outside'. / In which Ron is totally alright with Harry and Tom dating, he just thinks that it's a little… weird. When Harry takes his worries home with him, Tom gives Harry's self-esteem a much needed boost. (COMPLETE.)
title: Sugar, Don't Hold Out

author: camarata
synopsis: War, even in brewing times, can leave scars among those unlucky to become crossed in its path. Behind Anais's little eyes, the rising of the Second Wizarding War has left her a shell of the happy girl she once was as it has ripped her of her dearly departed family. The world is unsafe for her, for who knows why, but Hogwarts, surely, can protect this little survivor. (From PoA on)
title: The Littlest Survivors

author: lizze213
synopsis: Hermione Granger lleva tres años desaparecida y a esas alturas solo existe una persona en el mundo mágico capaz de encontrarla. Draco Malfoy recibe la misión de encontrarla en el Londres muggle y traerla de nuevo al mundo mágico. La pregunta es, ¿conseguirá un antiguo mortífago convencer a Hermione de que en realidad es una bruja?
title: Regreso a la magia

author: reviews
synopsis: Padma Patil was feeling pretty down when her boyfriend of three years Terry Boot broke up with her. But when someone unexpected sits down next her will her heart begin to heal? Will Hannah Abbott be everything she wants and needs, or is Padma's heart destined to break again?
title: Everything She Wanted

author: Woodrow Graham Kenobi-Rimmer
characters: Hermione G., Draco M., Ginny W., Luna L.
synopsis: The Trio are back for their 8th year to catch up after the events of the war. An alternate take on what happens after the end of the last book, disregarding the epilogue and Cursed Child, mostly. If you are looking for Harry/Ginny or Hermione/Ron happy, don't read. Fairly fluffy and over the top. Multi-pairing. Possible OOCness. Some strong language, sexual references, dark themes.
title: Legend of 3 to 5

author: reviews
characters: [Sirius B., Remus L.] [James P., Regulus B.]
synopsis: Guardian Angels are discouraged from getting attached to their charges, and falling in love is strictly forbidden. But Remus can't help but fall for Sirius - quite literally in fact. Omegaverse. Off-screen Mpreg. For Elizabeth.
title: Falling For You (Again and Again)

author: uindaseivra
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: Hoy hace diez años de aquel día. Diez años. Diez años y sigo esperando a que el tiempo cumpla su promesa y cure mis heridas. No lo ha hecho; no me ha devuelto la paz. Tampoco a mis amigos. No. El tiempo me lo ha arrancado todo.
title: Vida y Mentiras de Sirius Black

author: 20Iolaire02
synopsis: Harry Potter is the Master of Death, with all that the title entails. After his death at Voldemort's hand, he became the ferryman for souls - in the moments before a soul's death, he is deposited into their body to experience their death, and to help them move on.
title: I've had Ninety-Nine Lives (But I've Only Lived Once)

author: reviews
characters: James P., Rowena R., Ignotus P., Henry P.
synopsis: History is written by the victors, but even victors lie. The story of House Potter over the centuries.
title: Journals Through the Ages

author: reviews
characters: [Lily Evans P., James P.] Harry P.
synopsis: The Love Actually/We Are Here crossover/continuation you probably don't need but I'm giving to you anyway. Thank you a million to the Tumblr anon who asked for a continuation of this little story.
title: Arrivals Gate at Heathrow Airport

author: Glorioux
synopsis: Draco's nature emerges after his family's murder, when Hermione also lost her husband and her daughter Rose, Scorpio's fiancée. Draco facing his wife's betrayal, reconnects with Hermione, who is more than a witch. While trying to solve the murder, old feelings return, and secrets are revealed. It seems all might not be lost. Will Draco have the one he always wanted?
title: Hope after the storm

author: reviews
synopsis: AU What would it be like being the mother of the boy lived? Mothers are mean to each other whether they are muggle or witch and it's not easy for Lily Potter when her husband's an Auror and her son floats during nap time.
title: Mother of the Boy Who Lived

author: reviews
synopsis: Charlie is tired of spending his nights alone, so he pays for some company. Smut, MuggleAU, BrothelAU- For Sophie. Hope you love this birthday fic as much as I loved writing it.
title: Lost Love

author: occupationfangirling
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P.
synopsis: Select five times from Sirius and Harper's complicated relationship from friends to lovers.
title: Five Times

author: reviews
synopsis: It's Christmas time and the Weasly sweaters are impatiently waiting for the new member to arrive! What will happen when the newcomer won't be as they expect them to be?
title: The Christmas sweaters

author: reviews
synopsis: It's Hermione's first Christmas living at Malfoy Manor, and she's determined to do things the muggle way - whether Draco likes it or not. Fluffy Dramione Festive One-Shot.
title: Christmas the Muggle Way

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry Potter finds out what can happen when you get out of bed early enough in the morning. Please review, every comment helps.
title: Early Riser

author: reviews
synopsis: Seamus s'embrasait et Théodore se consumait. Ensemble, ils partaient en fumée. Courts chapitres. (TN x SF)
title: Les Agonies

author: reviews
synopsis: Bonjour, Recherche d'une fiction concernant Harry et Severus dont j'ai perdue le titre et que j'ai adorée. Je me souviens que Harry est né avec un jumeau mais qu'il a été en quelque sorte rejetté par la famille Potter au profit du dit jumeau, il se retrouve a travaillé sans le savoir avec la mère de Severus, Eileen, il devient le plus jeune maître des potions et il est un Peverell.
title: Recherche d'histoire

author: littleornaments
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: She felt fabric sag over her ears, stinking of decades worth of anxious sweat. She never thought it would be placed on her head a second time, much less that she'd stride towards the Ravenclaw table afterwards. If anyone could have fun repairing Hogwarts' library, it was Hermione Granger, and it didn't involve Malfoy's feline nose hanging about every night. DM/HG. Post-war.
title: Encyclopedia of Solace

author: reviews
synopsis: Nine year old Sirius Black cannot understand why the rest of his family seems to dread their annual summer holiday to his grandfather's Suffolk country estate. To him, a visit to Noire House during the dog days of summer is the highlight of the year. But when Sirius's idea for the perfect holiday souvenir goes awry, the consequences of his actions are chaotic and unexpected ...
title: The Dog Days of Summer

author: Conspicuous Euphoria
synopsis: A short Drabble describing Sirius' feelings for James and how said feelings shaped Sirius Black's life.
title: Friend or More?

author: JulienHP07
synopsis: Si Sirius avait pris une multitude de décisions différentes la nuit où il était arrivé à Godric's Hollow. Avec Sirius qui se concentre sur Harry plutôt que sur la vengeance, un Garçon-Qui-A-Survécu très différent qui va faire son retour dans le monde sorcier à l'âge de 13 ans. Mais la question est, pourquoi Harry est-il revenu si tard? Et sera-t-il le héros du monde sorcier?
title: Harry Black - Livre I: Le retour du Héros

author: reviews
synopsis: A snowy evening in the Snape household, Love Actually and Hot Chocolate, what could be better? A giftfic for Rule23. Drabble
title: Love in Actuality

author: reviews
synopsis: In which Regulus Black breaks all the rules but it is always Marlene McKinnon's fault—until it isn't.
title: Shadows Within Shadows

author: reviews
synopsis: Won't we be quite the pair?—you with your bad heart, me with my bad head. Together, though, we might have something worthwhile.- Zelda Fitzgerald / Summary will come later
title: Serpentine

author: talesofus
synopsis: As he was drowning, the water threatening to choke his lungs, he saw Hermione's face. And at the moment – Draco Malfoy desperately wished he could be Hermione Granger.
title: Love is Funny

author: Lomonaaeren
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Fleamont P.
synopsis: AU. Sequel to "Fruit of the Golden Tree." Fleamont remains committed to the protection of his grandson Harry Potter as Harry turns seven. And if that has to involve the Wizengamot and blood purists and the mysterious locked room on the seventh floor of Potter Place…so be it. Threeshot. COMPLETE.
title: Instruments of Shadow

author: reviews
synopsis: Disclaimer: I do not own Harry Potter - A sweet story about The Miracle of Hanukah, as told by Anthony Goldstein
title: The Miracle of Luna

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry is in love and remember how his life took this turn. 'Whenever I look at her red hair, brown eyes, sweet mouth, and perky nose, I just feel happy...'
title: Love of My Life

author: reviews
synopsis: I'm on a journey to put as many cliches as I possibly can in a fanfic. If you're looking for a well written, or serious fanfic, this isn't for you. Complete crack.
title: Hadrian Potter-Black and the Lord of Flame (hiatus)

author: AshleyViolet
synopsis: Harry Potter, hero of the wizarding world, against the Dark Lord, it seems the obvious choice on who to root for... or is it? Discover the backstory of Lord Voldemort's past, and what happened to Harry Potter, that might've been overlooked.
title: Two Faces

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry didn't understand it. His friends had turned their backs on him when they discovered he could talk to snakes. So why was some Ravenclaw first year talking to him?
title: Normal

author: Mione'sMinion
characters: Hermione G., Harry P., Draco M., Lucius M.
synopsis: The Mind Menagerie is a safe place...a place that the terrorized and plagued wizarding populace could seek solace and mental healthcare. Hermione has been struggling with memories of the war, and to fully get over it, she has to face more than she ever thought she could...big thanks to my beta, and my sister, ZombiAlli!
title: Mental Health

author: LegendDairy
synopsis: I've got too many Hinny one-shots, and there are more coming. So they are all going to be posted here instead of individual stories. And Harry/Ginny pairings only, no others. Will be updated sporadically.
title: Compilation of Hinny Works

author: Sweetly Sarcastic
characters: [Hermione G., George W.] [Draco M., Dean T.]
synopsis: Hermione and George aren't dating. They aren't together. But they do happen to live together and have a baby and spend every New Year's Eve over ten years together, during which time Hermione has a terrible habit of crying...
title: A Decade of New Years

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Luna L., N. Tonks
synopsis: Luna Lovegood and Tonks conspire to steal Harry's money and get him locked up in Azkaban. When Harry hears their plan, he sets up his own. (Luna and Tonks bashing. COMPLETELY DONE AS A JOKE. Expect it to be filled with cliches. Has like two sentences of Tom/Harry in the end.)
title: Failed Betrayal

author: reviews
synopsis: Death is not a being; it is Timeless and Eternal. To be the Master of Death means, not to become Death or to command It, but to Defend It. - Please review and let me know if you want to read more of this story! Also, plot suggestions are greatly appreciated :)
title: One Who Defends Death

author: reviews
characters: Ginny W., Luna L., Helena R.
synopsis: If I had known I would have been reincarnated as the youngest Dursley sibling, I wouldn't have jumped. (OC/SI)
title: Daisy Blues

author: reviews
synopsis: Après la bataille, Draco s'est vu prêter une chambre à Poudlard. Un soir, Harry l'a suivi pour lui parler sans vraiment avoir de chose à lui dire... Drarry, lemon, /!\ PWP
title: Première nuit

author: mayghaen17
synopsis: "Why do you care so much, Granger?" His voice was filled with pain and doubt. She closed the distance between them and laid a hand on his arm. "Because you didn't have a choice. You didn't ask for this; it was forced upon you. Just like it was forced upon all of us. No one should have to go through this, Draco. Not even you. Because I see the real you. Even if you don't, I do."
title: The Real You

author: Starssnakesandspells
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M., Blaise Z.
synopsis: It all started at the Ministry's New Years party. A jinxed mistletoe. A long awaited kiss. Dramione love.
title: New Years

author: reviews
characters: Teddy L., Albus S. P., James S. P.
synopsis: It was the wedding of Teddy Lupin and Victoire Weasley, but what should've been a joyous occasion turns sour when a ghost from their Uncle Harry's past slips through the cracks and sends the newly-weds and all their cousins on a spontaneous trip to the past threatening to undo the very fabric of time itself.
title: Down the Rabbit Hole

author: Hoodraii
synopsis: Quand deux personnes amoureuses veulent des choses différentes, les couples exploses. Comment récoler les morceaux quand on pense que tout est fini ? Slash / Yaoi
title: Leave a light on

author: reviews
synopsis: "Your House is like your family," and yet to Harry Potter it was just the start of a number of disappointments.
title: Why am I not surprised?

author: Matteic
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M., Severus S.
synopsis: Un jour, Harry Potter se cacha dans une classe de chimie pendant deux heures pour échapper à Dudley, et un gentil étudiant lui expliqua la méthode scientifique et des choses intéressantes à propos des acides. Une petite cause produit des effets.
title: Harry Potter et le Problème des Potions

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Voldemort, Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Harry seeks his death at the hands of Lord Voldemort in the Forbidden Forest, but his final task does not quite go as planned. Having survived his second Killing Curse, Harry finds himself stranded in 1944, dealing with a young, sane and very dangerous Tom Marvolo Riddle. TRHP.
title: The Prophecy of Time

author: reviews
synopsis: He had decided he is more Black than Malfoy. [Draco/Bellatrix] Contains heavy mentions of incest.
title: Purest Blood

author: reviews
synopsis: Daphnée, elle a la peau opaline, le nez mutin et des cheveux fins qui s'emmêlent. On dit d'elle qu'elle est fragile, qu'elle se casse au moindre choc, à la moindre explosion. Elle est de porcelaine, Daphnée. Moi, je la trouve plutôt de marbre.
title: De porcelaine

author: Conspicuous Euphoria
synopsis: A short story trying to convey what Sirius Black had felt the first time he had seen James Potter.
title: The First Time I Met Him

author: This is My Truth Tell Me Yours
characters: Bellatrix L., Narcissa M., Rodolphus L., Andromeda T.
synopsis: The worst thing that could possibly happen to a girl happens to Bellatrix Black during her fifth year at Hogwarts. This is the story of how she started to become the mad Death Eater we know from the books. It is a story of loneliness and desolation, of friendship, fear, and sisterly love. Mentions of sexual abuse and violence. Teen pregnancy. Rated M.
title: Whom Gods Destroy

author: VivDaKing
synopsis: "We shall do this again Fawkes" he said with a wry smile.
title: Dumbledore's Lives

author: SlitherClaw.Vines
synopsis: Follow Sage Vener as they experience magic, love, confusion, and worry while trying to find their place in the Wizarding World. (Rated t because I'm paranoid) (Also, if you don't enjoy/support LGBTQ themes this story may not be for you) (Also, also, I've changed up a few characters because I thought it would be more interesting for me to write)
title: Lovegood's Friend

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione Grenger y Draco Malfoy cruzaron sus caminos. Ella descubrió que sí era una mujer y él que sí tenían alma.
title: Hay diferentes formas de ayudar

author: reviews
synopsis: On leur avait dit qu'ils pouvaient être heureux, qu'ils pouvaient s'aimer... L'un y avait cru. Pas l'autre. Et puis ils s'étaient connus, s'étaient aimés, jusqu'à en mourir. Ou jusqu'à en vivre, peut-être... Et cette histoire commence le jour où s'aimer en secret ne suffit plus, le jour où ils montrèrent enfin à tous qui ils étaient. Car l'amour n'est pas un crime, nest-ce pas ?
title: Là où meurent les roses blanches

author: Draco'soneandonly89
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M., Blaise Z.
synopsis: Hermione, Harry, and Ron are post war and have returned to Hogwarts. There are some changes to the rules and some hurdles to overcome. Will the three make it out intact, or will they fall apart. New friends and new love interests. There are many adventures ahead. ON HIATUS. NOT ABANDONED. WILL RESUME AT A LATER TIME. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE!
title: It's All Different Now

author: Izzy
synopsis: Pair of Marcus/Katie ficlets written for Christmas 2004, before HBP came out.
title: Flying in a Winter Wonderland

author: AyhanViOLETTi
characters: Harry P., Voldemort, Neville L., Dobby
synopsis: As life returns to normal after the war, love begins to blossom among the survivors. An unnecessary series of one-shots that looks into couples JK would never dare to mention. [Parody]
title: Happily Ever After : The Real Harry Potter Epilogue

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Severus S., Voldemort, Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: After the war, muggle technology is brought into the Wizarding World and used more frequently. Harry becomes reclusive and Hermione tries to help by setting up an account for him on an online Wizard Dating Site. Unknown to Harry, some of the people he talks to and create an online bond with wanted to kill him at one point in time at least. Triad, established relationships, etc
title: Dark Lords, Dungeon Bats and a Dunderhead

author: reviews
synopsis: Tom takes pride in his skill set. When he’s chosen for a job, he wants it to be as an acknowledgement that he is the best, that he isn’t being asked to waste his time doing something anyone can do. What’s challenging about a librarian? Mafia AU.
title: the business we’re in

author: crazyfuriousgirl
synopsis: Kevin Withby va faire sa quatrième rentrée à Poudlard, comment va-t-il évoluer alors que la guerre fait rage ? Vivez l'année de fuite de Harry avec des yeux d'un Poufsouffle de quatrième année, qui ne sait pas toujours quel rôle il doit jouer... Drame / Angoisse / Aventure
title: Les Poufsouffle aussi

author: reviews
synopsis: Lily and James have been friends since high school. Lily has liked James since high school. So much so that she wrote poems about him. And how everything would just work out in five years. Low and behold, after five years later they find themselves together in the same small town. And ready to fall in love. Modern AU based semi on my life
title: another place, another time (it was always in our teenage minds)

author: Mia-Marauder-Potter
synopsis: The three letters that James wrote to Adelaide after she left for the future.
title: James's Letters

author: reviews
characters: Charlie W., Rowan K., Barnaby L., Jacob's sibling
synopsis: One shot based on Hogwarts Mystery. Rowan suffers from an Imperius Curse, threatening to kill a friend. Sacrifices are made, causing two friends to grow closer than ever before.
title: The Imperius Curse

author: mezzosangue
synopsis: A shower of golden sparks came from Hermione's wand. The curse has failed, and Severus and Hermione will never be the same. Canon Compliant, disregards Epilogue. Eventual SS/HG romance.
title: Sibilare

author: dynazztyz
synopsis: Harry Potter is eighteen and right out of a boarding school when he meets Cedric Diggory at the cinema theater he had been forced to work at by his mother. Some might call it a fate or destiny, some poetic shit like that, but Harry called it what it was, a simple accident.
title: a beautiful mess

author: reviews
synopsis: Five-year-old Teddy Lupin wakes up early one morning, eager to wake his adoptive parents so he can go out and play in the snow.
title: Morning Snow

author: Terrapin8
synopsis: In the depths of those steely grey eyes before he threw his shields up, she saw a haunted mind, a broken soul. There was so much that he was withholding. She hoped, whether it was by her or someone else, one day, he would let himself be saved... PostHBP HG/DM
title: Wonderwall

author: sillysongswithlarry
characters: [Hermione G., Draco M.] Scorpius M., Delphi Riddle
synopsis: Keeping their relationship a secret under Umbridge's reign was hard enough for Hermione and Draco before someone decided to muck about with time. Now there are new students taking shelter at Hogwarts, their names and appearances as familiar as they are foreign, and only two secrets remain: Just what drove them to risk the timeline, and who exactly is this Professor Riddle?
title: Glimpses at a Future Imperfect

author: AncientAndHuman
synopsis: We only really come to life when our realities intertwine. A pre-HP timeline in Hogwarts, non-con. Family, politics and coming of age in the magical world. Drama/family/angst/romance/adventure. Same sex pairings, no explicit sexual content, rating for language. LOTS of dialog.
title: Dialogs of Life

author: reviews
characters: Bellatrix L., Narcissa M., Druella B.
synopsis: Background CBDR, otherwise gen. Bellatrix was born as mad as Narcissa was born fair. COMPLETE.
title: Tell Me Who Is Fair

author: reviews
characters: [Arthur W., Molly W.] [Harry P., Ginny W.]
synopsis: Cute one-shot of when Harry and Ginny announce their engagement. Idea from Tumblr post from stardustgraves.
title: A Ginger Announcement

author: TaniWenic
synopsis: "Has it ever crossed your mind, Albus, that Potter may not be safe?" Severus says, eyes narrowing as he watches Dumbledore. It was neglectful of him, Severus decided, to not have had anyone check on the boy, and he can only hope that Petunia had matured as she got older. Author has not read the books. Author has only seen movies. This is an Alternate Universe, obviously.
title: The Father I Never Had

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Draco M.] Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: Draco Malfoy just wants to redecorate Grimmauld Place before he moves in. Harry just wants Draco to stop asking questions he's not ready to answer. This story takes place at a turning point in their relationship, as Draco learns about Harry's past, and Harry learns how far Draco is willing to go to help him heal. Canon child abuse by Dursley family is discussed. April 2005.
title: Of Owls and Cats and New Beginnings

author: Destrange
characters: Sirius B., Alastor M., Mrs. Zabini
synopsis: Une aventurière ? Sans aucun doute. Une medium ? Ça reste à prouver. Une veuve noire ? C'est tout à fait possible. Qui est donc l'ensorcelante Mrs Zabini ? L'aimable veuve qui donne des cauchemars à Alastor Maugrey. Pas de romances mais plusieurs décès ;-)
title: Toutes mes condoléances

author: reviews
synopsis: Secret boyfriends always bring their risks with them.
title: Katie Bell's Nightmare

author: reviews
synopsis: Her lips enunciating pleasure. He stalled. Licked his own. "Depends what's up for offer," he murmured, grey eyes perusing the menu. He didn't dare look at her. "Another beverage, perhaps? Something more suited to dusk instead of dawn?" Their eyes met and the waiter arrived. A one-shot where Hermione and Draco indulge themselves outside the office.
title: A Beautiful Monstrosity

author: reviews
synopsis: Set at Christmas of sixth year. How will a Weasley jumper fix things between Ron and Hermione? Written for the December practice round of the IWSC.
title: Molly's Might

author: shipaycon
synopsis: Hermione Granger owns a flat above her bookstore cafe... and Fred Weasley needs a place to stay. A Fremione fanfiction. Post DH. Fred lives! T for now, M later
title: Fremione: The Living Arrangement

author: Destrange
synopsis: De retour du continent, Salazar découvre les terres du comté de Serpentard ravagées par la guerre et la pauvreté. En traquant le responsable, le jeune mage fait la connaissance de ceux qui deviendront à la fois des amis et des collègues.
title: Le mage exilé

author: FireBird56
synopsis: This isnt realy set around harry potter but it dose contain magic.
title: The Dark Castle

author: Chocogrenouille-FPA
characters: Draco M., Astoria G., Rose W., Hugo W.
synopsis: Directeur d'un journal sorcier, Drago Malefoy tombe de haut lorsqu'une petite employée du nom de Rose Weasley vient réclamer haut et fort d'être augmentée pour ses papiers. Sa réponse ? "Non, trois fois non !" Mais quand on s'appelle Rose Weasley, on ne recule devant rien, pas même un Malefoy contrarié ou un défi épicé... (Rose Weasley x Drago Malefoy)
title: Fragrance de Rose

author: EGC89
synopsis: This is a short story about Harry and Ron , working on a regular coffe shop or so it would seem. I Don t own the characters , only the story.
title: Ordinary coffe shop

author: Jess-Lili
synopsis: Il restera. Parce que même s'il a envie de partir, il n'osera pas. Il ne peut pas avouer qu'il est un homme victime de violences conjugales. Parce que l'amour, ce n'est pas un conte de fées, mais ça ira...
title: Par amour

author: DarylDixon'sgirl1985
synopsis: Beauty and the Beast!AU. Oliver Wood is a spoiled rotten prince who makes the mistake of being rude to the disguised prince of the Weasley kingdom. But what happens when Prince Fred curses Oliver to be a beast until he can find someone to love and love him in return? Will Oliver find love with his new prisoner, or will be stuck as a horrible beast for the rest of his life?
title: Tale as Old as Time

author: Gaupasa.LS
synopsis: Perdón, lo siento, discúlpame. Te quiero, Te amo. No quería hacerlo. Fui un idiota. Tenías razón. Lo lamento mucho, por favor dame otra oportunidad. Te amo demasiado.
title: Por favor Drarry

author: reviews
synopsis: "Excuse me, but I care what happens to Sirius as much as you do!" (Ginny Weasley, "Fight and Flight", Order of the Phoenix pg 761) A look at the brief but meaningful relationship between the last Black and the youngest Weasley. / Canon Compliant, Character Death, References to Depression
title: A Troubled Man

author: DobbyRocksSocks
synopsis: A Gringotts vault of drabbles/challenge fills. Various pairings, warnings, content, genres and subjects.
title: Galleons, Sickles and Knuts

author: Heirx
synopsis: Prompts, challenges, and ideas turned into short stories. Cleaned up with a few grammar apps, but none are edited. Expect lots of humor, including some rather dark tones, along with a helping of entertainment.
title: Random Rambles of a Wondering Wanderer

author: reviews
synopsis: una acción sencilla lleva a Draco a la desesperación.
title: de como Draco Malfoy no podía hacer u la lengua

author: reviews
synopsis: Un blond passant de la rage au désespoir, une brune brisée ; un couple détruit. Une lettre sans réponse, un lit d'hôpital occupé, une vidéo renversante. Mais c'est loin d'être terminé. Et si l'amour résistait malgré toutes les épreuves à traverser ? OS
title: D'un sentiment à l'autre

author: brigida.rodrigues.5
synopsis: Severo pega um aluno lendo... pornografia. E como a vida é realmente injusta, a Professora Granger está com ele no momento embaraçoso.
title: 50 tons de verde e vermelho

author: reviews
characters: [Hermione G., Narcissa M.] Harry P., Draco M.
synopsis: "I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." - John Green In which a post-war Narcissa and Hermione meet and become friends. Rated T for some coarse language.

author: NimbusStormx
characters: [Draco M., OC] Theodore N., Daphne G.
synopsis: When 16-year-old assassin Arachne Messer is assigned her next target, will she able to fend off her feelings in time to kill him? HBP DM/OC
title: Assassin

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Rubeus H.
synopsis: Hagrid is busy making Harry's Christmas present and hopes he'll like it. And a surprise visit for his birthday makes the Christmas season even better./Christmas Fluff/One-Shot
title: Special Gifts

author: reviews
synopsis: "Potter éclata de rire avant de s'accouder près de lui sur la balustrade pour profiter du spectacle du parc enneigé. Son coude frôlait celui de Regulus mais cela ne semblait pas l'incommoder. Regulus se demanda quel dragon l'avait piqué pour qu'il se comporte de la sorte. Potter l'emmerdait. Royalement." OS
title: Le sourire de Potter

author: Angel Nat-Chan
synopsis: Harry hides in the shower while distraught and gets a visitor... SLASH RATED MATURE
title: Showers Part Two

author: PotterheadMadi
synopsis: Years after the second wizarding war the golden boy and an ex death eater decide to get married. The prophet gets a hang of it, and the howlers start rolling in. One day, however, the boy who lived is unable to find Draco in the house, a bit research ends up in a mission to find the kidnapped Draco Malfoy.Cursed by Potter loving fans, he may or may not survive the curse. DRARRY
title: I'll shave my head for you

author: sunlightstars
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Severus S.
synopsis: To love unexpectedly is to sometimes find oneself under water not knowing how to swim.
title: Unexpected Love

author: Hikaria360
synopsis: Harry est sans doute le seul à pouvoir voyager entre les dimensions et les univers. Oui, et il en a vécu des choses. Des multitudes de souffrances. Le voilà de retour dans sa dimension d'origine, où tout a commencé. Un regard autour de lui, un sourire sadique et un seul souhait : Tous les détruire. Harry PUISSANT, DARK et VOYAGES ENTRE LES DIMENSIONS!
title: La Saga des Univers: Tout détruire

author: sweetheart-sirius
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P., OC
synopsis: Sirius falls in the veil and travels to the past. Detailed summary inside.

author: idealbystander
characters: [Harry P., Ginny W.] [Ron W., Hermione G.]
synopsis: The story of maturity, forgiveness, lost love and family. Story of Harry and Ginny after five years of battle of Hogwarts. Slight A/U. Please see Authors note.
title: The Love We Lost

author: Absolem Snape
synopsis: Trad. fic original de Ulktante. Certaines parties d'âmes ne partent pas seules. Lorsque Voldemort revient dans un corps, il est beaucoup plus sain d'esprit qu'auparavant et se rend compte qu'il ne peut pas continuer comme il a commencé. Trouve quelques anciennes lois, il se propose d'atteindre ses objectifs d'une autre manière.Harry en trouvera son monde bouleversé.Image de za.rah
title: L'Avantage des Anciennes Lois

author: Kurokami-Snow
characters: [Daphne G., Hermione G., Pansy P.] Ginny W.
synopsis: Gracias a una "brillante" idea de Ginny y los gemelos, Hermione queda atrapada entre dos serpientes, y no cualquiera. Una que siempre la ha odiado por no ser "pura" y otra con una reputación fría. (si no te gusta no leas)
title: Un Nuevo Comienzo
pairing: Daphne G., Hermione G., Pansy P.

author: bitternessbitesback
characters: [Fred W., Hermione G.] [Harry P., Ginny W.]
synopsis: It is said that when you first meet your soulmate, both your chests glow red for a minute. Of course, Hermione has more important things to be worrying about than something as silly as her "other half".

author: nunchikoi
synopsis: A reimagined story where everything is the same except Cedric Diggory lives. Staying as close to the canon timeline as possible, J.K Rowling's original text has been recycled with my own writing carrying most of the chapters.

author: Ve Zhe Awesome Writer
synopsis: Sirius Black had escaped Azkaban. He is going to protect his godson from that manipulative old coot. To do that, he enlists help from certain formerly unknown family members. [Full Summary Inside]
title: The Black Night Sky

author: reviews
synopsis: Tenía mucho miedo de quedar de quedar en Slytherin, ¿Quién fue la persona que hizo que cambiará de opinión?
title: Y así fue como sucedió…

author: PlanetZero
synopsis: Someone is killing off the Death Eaters. Roomers are circulating about an assassin in black and red. After all of the mysterious disappearance, people seem to dieing with ease. While still trying to find Harry Potter, Dumbledore tryies to find the motive of the ilusive assassin: Red Silver.
title: Red Silver

author: PurpleKorea134
characters: Draco M., Lucius M., Narcissa M.
synopsis: This is a cute holiday story about a simple girl trying to bring happiness and holiday spirit back into Malfoy Manor.
title: Home For Christmas

author: tomfuckingriddle
synopsis: Harry Potter only ever sees his elusive, handsome neighbour Tom Riddle when Riddle wants to borrow a bit of sugar. However, an embarrassing incident leads to Tom taking a sudden interest in Harry, which quickly gets out of hand. Never let it be said that Tom Riddle doesn't get what he wants. (COMPLETE.)
title: Sugar, It's Cold Outside

author: CryBlueBerry
synopsis: Hogwarts, he didn't belong there. He didn't belong anywhere. He belonged to one place and that was home. His home back in Godric's Hollow. He lived in a house he shared with his parents. They had known his real parents. The Werewolf was very gentle with him while the snake did the best she could to raise him. They were the perfect family. The perfect family to messed up eyes.
title: Human or Not?

author: Trinkisme
synopsis: Sometimes the innocent suffer in war. Sometimes they cause the suffering. But stronger than suffering and the hate that created it is the triumph of love. Dramione.
title: Hate

author: Hippothestrowl
characters: [Harry P., Hermione G.] [Neville L., Luna L.]
synopsis: No need to physically walk away to stop playing the game. Harry Potter learns to never stop asking for help even before he goes to Hogwarts so he's certainly not going to sit back and take all that injustice when he does! Take it to them, Harry! NOT a sequel but a sidequel to my earlier Walkaway. Featuring the return of Mercy Fuller.
title: Walk Away Further: Neverstop!

author: ontzilore
characters: Lily Evans P., Severus S., OC
synopsis: De cómo un solo acto de una sola persona puede determinar los de toda una generación. ¿Qué hubiera sido del destino de Severus Snape, del de Hogwarts, del de todo el mundo mágico, si él se hubiera decidido a realizar un simple y tímido gesto en una dirección que nadie sospechaba podría tener tales consecuencias? Tercera parte, encontraréis las dos primeras en mi página.
title: El Año de la Revolución III La Maduración del Fruto

author: HecateA
synopsis: Salazar Slytherin had made his peace long ago that he would never see Helga Hufflepuff again. He never expected to be brought back to her side, let alone her death bed, and he especially did not anticipate the emissary that would bring him there. Oneshot.
title: One Last Kindness

author: reviews
synopsis: Things did not go as planned when Draco Malfoy was told to kill the Headmaster and break the Deatheater's into Hogwarts 6th year. Instead of obeying he has asked the Order for sanctuary which could potentially change the course of the war. This leads to new relationships, trials among friends and a few well placed punches to the ferrets face when Hermione is assigned as his contact
title: The Situation

author: reviews
synopsis: Sirius Black is feeling frustrated as Valentine's Day approaches at Hogwarts. While all of his friends are searching to find themselves dates, Sirius refuses to take part in the dumb holiday. No one is good enough for the handsome, charming Sirius Black. Right?
title: The New Couple

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ginny W., Molly W.
synopsis: What if, during the Battle of Hogwarts, Ginny didn't block Bellatrix's spell? Sad, Major Character Death
title: If Ginny didn't block Bellatrix's Spell

author: YouAreAlmostOutOfMilk
synopsis: hahahahahahahahahahahaha suckers (13 year old me was an idiot this time)
title: Lies

author: FunnySunnyFlower
synopsis: I have only been afraid of two things in my life: One, the tooth fairy when I was eight and two, the mermaids from Harry Potter that reside in the black lake. The same black lake that I'm about to dive head first into... When Grace falls into the lake while on a camping trip, she wakes up in a place not at all unfamiliar, but all the same impossible to be.
title: Once A Witch

author: reviews
synopsis: Ma respiration haletante, mes jambes tremblantes, j'hésitais à lever mon poing pour frapper à la porte. Il était rentré. /LEMON, UA vampire
title: Good night, Harry

author: Davinius Gerard Fogg
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Minerva M., OC
synopsis: Summer 1995 onwards through books 5 & 6. Magically, super powerful Harry. He gets in very serious bother with the Ministry, Character deaths, devious, manipulating Dumbledore. McGonnagle becomes his mentor and magical guardian, Hermione is ever loyal, Ron & the DA have Harry's back. Sirius lives. OC Healer gets close to Harry. Two battles, (NOT Hogwarts). HP/HG & HP/OC. RW/LB.
title: HARRY POTTER : THE POWER ANDS THE GLORY

author: Saphiruivre
characters: [Lucius M., Narcissa M.] Albus D., Abraxas M.
synopsis: C'est la septième et dernière année de Lucius Malefoy à Poudlard. Jusqu'ici, il régnait en maître sur l'école et faisait partie du célèbre Club de Slug. Mais une erreur commise en juin dernier lui coûte la considération de sa famille et remet en question sa position d'élève privilégié. Bien décidé à regagner son statut, il élabore sans sourciller un crime parfait.
title: Man of Power

author: Tempest Novastorm
synopsis: When Lady Magic searched for her latest Dark Lord, she did not expect him to be born about a hundred years apart from the last one. Realizing another one wouldn't be born for another century, she chose to use a substitute. And now that the True Dark Lord has risen it's time to start reforming to the world. Dark!Harry, OP!Harry, Godlike!Harry, Order Bashing, no pairings as of yet.
title: Oh Dumbledore, We're Just Getting Started

author: CacheCoeur
synopsis: Harry doit travailler pour payer ses études de droit magique. Drago, lui, est né avec une cuillère en argent dans la bouche et tout lui a toujours réussi, malgré la pression que son père lui inflige. Alors, quand le doyen de la faculté annonce qu'une bourse au mérite sera offert au meilleur étudiant, Harry est bien déterminé à faire tomber Malfoy de sa première place...
title: La véritable richesse de Noël

author: Noumea
synopsis: Hermione retrouve une personne qu'elle croyait disparue et, dans sa volonté de l'aider, se méprend sur son compte...
title: Surprise et méprise

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry and Gemma share a moment in the courtyard at the Perenelle Flamel Adaptation Center where they are both learning to adapt. For the Pomegranate challenge on Reddit r/fanfiction 12-5-2019. The challenge was to write the life story of a canon, OC, or SI in under 500 words/15 minutes. The story had to include the word pomegranate and reference fire, earth, air, and water.
title: Pomegranate

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry gets home a week late. He hopes the Auror department will lay off in future. Ginny can't let things stew.
title: imagine

author: euphellys
synopsis: Jusqu'à ce qu'elle entende leurs cris percer les murs du manoir, Daphné ne s'était jamais posé de questions. Et puis... Et puis le sang étranger s'invita sous ses ongles, la nausée lui saisit les tripes et ses yeux s'affolèrent, perdus, désespérément en quête d'un repère. Elle n'aurait jamais pu deviner qu'ils s'arrêteraient sur lui.
title: Nonchaloir

author: Rboooks
characters: Harry P., Petunia D., Dudley D., Vernon D.
synopsis: Dudley lives with the guilt of what his family had done to his cousin. He resents the person he used to be and tries to live as someone better, but a part of himself can never truly forgive the cruelty done to the kind-hearted Harry. After a car accident, he wakes to find himself a child again. He sets out to make sure Harry has a better childhood all while hiding his own magic.
title: Kindness and Remorse

author: Sorrella
synopsis: It's modern day and peace has reigned over the wizarding world after the fall of Lord Voldemort. But good things can only last so long. When a pure-blooded Slytherin becomes obsessed with the works of the Dark Lord things take a turn for the worse at Hogwarts. SYOC open!
title: Fighting for What's Right - SYOC

author: reviews
characters: Severus S., Percy W., Marcus F., OC
synopsis: Fluffy one-shot based on Calista Snape series. Original Female Character (Calista Snape), and Original Male Character (Gerald Boot). This recounts, from Gerald's point of view, the exact moment that he realised he had feelings for Calista.
title: Le Hibou et Le Colibri

author: TheKingofLizards
characters: N. Tonks, Charlie W., Rowan K., Jacob's sibling
synopsis: Lucas Blackburn had always looked towards the moment he could join his brother Jacob at Hogwarts. But the mysterious disappearance of his older sibling casts a dark shadow on everything in the boy's life. Now the young wizard must make his own way forward as he begins his first year at the magical school. [Story will only cover events up to the sorting ceremony for now]
title: Lucas Blackburn and the Mysteries of Hogwarts

author: reviews
synopsis: Salazar Slytherin is a man on a mission. When he appears in Hogwarts in the year 1995 with a message for Hermione Granger, it's time for some long forgotten truths to come to light.
title: The Future Soon

author: reviews
synopsis: Scorpius Malfoy and Rose Weasley share a secret - they both really enjoy to hang at muggle clubs to run away from their lives. Highly inspired by the album Melodrama by Lorde.
title: Melodrama

author: alter321
synopsis: ¿Qué pasaría si Hermione hubiera sabido desde pequeña que era una Rosier? ¿Cómo hubiera afectado este conocimiento a los que la rodean? Existen universos paralelos en cada historia, ideas que se niegan a morir y prosperan en su propio fic. Leer Rosas y espinas primero
title: Las espinas de la rosa

author: reviews
synopsis: What is the truth and what is the lie? Who's the monster and who's the hero. Who can be trusted and who has betrayed them all. So many questions. So little time. Can Harry tell the difference and untangle the mess that is his life before it's too late. Dumbledore bashing and maybe some Weasley bashing i'll decide later. There will be slash and are pairings.
title: Shadows in Truths and Lies

author: MoonWarrior222
synopsis: What will happen when Dudley and his friends tickle the sleeping dragon? The answer is they will face his wrath, and now Harry is as free as the wind.
title: He's Been Thunderstruck

author: reviews
synopsis: Post Hogwarts Ginny and Draco run into each other. Alcohol and repressed attraction cause things to heat up quickly. Lemon/ SMUT oneshot.
title: Why the Hell Not? (Drinny oneshot)

author: jesmalestiel
characters: [Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.]
synopsis: Let it never be said that Harry Potter's parents were ones to half-ass shenanigans. This is the story of the rise and fall of the original trio of tricksters. Sirius/James/Lily. Canon-compliant-if-you-squint.
title: The Original Trio of Tricksters
pairing: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.

author: reviews
synopsis: On Hermione's 17th birthday everything changes her. Will Hermione stay the good-girl, bookworm Gryffindor? Or will she become a feared death eater, and absolutely gorgeous Slytherin?
title: Hermione Riddle: A Dramione Story

author: juniperwindsong
synopsis: If Felix Rosier, age sixteen, strict Slytherin prefect and manically dedicated 6th year student, had been told that one year in the future he would be spending nearly a third of each week sneaking out of the school to visit a dragon in the Forbidden Forest, he would have docked points from whatever student was making up such a slanderous lie.
title: Dragonology 101

author: Lils White
synopsis: Ella brillaba con toda la rabia de Gryffindor y él portaba la astucia de Slytherin. Cuando ella luchaba por la justicia, él nadaba en la oscuridad; cuando él salió de la oscuridad, ella ya no creía en la justicia. Estaban destinados a ser enemigos. Conjunto de drabbles.
title: Damnatio Memoriae

author: mymywhatasly
characters: [Draco M., Hermione G.] Albus D., Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Dramione. Night Circus AU. WIP.
title: Le Cirque des Rêves

author: bookblaster
synopsis: A young girl Anne thinks she doesn't fit in till she meets another magical being, Dumbledore. She finds out she's adopted and her biological father is a man named Severus Snape. She also finds out she has a twin brother Harry.
title: The Potter Twins

author: DobbyRocksSocks
synopsis: Zombies were a ridiculous concept. Right? Perhaps not...
title: An Elephant Never Forgets

author: AlanLoo
synopsis: AU. Slash HP/TR Hadrian Potter es un niño prodigio en una familia que no lo quiere y, por eso, siente que su vida es muy monótona. Como todas las personas que conoce que son de su edad le parecen muy bastas y de poco interés, se ve sumido en una vida solitaria de estudio... hasta que llega a Hogwarts. En el año 1934. Espera, ¿qué?
title: El retorno del archimago

author: Varnug
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: Alternatywny 5 rok w Hogwarcie. Do szkoły przyjeżdża grupa słowiańskich uczniów w ramach programu Erazmus. Zderzenie kultur, stylów życia czy sposobu robienia notatek prowadzi do wielu kuriozalnych sytuacji
title: Erasmus w Hogwarcie

author: everlovingdeer
synopsis: "I had an interview," I confessed. "I met up with one of the wandmakers I want to train under and we were discussing abroad placements." For a moment, he walked funny as if he'd missed a step in surprise. I caught his eyes, raising an eyebrow as he continued to watch me in silence. Finally shaking his head, he said, "You're going to leave?"
title: Homecoming

author: Noms17
characters: Harry P., Severus S., Albus D., Sirius B.
synopsis: Harry is rescued by Sirius instead of Hagrid, he grows up with both the fatherly figures of Sirius and Dumbledore, Hagrid is there too. What will happen when Harry finds out about the prophecy and how will he cope.
title: Harry James Black Potter and The Man With Two Faces

author: WigglyWednesday
synopsis: In July of 1976 a whole bunch of peculiar, equal parts amazing and horrendous, things had already come to pass. A few examples. Atticus Mulciber viciously attacked Mary MacDonald with an unforgivable curse, Sirius Black kissed both Marlene McKinnon and Remus Lupin and James Potter and Lily Evans decided to skive off school to go see David Bowie play in London.
title: In times of war

author: spinningthroughthevortex
characters: [Hermione G., Severus S.] [Harry P., Ginny W.]
synopsis: How long can you really justify blaming your reactions on a potions accident?
title: The Secret Property of Ashwinder Eggs

author: reviews
characters: Hermione G., Draco M., Harry P., Astoria G.
synopsis: Sometimes you are meant to fall in love, just so you realise that the person whom you love can never be yours. What happens when a terrible accident causes two people to revisit their history, just so they can write their future. A short Dramione story. Read and Review guys.
title: For Now

author: Holfyy
characters: Rubeus H., N. Tonks, Bill W., Charlie W.
synopsis: When Nova Unthank (OC) turns up at the Sanctuary one day, Charlie and her both struggle with old feelings they thought they'd left firmly behind. But they will both have to confront their past and come together in order to fight what's ahead. Themes of anxiety/depression. Set post Hogwarts CW timeline, with Hogwarts flashbacks.
title: Every Small Fear

author: reviews
synopsis: When Severus Snape accidentally Apparates in his sleep, he suddenly wakes to find himself in Miss Granger's bed in Gryffindor Tower. How will he escape without detection? Rated M for all the things one would suspect would happen when two people in a fanfic are trapped in a bed together. Set in Hermione's 8th year, so she's 19. Teacher/Student, Humor/Romance, HEA.
title: Accidental Apparition: Can't a Wizard Get Some Godsdamn Sleep Around H

author: jadeite248
characters: [Luna L., Harry P.] Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Full summary in first update. What if, after Voldemort's defeat in Deathly Hollows, he wasn't finished. What if, after the events in the Chamber of Secrets, he remained in Ginny's mind. What if, after Harry abandoned two of the three Deathly Hallows, the time would come for one he holds dear to take the spotlight, gather them and save his own life? What if... What if... What if...
title: Luna Lovegood and the Broken Relic

author: AtelophobiaAchluophilia
synopsis: They both have a lot to learn. Part 3 to Corporal Punishment, hardcore H/S fic
title: When the Student Becomes the Teacher

author: celtiqueMermaid
synopsis: Harry comprenaient certaines choses assez vite. Par exemple, quand les Dursley ont gagné un séjour aux Bahamas, il sut tout de suite qu'il ne ferait pas partie du voyage. Quand Vernon lui signifia en souriant qu'il avait trouvé un endroit qui ferrait de son neveu un homme, ce dernier su tout de suite que ce serait les pires vacances de sa vie... Univers sans magie
title: Un billet pour l'enfer

author: StoriesbyNessie
synopsis: Draco and Ron have taken a habit to sleep with each other. That's literally all they do. So when Ron wants to spend time with Draco outside of the bedroom, it certainly is strange…
title: To beat around the bush

author: Jonathan Anubian
synopsis: Skylar Stanley, who recently turned eleven, is a very sweet girl with a love of birds, a fascination with natural sciences, and a penchant for helping anyone in need. What few people know is that she was born as a boy. While her family is very loving and supportive, how will she handle living at a boarding school with other children who may not be so tolerant?
title: Blue Skies

author: Ignis18
synopsis: Seventh in the Thwarted Traditions AU. A certain green-eyed boy decides to take a night walk around and think over his recent past and new abilites.
title: Night Walks

author: Ignis18
characters: [Harry P., Hermione G.] [James P., Lily Evans P.]
synopsis: Sixth in the Thwarted Traditions AU. Harry Potter and Hermione Granger were known for being the best of friends. But before the friendship, there should have been a meeting, don't you think? Well, it all started on Platform 9 3/4 when their respective parents took them to take the Hogwarts Express...
title: Birth of Harmony

author: Harrison Aldrich Emrys
synopsis: Stolen—ahem, I mean inspired by “Harry Samurai” by elvander72. His parents gave him away. His relatives tried to murder him in a foreign country. And now he is forced to participate in a barbaric competition less he wishes to lose his magic. He was raised to follow the Samurai Code and to protect the daughter of the Dragon. Can he face what is ahead of him, or will he crumble under
title: Heir of the Dragon’s Flame

author: reviews
synopsis: just a drabble, not for work.
title: Le Petite Mort

author: rockythehufflepuff
synopsis: "Draco Malfoy could see Hermione Granger pursuing the books. The Weasel was standing beside her, his arm laying carelessly across her shoulders as they watched their daughter happily pulling the books from the shelves. To an outsider, they looked like a perfectly happy family. But there are two sides to every story and his happened to be the correct one."
title: Always

author: Ignis18
synopsis: Fifth in the Thwarted Traditions AU. It's Bella's first class as the DADA professor! When Minnie had mentioned that the position was free right now and finally the curse over it had been broken, Bellatrix jumped at the opportunity to teach the next generation her favorite class back in her school years, it should be fun, right?
title: Bella's First Class

author: reviews
characters: [Hermione G., Bill W.] Rose W., Victoire W.
synopsis: A tale of pumpkin carving, runic interference, love, and family celebration on the Samhain night of 2016. Written as part of the Pumpkins & Ginger Fall Fest 2019, organised by the Weasley, Witches, & Writers group.
title: Kenaz

author: Ignis18
characters: [James P., Lily Evans P.] Sirius B., Remus L.
synopsis: Fourth in the Thwarted Traditions AU. After six years of dating, today is time for James and Lily to tie the knot! And even though they are nervous on their special day, they can't wait to officially be Mr. and Mrs. Potter!
title: A Potter Wedding

author: reviews
synopsis: A prank by Harry and his children really upsets his wife. So, they create a special gift as a peace offering. This gift brings people together to change the lives of orphans which leads to the Potters' most meaningful Christmas yet. Dedicated to SereniteRose. ONESHOT.
title: Naughty or Nice?

author: Ignis18
characters: [Bellatrix L., Petunia D.] Lily Evans P., Amelia B.
synopsis: Second in the Thwarted Traditions AU. It was the first Hogsmeade weekend of 1974 and, finally, all the Marauders were going to be able to go together! Though, Bella would prefer to be left to wander the town alone with her crush. She just wanted to find what her sisters and two of their cousins had! Was that much to ask for?
title: Unexpected Developments

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Lily Evans P.
