pairing: Hermione G., Draco M., Theodore N.

author: Equinox73099
synopsis: Alexander Polaris, Heir to the house of Polaris, has been brought up to be a ruler of a nation. but what happens when, in a desperate bid to salvage his childhood, his guardian sends him to Hogwarts as a third year, in the same year as harry potter. watch out Voldemort, the house of Polaris and potter combined may be more than any dark lord can handle. ext. summary inside. noslash
title: Defiance of fate

author: reviews
synopsis: To cut him once, shame on him. Cut him twice? Harry potter isn't about to allow that with a weapon though lost to the annals of history and therefore his right to claim its bloodline for his own. Beware Voldemort and Dumbledore, Harry's done playing nice.*challenge fic response! Severely Dark-Grey Harry! HPx?*
title: Once cut, twice shaved

author: brokenbottleaurora
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Peter P.
synopsis: "I say we do it! Let's all get tattoos." - "All of us?" Peter squeaked. - "Think of it as a, uh, bonding experience."
title: Indelible

author: jredg2431
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Luna L., Hedwig
synopsis: Harry comes upon a mysterious book one day in the park whilst visiting a friend near privet drive,what happens next changes everything. Planning a rather long story for at least 200k words, planning to go all through Hogwarts years and beyond. please review.Harry/Luna at the moment but I am wrestling with adding Hermione.
title: Harry Potter And The Beast Speaker

author: vixevilcat7
synopsis: Another view of Scabior. Alternate Universe. Snape, Lavender Brown lives, Greyback lives. Protective/Fatherly Greyback. The Trio and Scabior, eventual pairing of Scabior and Hermione.
title: till we're not strangers anymore

author: reviews
synopsis: What would have happened without Neville Longbottom? One-shot.
title: The Longbottom Sacrifice

author: Evyione
synopsis: Summary: Hermione, late at night, knocks on the Potter's door, distraught. Ginny answers the door, Harry, not far behind her. Seeing their friend in such an erratic state, they quickly let her in. Once she calmed down, she explained everything… Ron has cheated on her. Hermione is crying. They ask what's wrong and Ginny understand she needs a girl talk and asks Harry to leave them
title: Old Rivals: Ronmione

author: AlexVyaJones
characters: Harry P., Severus S., Draco M.
synopsis: Draco Malfoy is tired of Harry Potter and his lies about who he is and who he loves. He tries to convince the boy to tell the truth. Harry Potter is the first Veela in 107 years to be double bonded. just wait till you find out who they are.
title: The Only Ones

author: reviews
synopsis: Tom Riddle takes pride in his ability to manipulate others. So, when an unsuspecting Harry Potter stumbles across his diary, it's only natural he should push his skill and creativity to the limit to craft a tale so engrossing, so compellingly plausible, that the boy will fall for it hook, line and sinker. If it results in a slight alteration to his future plans, so be it.
title: Word by Word

author: Xetarma
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Sirius B., OC
synopsis: Part 1 of Harriet Potter and the Guardians of Atlantis. Trapped at Privet Drive with her abusive uncle and separated from her godfather, 10 year old Harriet Potter tries to make an escape to the Magical World. Pursued by an agent of the Ministry, Harriet is saved by a mysterious woman who points Harriet in a new direction.
title: Harriet Potter and the Strange Witch

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Remus L., Draco M.
synopsis: This fic will have one-shot chapters that will be different pairings from the Harry Potter Universe that is based on the lyrics to a song. Requests can be made by leaving a review with a song and pairing you would like for me to write. Some ground rules are laid out in the first chapter. This will be a very mature fic with plenty of spice!
title: Love Lyrics

author: WitchChaser6
synopsis: Hey! Sorry this came to me at the most random! I have so many projects on the go at the moment. I like all HP fans want more! I love the possibilities of next gen. Anyhow this story is intending to follow the story of Morganna Malfoy, daughter of Draco and Astoria, in her seventh year at Hogwarts, and when a miscast spell places the entire wizarding world in mortal peril.
title: The Slytherin Mark

author: HeStoleYourHorcrux
synopsis: Birbirlerinin hayatının çok kolay olduğunu düşünen Sirius ve Regulus, kolay gördükleri hayatı yaşamaya mahkum olurlar. - Freaky Friday filminden ilham alınmıştır.
title: Easy? (Black Brothers)

author: reviews
synopsis: I need help finding an old story. Hermione proposes to marry Fleur so she can stay in England, but Fleur has a crush on Hermione.
title: Help me to find that fanfic

author: HeStoleYourHorcrux
synopsis: Biri ceza biri görev: Onu öldüreceksin!
title: Assassin (Black Brothers)

author: HeStoleYourHorcrux
characters: Regulus B., Sirius B., Albus S. P., Scorpius M.
synopsis: Antik büyülerin kitabı açılmıştı ancak bu büyülerle oyun olmazdı. Çapulcular, Lily, Regulus ve Barty kendilerini bir büyü yüzünden gelecekte bulurlar.
title: Geçmişten Gelen (Next Gen - Marauders)

author: HeStoleYourHorcrux
characters: Lily Luna P., Albus S. P., Scorpius M.
synopsis: Hogwarts Cadılık ve Büyücülük Okulu'nda öğrenci grupları birbirine benzer. Kural dışı, asi, kendine özgü, sadık... Incendio Tria'yı diğerlerinden ayıran özellik neydi? Acımasız. Oysa ki her şey küçük, masum bir şakayla başlamıştı.
title: Incendio Tria (Scorily)

author: HeStoleYourHorcrux
characters: Walburga B., Orion B., Sirius B., Regulus B.
synopsis: Bir Black olarak doğmuş ve bir Black olarak ölecek Walburga Black'in hikayesi.
title: Born in Black (Walburga Black)

author: reviews
synopsis: "I'm feeling like breaking a rule or two, how about … decree twenty-six?" George whispered into her ear, lightly grazing the shell of her ear with his lips. A fluffy Geomione one-shot, for when you're in need of some romance. Including a broom closet and an oblivious Harry and Ron.
title: Educational Decree Number Twenty-Six

author: Delancey654
characters: [Draco M., Hermione G.] Harry P., Ron W.
synopsis: A few years after Voldemort's defeat, Lucius Malfoy and the Traditionalist Party are poised to take control of the government. The Golden Trio is willing to do anything to prevent this, but Hermione Granger has her own agenda. Loosely based on first-ever sex scandal in American politics, the "Reynolds Affair."
title: The Granger Affair

author: AmericanDemigod
synopsis: Draco is a veela Harry is a neko what will happen when the two discover that they're mates? Read to find out
title: Inheriting the Unexpected

author: DarylDixon'sgirl1985
synopsis: Canon Divergent. Padma Patil has been in love with Lavender Brown since their since before their sixth year of Hogwarts. They've had their up and downs in their relationship but Padma wants to take their relationship to the next level. What will Lavender say? Will there be a happy ending or will someone end up in tears?
title: Padma's Love

author: reviews
characters: [Sirius B., Remus L.] James P., Peter P.
synopsis: The Four Marauders find themselves at Hogwarts School for Troubled Teens. Perhaps they should have behaved better? WolfStar.
title: Hogwarts School for Troubled Teens

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry is abonded by his jealous best friend Ron and Hermoine with them turning backs will he make new friends or will his life crumble?
title: The Jealous

author: HeStoleYourHorcrux
synopsis: Hatıralar evinden harikalar diyarına açılan dolaba yolculuk.
title: Mademoiselle Noir (Regmione)

author: The One True Nobody
characters: Hermione G., OC, Daphne G., Tracey D.
synopsis: The Girl Who Lived appeared cheerful and intelligent, a model student. So charming she was that even being sorted into Slytherin House didn't do much to hurt her popularity at Hogwarts. Not many people understood that there was something fundamentally wrong with how she looked at the world. But she seemed able to befriend anyone. It was no wonder no one saw how alone she was...
title: Laurel Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

author: the stargate time traveller
characters: Harry P., Fleur D., Gabrielle D.
synopsis: What if saving Gabriella from the lake in the second task had a more profound effect on a more jaded Harry Potter, who had lost everything in his life and was at the end of his rope? Told he has contracted the Veela curse, Harry must become a Veela himself...only Veela cannot be men.
title: The New Veela

author: the stargate time traveller
synopsis: Tired of the magical world, tired of the spies and the lying manipulations in his life, Harry leaves Privet Drive. He finds himself in Soho, London, where his life changes forever when he is invited by a madam...
title: The Red Light Curse

author: salazarsspawn
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: When the summer holidays start, the Hogwarts professors and graduated seventh years work together to introduce the new first years to Hogwarts and the wizarding world. They do this with the Wand Workshop - a time-honoured tradition dating back to the time of the Founders.
title: The Wand Workshop

author: the stargate time traveller
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Luna L.
synopsis: Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, and Luna Lovegood. Three people, different backgrounds, with one thing in common. The shadows are their domain, and they love plundering both the magical and non-magical worlds of their treasures. LUNAR HARMONY
title: The Three Shadow-Thieves

author: the stargate time traveller
synopsis: Harry Potter has vanished, leaving the magical world at the mercy of Lord Voldemort. A few years later, Death Eaters begin to die out, each one in gruesome ways. The Exterminator is here, and he is very familiar.
title: The Exterminator

author: the stargate time traveller
synopsis: Halle Potter is seen as an all round disappointment at Hogwarts. Everyone feels the Girl Who Lived is a bimbo who cares only for fashion and boys, and doesn't care about being a hero. Everyone have their opinions, but what happens if their ideas are wrong?
title: Halle Potter

author: the stargate time traveller
synopsis: What if a different Harry went to the Wizarding world, but returned to Gringotts without Hagrid? A Harry who was not the type of hero Dumbledore wanted, but someone willing to steal? Harry is a cat burglar, and he wants nothing to do with the magical world.
title: Cat-Burglar

author: the stargate time traveller
synopsis: Everyone knows Jasmine Potter, the Girl Who Lived. Sweet, naive...but what if that is what everyone is supposed to think? What if she were a murderess, a femme fatale who loves to have sex, and doesn't care whom she plays or kills to get what she wants? But what if there is something about her past she did not know, something she didn't expect?
title: Basic Instinct

author: lilysmoonstorm
synopsis: Greyback stalks out his newest prey one night. [one shot, character study/practice]
title: Nursery Rhymes

author: AnxiouslyNumb
synopsis: It was hard for Ginny Weasley to find hope in the aftermath of the Battle Of Hogwarts.
title: Last Hope

author: Beedle Le Bard
synopsis: Draco overhears a conversation of Harry's. Can Harry fix this? Established Drarry.
title: Lie Like That

author: reviews
synopsis: Sexto año, Draco recibe un duro golpe en la cabeza, sufriendo amnesia. Puede eso cambiar su forma de ver las cosas?
title: Amnesia

author: reviews
synopsis: ONESHOT. BL. DRARRY. Draco and Harry run into each other at Hogwarts but this time as professors. rated M to be safe.
title: First Day as a Professor

author: Malbsession
synopsis: 'I was not a good friend, but she is not dead. I know she is not dead.' HG/DM DRAMIONE #dramione
title: Silver Painted Moons

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Harry ran away when he was 7 and changed his name. He and his fellow Street Rats are magical creatures driven away from their families. Now Dumbledore needs help will Harry, his friends and wives help Dumbledore now that the Dark Lord is back?
title: The Real Life Street Rats

author: reviews
synopsis: Cómo dejar un cuerpo vacío por amor "Este fic participa en el minirreto de noviembre para La Copa de la Casa 19/20 del foro La Noble y Ancestral Casa de los Black"
title: Vacío

author: Arwen the Storyteller
synopsis: Jenny Potter returns to Hogwarts for her second year with her best friends Ron, Henry and Cassandra. But as a new year begins, the four find themselves drawn into another adventure upon discovering the words: The Chamber of Secrets has been Opened. Together the four BFFs seek to find out who the Heir of Slytherin is and what kind of monster it is commanding to attack students.
title: Jenny Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ginny W., Teddy L.
synopsis: It takes about five seconds for Teddy to gain Ginny's trust and three for him to lose it again. Luckily, this is one secret worth sharing. Oneshot.
title: Never Trust Five-Year-Olds

author: Death is the last enemy
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Fleur D., Daphne G.
synopsis: Controlled and weak I am no longer.
title: Gryffin's claw

author: reviews
synopsis: Because it can't be easy. The words can't be said on sight, or at a first conversation. No, of course not, because life screws everyone over and decided that it'd be a grand idea to have the words be said at random, by someone you've known a long time. Soulmates have to build a bond like anyone else. Neither of them had predicted that outcome.
title: The Words

author: McDonaldMcTrump
synopsis: A black-comedy parody of the original Harry Potter series. Rated M for... some stuff, including funny violence, funny jokes, and funny jokes that shouldn't be funny. If you are offended by this book, please put it down and step outside, unless you are on a plane.
title: Harold Potter and the Stoned Sorcerer

author: carolaacerola
synopsis: Look, Remus was not planning on falling for anyone anytime soon. But feelings...
title: Feelings

author: reviews
synopsis: Mientras la tuviera a ella, no le importaría nada más. / "Este fic participa en el minirreto de noviembre para La Copa de la Casa 19/20 del foro La Noble y Ancestral Casa de los Black".
title: Sin importar lo que pase

author: reviews
synopsis: It's what it says on the tin, folks. Eighth year get together Drarry slow burn. May add on, may not.
title: And They Were Roommates

author: DJCJ
characters: Hermione G., OC, Harry P., Cho C.
synopsis: Hermione enters the tri-wizard tournament will she discover love? Dark secrets? Or something else? Femslash HG/OC
title: mischievous

author: spitfyre1
synopsis: So, I have been having mad ideas for stories, but couldn't really work on them at all. So I'm making a file for all of my ideas that are their, if you wish to use the stories for ideas of your own go ahead, I just ask for a link so I can read them. (Not necessarily all Harry Potter stories just to let you know)
title: Different ideas I had (up for adoption if you want

author: hayatin
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., Regulus B., OC
synopsis: Muggle-born Efa Hathaway only wanted to study in peace and graduate quietly. Unfortunately, fate had other plans. With the wizarding world enveloped in a catastrophic war, none would be left unscathed. [Regulus Black x OC]
title: Axioms

author: reviews
characters: [Luna L., Draco M.] [Ginny W., Harry P.]
synopsis: Luna finds out Draco is going to be put on trial for being a Death Eater and testifies on his behalf because, when she was imprisoned in Malfoy Manor, Draco was also a prisoner in his own home and they took comfort from each other in more ways than one. Canon-compliant
title: Moon in the Dragon's Cell

author: Usagi Lemons
synopsis: A curse plaques Hogwarts and Albus turn to a girl he keeps seeing in his dreams for help. In doing so she finds new friends and relationships. The problem is her past, why hadn't she gone to Hogwarts and why is she in the muggle world? Alex as her own plaques in her life that she must overcome, will these new relationships be what she needs to overcome her dark past? Isuckatsummery
title: New Beginnings - A Second Chance

author: sjmax
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Harry has defeated Voldemort and the tragic loss of life and destruction of Hogwarts is true to the original story, but the moment Voldemort ceases to exist, Harry momentarily loses consciousness and then it's my version of events. Harry wakes up, but there is something wrong with him...
title: After Voldemort

author: reviews
synopsis: Minerva McGonagall on Remembrance Day
title: Where Poppies Blow

author: JustanotherHPfanx
synopsis: Scorpius goes to an alternate universe with the use of a time turner to find that his best friend doesn't exist and his crush (Y/n) is the right hand woman to Voldemort. (based off of the cursed child)
title: The Hidden Love (ScorpiusxReader)

author: admonitio
synopsis: "They are my children," she said quietly, "and I would appreciate it if you left them out of it." He simply glared at her but she interrupted him. "I can't believe I actually thought we could get along. You're...a sad, mean man and that's all you'll ever be." Snamione. AU. Warning: language
title: The Baby Year

author: Lauralarios234
synopsis: It was the most ridiculous BILL ever; it brought an uproar in the wizarding world. No one saw it coming but with the second wizard war around the corner and their people decreasing by the minute, something must change. The ministry of Magic thought of every possible idea to save magic and only one seemed 'logical'. A test is taken by every wizard. . . a test to find their partners.
title: Unlikely Marriage

author: reviews
synopsis: After the war, Hermione and Harry open a home for magical children, most of whom have been abused, abandoned, or orphaned. These are stories from their little home. Warning: There will be mentions of abuse, abandonment, but nothing too in depth.
title: The Potter-Granger Home for Children

author: Tuka Luna Marceau
synopsis: BNHA x-over Fem!Harry She has no idea how she got here. But she'll survive. She always did! The Dursleys, yearly dangers in Hogwarts! And even going to a Killer Veil all for Sirius! But she ended up in Future Quirk-y Japan, a hole opening up and making her fall upside down and hit poor Eraserhead hard on the head upside down while doing Homeroom. Uhhh wrong turn in Albuquerque?
title: The Lost Ancestor

author: Nourliana
characters: Harry P., Neville L., Poppy P., Augusta L.
synopsis: Fin de Première Année. Harry Potter est à l'infirmerie. Il réalise alors qu'il y a plein de choses qu'il ne sait pas sur sa famille et sur le monde magique britannique. Peut-être qu'on lui a menti. Il se met à se poser des questions. Peut-il espérer mieux ? Peut-être trouver une famille ? À qui peut-il faire confiance ?
title: Et si Harry avait réfléchi (version longue)

author: NuclearNik
synopsis: Returning to Hogwarts to repeat his final year, Neville finds himself unexpectedly intrigued by Pansy Parkinson. *Written for The Slytherin Cabal's Wicked Witches of Hogwarts.*
title: Time Makes You Bolder

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione is moving into her lovers home where they can finally live together.
title: Moving In

author: NuclearNik
synopsis: Harry loses a bet and has to pay up.
title: A Little Tied Up

author: reviews
synopsis: When Harry and Hermione's first child is born, the joy they feel is dampened by the news they receive from the healers—their baby is plagued by an unknown ailment, likely a curse. Hermione will do anything to save her daughter. Even dabble in magic she'd be better off avoiding. *Written for Fairest's Freaky Spooktacular*
title: We Were Born Sick

author: reviews
characters: [Ginny W., Romilda V.] [Harry P., Ron W.]
synopsis: Romilda Vane vows that if she can't have Harry Potter than no one can. But when she takes things too far and utilizes a Weasley's Wizard Wheezes love potion will she find love? Or will she ruin not only her life but that of Harry Potter, and Ginny Weasley too? And why isn't Ron all that upset that Ginny dumped his best friend?
title: Love Potion Wedding

author: DarylDixon'sgirl1985
synopsis: Companion piece to Rodolphus's Mate can be read as a stand alone. Fenrir Greyback finds himself very attracted to young Rodolphus Lestrange. Attracted enough to want to make him his potential mate. But will Rodolphus accept his role as Fenrir's mate? Or will he reject Fenrir outright? And most of all could this be love?
title: Fenrir's Mate

author: reviews
synopsis: "Do you even like me Draco?"- "No, I don't like you Potter" - "What? I thought…" - "God, your so pathetic Potter. I don't like you because I love you, you dimwit." A Drarry Oneshot
title: That's Not What I Meant

author: reviews
synopsis: One-Shot. After Ron has left the trio, Harry and Hermione bond over the upcoming crisis.
title: Until the End

author: reviews
characters: James P., Lily Evans P., Voldemort, Bellatrix L.
synopsis: Est si Voldemort était devenu professeur de défense contre les forces du mal, mais était resté tout autant sadique et pro sang pur. A quoi aurait ressemblé ses cours ? Nous allons tout de suite répondre à cette question. Pour cela, allons au temps des maraudeurs. Et oui normalement personne n'est dans la même classe, mais chut c'est magique !
title: Le professeur le plus sombre

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry hires help at the coffee shop in Hogsmeade where he has worked as a barista since the fall of Voldemort. The young man he hires seems familiar. Somewhere along the way, Harry finds the courage to do what he's avoided for far too long.
title: Familiar

author: Thalia Alice Potter
synopsis: Après avoir été battu par son oncle une fois de plus, Harry, 8 ans, se réveille dans une chambre d’hôpital... mais il n’est pas seul. Qu’est-ce qui a bien pu pousser son oncle à appeler les secours ? Et pourquoi voit-il le fantôme d’une fille de son âge, alors qu’il a entendu sa tante répéter à plusieurs reprises à son cousin Dudley que les fantômes n’existent pas ?
title: Le retour de la dernière étoile

author: Xxdetective flameXx
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Ginny W., Draco M.
synopsis: This is a draary. Umbridge has taken over the school and people are not happy. Find out what will happen I own most characters.
title: New rules new romance

author: reviews
characters: [Luna L., Harry P.] Ginny W., Teddy L.
synopsis: The week before Christmas, Luna gets the news that she's expecting. Beyond elated and excited, she hatches some plans to break the news to Harry... with some markedly different results to what she expected. Sequel to my fic Satisfied Mind (reading it isn't necessary, but it helps) ONESHOT
title: Luna Lovegood and the Bun in the Oven

author: reviews
synopsis: At the Gryffindor versus Slytherin Quidditch match, Professor Harry Potter notices that his sons are very much like him. His youngest son cannot focus without his mum, while his eldest son shows off for his girlfriend. Really! What is it with Potters and their need for cheerleaders? ONESHOT.
title: Champ's Cheerleader

author: Jenn Villa
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Alguien que me salve de prejuicios y pesadillas. Alguien que me salve de la soledad y los temores. Alguien que me salve del auto-desprecio y de la culpa.
title: Somebody Save Me

author: Dalton Mars
synopsis: Harry Potter died that night along with his parents. People celebrated the Potters as heroes for defeating Voldemort. So what happens when Harry shows up as a first year student at Hogwarts? Things reveal themselves and so does Harry when things take an ugly turn. Trained, powerful and in complete control he will do whatever is necessary.
title: Unraveling

author: Wembly11
synopsis: Probablemente lo que menos se imagino que sucedería en su vida, era que fuera la única testigo de casi mataran a un detective. Y todo lo que eso conllevaría para su vida, incluyendo el no poder cumplir con su trabajo, estar custodiada por un guardia todo el día, todos los días, y que, además, el idiota pelirrojo fuera tan condenadamente… interesante.
title: El guardaespaldas

author: Wakai-wa-Sakka-to-Sozo
characters: Harry P., Draco M., Hermione G., Luna L.
synopsis: [2ÈME ANNÉE] Harry, Max, Michael, Hermione et Drago rentrent en 2ème année ! "La Chambre des Secrets a été ouverte. Ennemis de l'Héritier prenez Garde..." aux Nargoles ! [HUMOUR] crack!fic [...en cours...]
title: Livre 2 : Le Pouvoir de la Chambre

author: reviews
synopsis: He loved her long before Sirius fell in love with her too. He loved her so much she destroyed him. She was what eventually forced him to the road of darkness. Marauders era AU. SB/HG.
title: I Loved Her Too

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M., Ginny W.
synopsis: Warning: Dramone. Probably fluff. Shh
title: A long way to go

author: Hrymeigh
synopsis: Harry, Ron, and Hermione's actions at Gringotts have risked the fragile coexistence of Goblins and Wizards. If not handled properly by the Ministry of Magic, who is still recuperating from Death Eater control, this may have far more consequences than expected. Please review if you think this is interesting, or come up with ideas. I'm open to all genres, and story threads.
title: New Rebellion

author: AMSTUCKINTHECHIMNEY
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: After seeing Sirius transform, Ron decides that he too will become an Animagus. Will he manage to do it? What Animal will he be? And why is it so complicated?
title: Ron, the Animagus Extraordinaire

author: reviews
synopsis: Not everyone is happy that the Dark Lord married Harriet Potter, and some of them want revenge at the cost of innocent lives. Life brings a new change yet again for Tom. Two part mini series. Canon Divergence. Female Harry/Voldemort pairing.
title: Home at last

author: Zackos
synopsis: (Pille 100 mot suis content.) Amour, et jeu d'échec
title: Drabble

author: KZ55
characters: [Harry P., Hermione G., Fleur D., Pansy P.]
synopsis: Part 2 of my revised 'Robes of Green' series, featuring Slytherin!Harry. Fourth year has arrived, and with it comes new friendships, adventure, and danger — as expected. Features gradual H/Hr build-up, as well as some Harry/Pansy and Harry/Fleur. Not a mindless harem fic. No Dumbledore or Weasley bashing in here. Story starts immediately after the events of its predecessor.
title: Robes of Green, The Triwizard King
pairing: Harry P., Hermione G., Fleur D., Pansy P.

author: reviews
synopsis: Los pequeños ojos azules te ven con asombro, una débil esperanza brilla en sus pupilas. Todo es hermoso por un segundo. Sabes que has cambiado su futuro, los pálidos moretones en sus mejillas y brazos parecen desvanecerse ante la luz de su tímida sonrisa.
title: De destino y predicciones

author: reviews
synopsis: If Remus could just follow her philosophy and have her courage, this next step wouldn't be anywhere this difficult. Oneshot.
title: Ten Seconds of Bravery

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry is always thrilled to see Griphook when he visits Gringott's. Unfortunately for Harry, things are not always as they seem... One-Shot.
title: The One Where Harry Potter is Accidentally Super Racist

author: reviews
synopsis: After leaving an emotionally abusive long-term relationship with Draco Malfoy, Hermione Granger struggles to remember how to be herself once again. An experiment/sketch of the state of mind caused by emotional abuse and the healing process. Written for DFW's Never Apologising For Our Wild Nikita Gill Challenge in response to Gill's "The Way You Have Loved".
title: The Way They Leave

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Ginny W.
synopsis: It's November eleventh and both Harry and Hermione are missing. It's time for Ron and Ginny to learn why this day is so special.
title: Armistice Day

author: ritsuka10
synopsis: Harry y Luna vuelven a Londres para un importante evento, la boda del siglo se celebrará, cinco años atrás tuvieron que escapar del acoso de la empresa amarillista, es tiempo de volver a enfrentar a nuevos enemigos y recuperar a viejos amigos. HarryXLuna
title: Rewind

author: BornWolfgirl
synopsis: Ever wonder what in the world was going through Lucius' mind there towards the end there. Here are some thoughts on the subject.
title: Pure Thoughts

author: reviews
synopsis: Things started to change after the war. Suddenly, everything was sullen and duller and everyone was in need of encouragement. No one could tell how the writing in the wall came to be. Just that, every morning when the castle wakes, they would see a different set of words, and someone would feel like they were meant for them.
title: Hogwarts Support Group

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., James P., Severus S., Peter P.
synopsis: A canon-divergent one-shot in which Snape, Avery, and Mulciber discover Remus in the Shrieking Shack just as he transforms into a werewolf, and the other Marauders have to fight the Slytherins to protect their friend's secret. T for language.
title: Loony Got Caught, Black's Cock and Bulling

author: ElouiseRose
synopsis: It is the end of the war and Hermoine and others are heading back to Hogwarts to complete their 7th or for others their 8th year. What hidden and Unkown Confession comes to light for our Golden Girl? take and read and find out.

author: KRJ0792XX1
characters: Voldemort, Albus D., Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Tom Riddle became the Dark Lord Voldemort years before Harry Potter was born. But how did it all start? As an 11 year old with powers beyond measure, Tom Riddle enters Hogwarts and begins his new life as a wizard.
title: Voldemort: The Beginning

author: Lomonaaeren
characters: [Lucius M., Narcissa M.] Harry P., Draco M.
synopsis: LMNB, otherwise gen. Harry has learned that speaking in Parseltongue makes some people hate him and others fear him. He had not learned that it would make Draco go straight to his parents and tell them that he has reason to suspect "Harry Potter" is actually his missing twin brother. As far as Harry is concerned, life would be a lot better if he was the Heir of Slytherin. COMPLETE.
title: How Like Hatred

author: JadeSlytherin394
synopsis: As a small child, Remus' parents don't think to tell him things that he probably should know. That, or they don't want to acknowledge the truth. This is what happens when a four-year-old is terribly confused in a terrible situation. (nothing too graphic, just metaphors really)
title: Remus' Worst Day of His Life

author: QueenOfTheDreamers87
characters: [Tom R. Jr., Hermione G.] Voldemort, Abraxas M.
synopsis: Sequel to Revision and Rescript. Voldemort is the Dark Lord ascending, with time-travelling Hermione Granger by his side as the Dark Lady. But not everyone is thrilled about Voldemort's new vision for the wizarding world. When Odysseus Siegel makes a reappearance with a warning, Voldemort and Hermione are forced to draw from the other's courage and ambition. Tomione/Volmione.
title: Convict and Conscript

author: Tilthesunturnsblack
synopsis: This fic was inspired by the same lyric in The Highwomen song "Highwomen" as well as my love for all things HP. Set during the Salem Witch Trials of Colonial New England, Hermione Granger is a healer, and a witch, walking a tenuous tightrope, undercover in Puritan society. Semi-historical take. Rated M for violence and future Fleurmione.
title: Witchcraft in the Whispers

author: Drewyd
synopsis: [Translation] Snape/Hermione after war against Voldemort. Hermione looked at the illustration of her storybook: the Beast in his aggressive stance, claws ready, violent... and she thought of Snape.
title: Beauty and Beast

author: fnferjk
synopsis: Draco's quidditch tryouts.
title: Finding the Right Position

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco has left for the holidays leaving Harry alone with his thoughts. Ron is oblivious to what's been going on in his head. Will he be able to save his best friend from his own grief before he loses Harry forever to his mind...and his knife. TRIGGER WARNING: Self-Harm, be warned there is a lot of self-harm and some attempted suicide in this story
title: Blood and Grief

author: reviews
synopsis: Ginny comes home early to surprise Luna, but her girlfriend isn't alone in their bed...

author: reviews
synopsis: Rose Weasley knows a lot of things, but she doesn't know how everyone in her family can always be so sad and so happy. Oneshot.

author: reviews
synopsis: Comment se reconstruire quand toute votre vie vous a été dictée ? Comment se reconstruire grâce aux anciens ennemis ?

synopsis: James and Teddy have a fateful conversation after James graduates from Hogwarts.

title: Merde à la prophétie, je suis Lord Voldemort !

synopsis: Lily Luna Potter has a crush on her professor Draco Malfoy. What happens when he starts looking at the witch in a different way. What will her father, Harry, say about all of this? Nothing happens until Lily is 17, of age in the wizarding world.

author: reviews
synopsis: (Written by Claw #17) Hermione Granger's apprenticeship is at its end with Potions Master Severus Snape. She doesn't want it to be the end of them though. There be lemons ahead. Ahoy!

author: reviews
synopsis: It's not that Kingsley doesn't like watching the rain—he just doesn't like what it does to Sirius. Oneshot.

author: reviews
synopsis: The day of Ronald Weasley's birth, Molly Weasley was struck with an unknown Dark Curse by a Death Eater. The Healers at St. Mungo's saved Molly, but her son was almost dead. He miraculously survived, but at a great cost. Follow Ronald Bilius Weasley on his journey as the Cursed Child.

author: NeonDomino
synopsis: Remus hates Halloween - he hates being scared. When his teenage son runs off into a Haunted House, he has no choice but to follow, even when pursued by ghosts and whatever else the place contains. He's doing it for Teddy. Single father!AU / Muggle!AU / Omegaverse and MPreg (in future chapters). For Raybe

author: reviews
synopsis: In the middle of the war, one man seizes the chance to be good. In an effort to pay for his past mistakes, he turns the tide of the war in his favor and hopes to have a chance at redemption. Prequel to upcoming story Letters to My Beloved. Future Dramione.

author: avis1765
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Minerva M.
synopsis: Hermione Granger grows up thinking she's a regular girl, until one day a school project turns everything in her life upside down, a woman she's never met shows up with a letter, and she's told she made of... magic? That's just the beginning...

author: reviews
synopsis: Orchestrating this date has involved countless logistics, but Ted's thought of everything down to the clothes. Oneshot.

author: reviews
synopsis: Theo and Draco come home to Hermione ready to work for extra credit. Tags: Multi, No Slash, PWP, Smut

pairing: Theodore N., Draco M., Hermione G.

author: reviews
synopsis: When Charlie finds issue with the location of his bedroom, he goes in search of other options. Tags: Praise kink, PWP, Dirty Talk

author: reviews
synopsis: Something is drawing Pansy Parkinson towards Harry Potter. And while she can't describe it, she needs to be near to him, even if it means risking encounters with creatures of the night. Written for FotR FFS Comp. Winner Admin Favorite - MidnightChardonnay Tags: Vampire, Smut,
title: New Blood

author: Nova5621
characters: [Hermione G., Harry P.] Ron W., Sirius B.
synopsis: Relationships. Work-Life. Finding yourself? Growing up and being an actual adult isn't always what it's cut out to be. You try your best or make your friends spend the night at your house to complain about it. From no-show tosser boyfriends to stressful and life-threatening career choices, Hermione and Harry walk, run, and stumble through and over the hurdles that is their 20s.

author: reviews
synopsis: It is 1998. The Battle of Hogwarts is finally over and Albus Dumbledore has finally come out of the shadows. His hiding days are over, but his heart is still aching deeply. Will he be able to fix his heart by finding the woman he has always loved? This is a short MMAD story.

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Voldemort, Narcissa M.
synopsis: Coincée dans son vitrail et sa solitude, la Sirène de la salle de bain ne rêve que d'une chose : s'enfuir, sans toutefois savoir comment s'y prendre. Elle décide alors d'observer les humains pour tâcher d'avoir une réponse à sa question. Et certains en particulier vont retenir son attention...
title: Petite sirène voulait s'enfuir

author: bjilydp7
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: Su destino era tan frágil que parecía estar tejido con hilos de cristal. Es curioso como las almas más pérdidas resultan ser siempre las mejores guías. Y aunque nunca sabrían lo importantes que fueron, cambiaron el curso del mundo mágico. No se sabe cuando empezó este viaje confuso y trámbolico, lleno de subidas y bajadas. Pero si se conoce un final con sabor agridulce.
title: Hilos de Cristal

author: Sra. Lovegood
synopsis: Draco sempre foi terrível nos feitiços de aquecimento. Mas não há problema, ele tem sua própria fonte de calor agora.

author: reviews
synopsis: Blaise Zambini is a famous model used to getting everything he wants. Will an encounter with Romilda Vane, who doesn't care about his looks, change things for him?

characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Ginny W.
synopsis: The war is over and Ginny returns to school, but it isn't easy to pretend like everything is the same as before. [sequel to 'all your fumble words']

author: reviews
synopsis: Aquí cuento la rutina diaria de Alice Longbottom en San Mungo
title: La rutina de Alice Longbottom

author: JammyWammy
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.

But drowning with ambition, also a haunting past and present, what would become of him? Joining Slytherin house was only the beginning.

Can be read alone, but exists as a prequel to my fic "A Trio of Tricksters: Eclipse the Past, Usurp the Future" and a companion to my story "Celestial Messengers."

author: reviews
synopsis: "toi tu vas commencer quelque chose avec Ron et la vie va... -Continuer ? avais-je couiné.  -Oui continuer. C'est ce qu'il faut.  -Mais moi, je n'ai pas envie que la vie continue comme avant. Je veux... Je veux rester avec toi..."

The stranger's farewell words direct the young Black's life to a thorny path from which there will be no return. How will Sirius manage the roles he chose but never wanted? Who is the powerful witch?

synopsis: It's amazing how much writing a politely-worded letter can get you. [Oneshot.]

synopsis: They first met during the Great War and he formed a bit of a crush on the elusive woman. They met again during his training as an Auror and it was her turn to be awed by him. Now their paths have become intricately entangled as the world between Muggles and Wizards grows ever thinner in light of Grindlewald's efforts to destroy all of life as they know it. Thes/OC slowburn
title: Exasperating Females and the Trials of Theseus Scamander

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Blaise Z.] Ron W., Hermione G.

This is a parody of the song, "I Don't Need Booze To Get A Buzz On," by, Alan Jackson.

title: Eva Guerrero and The Philosopher’s Stone

synopsis: Porque los dioses romanos tenían dones, y Draco tenía algunos de ellos.

synopsis: Three American are order to go to Hogwarts to be watched over after a mishap in Great Britain. Their adventure in Hogwarts as they have to blend in

No. Especially since Theo forgot to make Draco not telling Hermione a condition of the bet... This is eighth year Hogwarts, fake-relationship fun and entirely POV Draco. Part of Dramione Fanfiction Writers' Tropefest 2019

characters: Albus S. P., Lily Luna P., Rose W., Scorpius M.

characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Luna L.
synopsis: Harry's getting married to Luna? Ron's proposing to Hermione? Professor Lockhart is getting married to somebody he doesn't know? This won't end well.

synopsis: "The shadows slid around him, unforgiving, and dragged him under. In the darkness there was a small pinprick of light, but only a pinprick, and it remained steady." SSHG. Edited and re-uploaded. Strong trigger warning: child and spousal abuse, mentions of spousal rape, language, self-harm, and adult situations. Updates every Saturday.

synopsis: Cat Wither is just an eleven year old boy - except his parents call him Katy and a disagreeable man dressed all in grey appears on his doorstep one morning to deliver the news that he has a place at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Mostly OCs navigating magic and gender in the contemporary wizarding world (disregarding the entire plot of The Cursed Child, forgive me).

synopsis: An unintended side effect of the protection lily potter used sends her to another world, after 11 years she finally manages to make it home. Possibly some light bashing of some characters, but not taken to extremes

synopsis: Quand les Malfoy adoptent le dernier des Potter ils l'élèvent selon la tradition des sangs-purs dans une société sorcière encore plongé dans les préjugés, la discrimination, mais surtout meurtris par les atrocités de la guerre. Et où être libre de choisir, pour un nom comme le sien, n'est que utopie. Harry fera-t-il les bons choix ? Quitte à perdre ce qu'il a de plus cher au monde.

author: reviews
characters: N. Tonks, Kingsley S., Rufus S., J. Dawlish
synopsis: Tonks goes to work and encounters her file, problems with organization, clumsiness, and a plant. Implied RLNT. February OoTP (yes, I know I skipped two months, you'll see why in the next fic, I promise!).

author: GraceEliz

A lot of fluff and smut in the later chapters. Oh and obiviously all characters belong to J.K. Rowling!

synopsis: Rufus Scrimgeour is the best Auror the department has ever seen, all he needs is a little bit of respect.

author: reviews
synopsis: Umbrige gets memorized by the beings she used to despise and it ends up sometimes beauty is only skin deep.

author: reviews
synopsis: Show me your scar and I'll show you mine. This is a chance meeting between Harry, Ron, and a Hufflepuff student. Harry learns a small snippet about his past and gets his first warning of the pending fate.

characters: [Harry P., Severus S.] [Ron W., Hermione G.]
synopsis: As a nice distraction from the impending battle, they play games. One evening they decide to play Dares. Snape becomes a very unwilling participant. Through Dares, the truth comes out. Snape and Harry have a secret. Will they be able to tell everyone the truth? With Sirius at Snape's throat and a madman after Harry, it doesn't seem likely. Full summary & warnings inside.
title: Dare to Tell the Truth

author: reviews
synopsis: Mai 1998 - Voldemort n'est plus et ses partisans sont aussitôt envoyés à Azkaban. Dans les heures qui suivent, le ministère s'employa à juger les mangemorts en une série de procès expéditifs.
title: Le dernier baiser du détraqueur

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Ginny W.] Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: They really were lively together. Fun, carefree drabble.

author: NicoleLulu
synopsis: Most witches and wizards think Harry Potter is an only child and so totally alone after his parents death. But that's not true. Born in secret, Harry actually has a younger sibling. With no great prophecy hanging over her head and overshadowed by her brother, what part will she play in this magical world they were suddenly thrust into by a giant?
title: The littlest Potter

author: Waddiwasi95
synopsis: If you're Harry Potter, you have to watch your mouth when you speak publicly. Otherwise the words that were said for effect can get you to the threshold of dangerous adventures and into the heart of someone else's terrible secrets and your death for someone the only acceptable way to solve a problem. Author: o.volya. Translator: waddiwasi. Beta readers: echomcl, petite vie.

author: KatarinaBlack17
characters: Hermione G., Draco M., Narcissa M.
synopsis: Two years after the War in which both Harry and Voldemort had died, the new ruler is Draco Malfoy, who is known for his ruthlessness and finesse in leading Purebloods. Muggleborns are in a tough position, but it gets worse when the Marriage Law is passed to prevent infertility and inbreeding. How will Hermione cope with being chosen to marry the most powerful man in Britain?

author: LegendDairy
synopsis: It's been a few years now after the war and Grimmauld Place needs to get some renovations before the depressing dump just completely drives its two occupants over the deep end. How luck that in this AU WWW does not stand for Weasley Wizard Wheeze, but is in fact the perfect company for the renovation job. Hinny.

Draco Malfoy wurde nach 3 Jahren aus Askaban entlassen und soll die nächsten 2 Jahren auf Bewährung und ohne Zauberstab in der Muggelwelt leben. Er ist ein gebrochener junger Mann, traumatisiert vom Krieg. Das Ministerium weist ihm eine Wohnung im gleichen Haus zu, das auch Harry bewohnt.

synopsis: Fem harry potter animagus

synopsis: Leo Black is back at Hogwarts for another year, more prepared than ever to face the onslaught of challenges that would soon come his way. As he navigates through dangers more deadly than he has ever faced before, Leo must come to terms with everything he did at the end of his first year, a feat that may prove impossible, even for him. Sequel to 'Lionheart'. Rest of Summary in Ch 1.

synopsis: OS. Harry est à l'infirmerie à la fin de sa première année. Il réalise qu'il y a plein de choses qu'il ne sait pas sur sa famille et le monde magique. Peut-être qu'on lui a menti. Que faire ?

synopsis: Luna has a crush on Ron Weasley. Ron is oblivious. Ginny is in between.

Mais tant pis, si ça permettait son bonheur à elle, il voulait bien endurer la pire des souffrances. HGDM.

SB/OC Chapter3: "You didn't care who scratched your itch as long as it was a Black, right?"

synopsis: Nobody told Harry that dying and losing part of your sould would leave such a mssive hole behind, even if it was Voldemort's. And nobody told him that killing Voldemort was just a step for much harder to reach target.

She wants a child to love, he needs an heir to the Malfoy fortune before it's too late.

After all, Harry may not know it, but he's Hermione's best friend. As she takes up the DADA post, "Jean Watson" is not going to let anything happen to him-or any of her friends for that matter.

OP Harry, Harem and Morgana decent Will begin like the books but will change fast

author: reviews
synopsis: GWLL. When Luna gets her article on the Exploding Beezings rejected from The International Journal of Magical Zoology, Ginny offers to help her edit it. Learning about Luna wasn't the point of the exercise, but Ginny's glad it happened anyway. COMPLETE.
title: Gifts From the Exploding Beezings

author: Leiria
synopsis: Once, while on the hunt for Horcruxes, Hermione asked Harry if he ever thought about throwing in the towel and staying there. Growing old. He didn't tell her how perfect the thought of growing old with her in that forest really was that day, but now, a week before her wedding and three years after the fact, Harry uses some liquid courage to tell Hermione how he feels.
title: Better Late Than Never

author: megaflash
synopsis: Some Halloweens are more memorable than others

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione seeks some emotional healing post-War. One shot scene between Hermione and her healer. Pairing is Hermione-Ron, and he is discussed, but he does not make a physical appearance in this one.

synopsis: After the war, Lupin needs a hobby, and solving case seems like just the thing! Little does he know, this next case will bring him back to Hogwarts...

author: reviews
synopsis: Lila didn't want to marry Charlie. Lila didn't want his kids, his dragons, his power, or his protection. And she definitely didn't want to fall for him. She just wanted her own life. A/N: My spin on the Marriage Law prompt.

author: reviews
characters: [Hermione G., Tom R. Jr.] Voldemort, Dolores U.
synopsis: "I was more than ready to take the helm of the wizarding world, Hermione, but I am not ready to put my little girl on a train and send her off to school, no." Hermione's eyes went wet and shone. She nodded and said in a thick voice, "Good." One-shot to accompany All The Wrong Choices. Tomione/Volmione.

synopsis: Harry Potter was raised by a wealthy, neglectful and abusive family. He finds out that he was adopted and in fact a wizard after receiving an invitation to 'Hogwarts University' at the age of 18. What if the mark of the Dark Lord implanted a different, malevolent characteristic in the tormented Boy Who Lived? What if Harry was placed in Slytherin and befriended Draco Malfoy?

author: reviews
synopsis: I wrote this at spoonpoint. Please send help.

synopsis: When Draco Malfoy wakes up on his 18th birthday with wings and claws, he fears he's turned into the very thing people accuse him of being: a monster. Upon his return to Hogwarts, an inexplicable bond with Ginny Weasley provokes his transformations. Together they will explore the limits of Draco's abilities and discover that in order to fly...sometimes you have to learn how to fall.

characters: [Voldemort, Tom R. Jr.] Harry P., Peter P.
synopsis: Harry Potter never worked out the location of the Chamber of Secrets, which means that Tom Riddle, after fifty years of living as a small book, finally has free rein to do everything he ever wanted and more.

But it is a tenuous plan that rests on an unknown, crucial factor: Draco Malfoy. (Angsty Dramione).

author: reviews
synopsis: Había pasado el verano escabulléndose para verla, el colegio era algo complicado en esos momentos a causa del régimen de Voldemort, no le quedaba más que esperar a que San Potter derrotara al Que-No-Debería-Ser-Nombrado para que pudiera respirar tranquilo. Este one shot forma parte del Drinny-Con 2019, organizado este año por la página de facebook "Drinny All The Way".

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione and Draco see eye to eye, if only for a moment... (one shot)

They fall in love anyway. Part of "On Firebrands".

synopsis: Había muchas formas de conectar a dos personas, pero la forma en la que ellos lo hicieron, fue en un simple baile que habían compartido hacía unos años atrás. Este one shot es parte del evento anual Drinny-Con 2019.

synopsis: "I was drunk off firewhisky, that's basically like being another person" "You still snogged him, sober or not. His tongue was down your throat. How can you live with that stupid decision?" "You know what, Wood? The same way I'm gonna have to live with this stupid one" I said before grabbing his smug face in my hands and smashing my lips against his.

Lord Voldemort / Tom Riddle x Harry Potter

author: reviews
synopsis: "You know what this scar means. What I am. We might have been able to pretend in front of Ron that this is not what we think it is, but Ron is not here anymore." Harry and Hermione finally confront their situation after being abandoned by their best friend when they needed him the most.

Und doch lebte sie immer weiter mit der ständigen Angst. Angst um ihre Familie... Ihr ging es nicht um Macht und doch... Updates jeden Samstag, bis ich keine Kapitel mehr habe.

author: reviews

How can she choose between the life that was ripped from her, and the life she made for herself as a result? It seems the boundaries of magic itself must be tested if Hermione's to save anyone, anything, or anywhere at all. Remione. RLHG. EWE. SEQUEL.

Hermione is the smartest person in any room at any given time, Hariel will never be "just Hariel" and Ronald admits to himself that he's nothing special, and he's okay with that. This changes everything, and together take the world by storm, until they're at the very top.

synopsis: Harry decides to turn Dudley into a pig and things take an unexpected turn.

Ex-Auror Bellatrix Black has no int
title: An Unspeakable Investigation

author: The Cynical Prince
synopsis: Whatever power Harry Potter was supposed to have over Voldemort nobody ever found out. He died at the second battle of Hogwarts, and the world fell to ruin. synopsis: Harry has learned most things in life change for better or worse. But the most important ones stay the same.

synopsis: Harry and Luna have started forming a relationship, but things get confusing when Ron overhears Harry saying he loves Hermione.

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco draws professionally. Harry needs a drawing to please his girlfriend. What happens when emotions overshadow the task at hand? In which Draco isn't quite ordinary and Harry doesn't care.

author: reviews
synopsis: Evangeline Sinclair had it all. She was beautiful, she came from a wealthy, pureblooded family and she enjoyed the rivalry with her ex-best friend, Draco Malfoy. But when the Dark Lord rises and her father wants to hand her over to him, her entire world shatters. Everything she thought she knew has been turned upside down and she's desperate to hold onto anything real.
title: Fractured Darkness

author: immortalsorcerer
synopsis: Takes place after the Cursed Child. Hermione Granger decides that being the Minister of Magic is not good for her. She tries to get out, but it's not simple. There are forces who want to prevent that from ever happening and they will do all they can to stop her.

author: reviews
synopsis: Iba a demostrarle a todo el mundo que podía lograr lo que se propusiera, y nada mejor que un buen vestido para hacerlo. Este one shot es parte del Drinny-Con 2019, organizado este año por la página de Facebook Drinny All The Way.
title: Dress

author: SugarcaneSoldier
synopsis: A collection of stories based on Harry choosing different names for his children and the circumstances surrounding their choices. Inspired by other people's text posts and my own ideas.
title: Alternative Designations

author: FizzBomb02xox
synopsis: A year after Voldemort was defeated, a breakout of an illness could signify the beginning of a threat they all hoped had gone forever. Can Fred, George and Bea stop it before the entire wizarding population is wiped out? All rights to the Queen that is JKR. Bianca is my only character.
title: Child of Death- Book 2

author: CompletelyDone
synopsis: A story of the tables that sit between Rose and Scorpius and the relationship that blooms across them. Multi-Chap.
title: Across the Table

author: Ninjasnowflake
synopsis: Draco is sick of Potter always being the root of his problems, so he decides to do something about it. It backlashes on him and he ends up wanting more than Potter might be willing to give. In which Draco does things to Harry he probably shouldn't. I originally wanted it to be a one-shot, but if anyone wants more please do tell me.
title: Driven by instinct

author: everlovingdeer
synopsis: "What?" I eventually asked with a sigh, knowing I hadn't gotten the answer wrong. "Lysander?" "Nothing," he assured me, grabbing the parchment of questions. He looked over it with vague disinterest, looking like he was going to ask me another question. But then, he set the parchment aside and sat up properly. Abruptly, he asked, "What do you think of my brother?"
title: Familial Connection

author: ainnablack
synopsis: El horrocrux dentro de Harry comienza a manifestarse poco a poco, Hermione es la única amiga que le queda y no dudará en aprovecharse de ella.

author: reviews
synopsis: Maximus Donovan Stone has always known what he wanted to do in his life. Protecting children has always been the plan, the goal. When life throws a curve-ball into those plans, will he continue to be a protector? What role do his father and brother play in who Maximus will become? Origin story for Fenrir Greyback written for the Houses Competition Forum.
title: What's in a Name?

author: reviews
characters: Draco M., Tom R. Jr., Daphne G.
synopsis: Une nouvelle élève à Poudlard en même temps qu'Harry Potter. Répartie à Serpentard, quel camp finira-t-elle par choisir ?

author: KeepSmiling1
characters: Harry P., Albus D., Luna L., Salazar S.
synopsis: Bad weather has been blamed on magical creatures for centuries, but the worst maelstroms experienced by merfolk can be almost exclusively blamed on wizards. Written for the Houses Competition Year 6
title: Merfolk and Maelstroms By Luna Scamander

author: reviews
characters: Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: A fanfiction homage to a horror classic.
title: Just Desserts

author: Andromeda Khun
synopsis: Ginny Weasley desperately needs a miracle. However, unless her powers of prophecy work on a pumpkin, she will need a different way to get her miracle.
title: The Deal with the Devils

author: The Lonely Wolf Needs A Star
synopsis: Sirius wakes up only to find the bed empty and Remus plotting against him. Fluff (cover by cynopoe on tumblr)

author: Izzy Bennet
synopsis: Scorpius (a proud Gryffindor) and his sister Cassiopeia (an even prouder Slytherin) have an ordinary life. Well, as ordinary as life can be in their final years of Hogwarts, that is. And to complete the madness that is Hogwarts, hormones and house pride, Scorpius's friend Albus Potter causes Cassiopeia to lose sleep- just because he's a jerk? Life really is a Malfoy Madness!
title: A Malfoy Madness

author: Anla'shok
characters: James P., Lily Evans P., Voldemort, Alastor M.
synopsis: 1978-1981: the years where everything ugly in the Wizarding Isles stopped lurking in the shadows and revealed itself for all to see. The years when terror paralyzed all but a cluster of indomitable British and Irish mages. Lily/James and the story of how they defied the Dark Lord three times. We know how it ends, but by Merlin's dashing cloak, it's a worthy tale.
title: Defiant Until the End

author: Anarchist's Lullaby
synopsis: It starts with an article misquoting Fred, leading to his discovery of Witch Weekly's biennial List of Most Eligible Bachelors (and the fact that he is considered one of them) and general wizarding journalism, particularly tabloids, Fred undertakes two missions: 1. Become the MOST Eligible Bachelor on the list. 2. Cause as much journalistic chaos as possible.
title: Furore

author: Slytherins'Finest
synopsis: It was a project. Her final project. And Malfoy would be her subject. Why not? She was only temporary. His pain would be worth it, right?
title: Release

author: hurrian-hymn
synopsis: "She takes a deep breath, fighting the uncontrollable urge to curse him off his feet. If looks can kill, she knows he would not be standing so arrogantly in front of her right now." A collection of Tomione one-shots in which Hermione Granger and Tom Riddle are academic rivals before anything else.
title: Bad Impressions

author: Mansi jain
synopsis: Something had happened after the battle, something that angered Hogwarts so much that it refused to let anyone stay in the castle. After Hogwarts almost killed a group of seventh year gryffindors- Full summary inside. Fem!HP/MaleDM and MaleHP/MaleDM. Warning for non-con groping, touching and kissing, hugging. Multiple POVs. 2 Harry and 2 Draco of different dimensions. Angry Castle
title: Red Beauty in the Shadows

author: Bren Gail
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Sirius B., Draco M.
synopsis: An ancient law is amended to create the legal opportunity for the Ministry of Magic to sell Muggleborns under the guise of a marriage law. Sirius buys Hermione to protect her. While researching to appeal the law, Hermione and Sirius uncover long kept family secrets of the Sacred 28 and the Ministry of Magic. Some secrets are worth more dead. Romance. Mystery. Adventure.
title: Purchased Purity

author: Sxarlin
synopsis: Remus est père depuis 8 ans déjà. Comment annoncer à sa fille que sa naissance était le plan d'une folle ? Harry se retrouve célibataire avec un fils de 4 ans, détesté par sa mère et plutôt perturbé. Peut-il sauver son fils de la noirceur qui semble l'avaler ? L'amour peut-il sauver ces deux enfants ?
title: Nés dans la haine

author: Helen Nicked Lupin
characters: Remus L., N. Tonks, Andromeda T., Teddy L.
synopsis: Los sanadores no fueron capaces de llegar a ninguna conclusión respecto a si la licantropia se podia heredar o no. Teddy no lo era, pero quizas otros futuros hijos si. Y esa incertidumbre estaba minando poco a poco la relación entre ellos. No podian seguir así, necesitaban seguridad, aunque el precio fuera más alto. AU post RM. RL/NT, Teddy, Andrómeda. COMPLETA.
title: Por un bien mayor

author: AcrilycDragon
synopsis: Harry no está obsesionado con Malfoy. Para nada. Él simplemente sabe que trama algo y está dispuesto a hacer lo que sea para averiguar el qué. El problema viene cuando él mismo se envuelto con el rubio en el plan definitivo del señor tenebroso para ganar la guerra: jugar con el tiempo. Aunque tal vez no le desagrade demasiado lo que le depara el futuro...

author: reviews
synopsis: Everyone wants to reach their happy ending, in this life or the next. After everything he has endured, Severus finally gets the second chance he wanted, the chance to undo one mistake, but which? With the help of a mysterious spirit with her own agenda, he has the chance to see worlds that could have been his own, but will that be enough to save him from his worst enemy: himself?

synopsis: Ron has sometimes been referred to as jealous of Harry's fame. Fortunately, he's got a very easy way to get a whole lot of it. Moderate Crackiness.

OOC and sexual content warnings. Perhaps there will even be some lesbian parrings. Draco, Ron, Snape bashing (thats what they deserve anyway). Starts at the trainstation in Harrys first year.

Alongside the Order of the Phoenix, they struggle against the dark forces which have claimed the lives of their friends and against their own past, which can't stay buried forever. AU.

If it is her, then why is her age shifting from day to day? What is her new secret? Why does she have a new tattoo on her back? What is truly going on with the witch who was gone for six years?

Bianca and Aury must figure out who it is and stop them before they realize their evil scheme.

author: reviews
synopsis: No hay nada que estar esperando, con la incertidumbre carcomiendo tus pensamientos ¿y si él no era suficiente para ella? Entonces ella no llegaría. Este drabble forma parte del Drinny-Con 2019, organizado este año por la página de facebook "Drinny All The Way".

synopsis: [Ange Phoenix] Selon Ron, la meilleure invention était le déni. Mais de toute évidence, ce n'était pas le cas pour sa femme qui l'obligea à aller voir son meilleur ami qui n'était plus sorti de son mutisme depuis la fin de la guerre. [FOF]

Qu'avez-vous donc fait du vrai Élu, Harry Potter ? Où se trouve-t-il à présent ?Au vu du sort que vous lui avez réservé, je pense qu'il ne verra rien de mal à venir me rejoindre! Séquelle de Création des liens

author: reviews
synopsis: Ginny se había arrepentido al último momento, mientras corría por las calles de Londres siendo un espectáculo para locales como turistas, se acercaba cada vez más a la verdadera felicidad. Este Drabble es parte del Drinny-Con 2019, organizado este año por la página de Facebook Drinny All The Way.

author: OctavCat
synopsis: Une fanfic de fanfic : Ellana-san, j'ai tellement adoré ton histoire Les Cicatrices du Temps que j'ai eu cette scène dans la tête. C'est réduit aux dialogues entre Harry, Sirius et Remus. Univers appartenant à JK Rowling, la fanfic Cicatrices du Temps à Ellana-San.

synopsis: a fluffy one shot of Viktor and Hermione in autumn

synopsis: Traduction - Severus Rogue est attentif au bien-être de ses élèves, et à leur fournir une éducation de qualité. Et comme Dumbledore ne lui procure pas les ressources dont il a besoin, il se tourne vers d'autres alliés pour demander leur aide. Une exploration de ce qui AURAIT pu se passer pendant la deuxième année de Harry (Lisez d'abord le Professeur de Potions de Poudlard).

synopsis: A new DADA professor arrives and she shares her vision of the world with her students. A collection of one-shots about what happens when someone with different thought process teaches at Hogwarts.

author: reviews
synopsis: Lord Voldemort has won, but he is not content. He determines to go back in time and do it all again - to gain the victory he deserves rather than the one life handed him - and this time, he won't be alone. Master of Death Voldemort. Time Travel. HP/LV HP/TMR

author: OctavCat
synopsis: Petite fantaisie : un mécanisme permet aux élèves de Poudlard de voir ce qu’ils veulent via des hologrammes, comme un film. Harry assiste à une partie de l’enfance du Maître des Potions, souhaitant ne jamais en avoir conscience. Univers à JK Rowling

synopsis: Ce qui aurait pu se passer si Quirell avait tenté de faire tomber Harry de son balai alors que Snape était arbitre. Univers à JK Rowling

synopsis: Todos aprendemos de nuestros errores, la diferencia es el tiempo en el que lo hacemos. ¡Un buen estudiante debe ser buena persona primero!

author: OctavCat
synopsis: Le suicide de Severus Snape à sa sixième année. Univers de JK Rowling

characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Aqui podreis conocer las aventuras que ocurren en la habitación de Hermione. Relatos cortos e intensos.

author: reviews
synopsis: A quick little idea that shot up in my head about a universe where Neville somehow gets sent in the past, meets his parents... and assists the Marauders’ era, the fight towards Snape. This fanfic focuses on... the scene in Snape’s Worst Memory. Not a full story. Universe to JK Rowling

author: Angela-MG

author: WhatIfHP
synopsis: When Voldemort attacked the Potters in Godric Hollow on Halloween, he gave Harry more than just Parseltongue. He gave him his brain. How will this affect Harry and his mates? Will Harry be Slytherin after all? What will Harry's opinions be?

characters: OC, Lily Luna P., Hugo W.
synopsis: Andie, Lily et Hugo viennent de débuter leur 4ème année à Poudlard. Un jour qu'ils travaillent à la bibliothèque, un voyage dans le temps aussi imprévu que incroyable boulverse leur plans...
title: Mission Dortonwood

author: WhitherWinds
synopsis: Harry Potter has always thought that he was the only one left of his family. That was until Sirius' words in the Shrieking Shack opened a possibility. Meanwhile, in a Wizarding Russia drenched in bloody conflict, a letter has called back a Crow to the nest from whence it hatched. Families will meet and connect, seeking to understand whether there is weight in blood that is shared.

author: reviews
synopsis: Una boda a la que no desea asistir, y un acompañante que le desagrada totalmente ¿o no? Este one shot es parte del Drinny-Con 2019, organizado este año por la página de Facebook Drinny All The Way.
title: Té de Menta

author: reviews
synopsis: Series of One shot ideas that are aimed at giving authors who look for new plots in Harry Potter.

author: reviews
synopsis: Fenrir is not a liar, no matter what the nurses and Doctor say. One day, he'll prove it to them. A short stand-alone sequel/ follow up to 'Saving the Wolf.'

synopsis: No one ever expected Draco Malfoy's boggart to be Harry claiming that he wouldn't ever love him, least of all not the aforementioned boy. Third-year HPDM.

author: Roger23
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Parvati P.
synopsis: During the summer after his fourth year, after Uncle Vernon beats Harry, the only thing that keeps him going is thinking about Hermione's kiss at the train station. But once the authorities intervene, he is sent to live among the Muggles, where he learns about life and love. But will this help him win Hermione's heart? Or will Voldemort strike first?

author: vis00
synopsis: What if the event that forged the golden trio went wrong, as it so easily could have? Strong and not stupid Harry Potter. No bashing. A more mature, gray Harry.

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry caressait doucement les cheveux de Draco, souples et parfumés. Ça l'apaisait. Il avait pour habitude, quand il n'arrivait pas à trouver le sommeil, et s'il était assez calme, qu'il se raconte des histoires jusqu'à ce que le récit se poursuive sans qu'il ne soit plus conscient. Comment ils en étaient arrivés là ? [Collectif NoName : Un bonbon ou un sort ? 2019]

author: reviews
synopsis: Venez voir le premier Halloween de Gabriel avec ses parents. OS en lien avec la série : Whatever I want et I don't know what to do !

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Minerva M.
synopsis: Finalement Ombrage qui veux vérifier ce qui est enseigner aux élèves n'a peut-être pas tord. Juste que c'est en métamorphose et non en Défense Contre les Forces du Mal que les élèves apprennent à se débarrasser des cadavres...
title: TRADUCTION: Tueurs en série en formation

author: smithandbarrowman
synopsis: In the wizarding world, it has long been assumed that men are Alphas and women are Omegas. When Hermione Granger discovers that assumptions are rarely factual, her status as one of only a handful of female Alphas that has ever existed has men falling at her feet. But there's only one man she wants, and like the male Alphas before her, the hunt is on until he bears her mark.

author: wallyflower
synopsis: A disgraced Draco Malfoy lives a quiet life in disguise, unable to face the wizarding world and those harmed by the Death-Eaters. He might even be starting to enjoy his exile, until the brighest witch of her age comes into his sleepy university town and takes away what little peace he has found.
title: By No More Storms

author: reviews
synopsis: Un rapprochement inattendu. Une attaque inattendue. Trois mots pour marquer une âme.

author: reviews
synopsis: After finding out the news about the prophecy, all Lily can do is go sit in the garden—and all James can do is try to comfort her. Oneshot. Happy Halloween.

author: sovimo
synopsis: Pendant leur chasse aux horcruxes de Voldemort, le trio en or est convoqué par l'Ordre du Phénix à son quartier général parce qu'ils ont capturé l'infâme Draco Malfoy. Bien que à moitié fou et tourmenté par ses expériences, Draco a en sa possession quelque chose qui appartenait autrefois à Hermione Granger. Seulement, elle peut le parler et peut être le sortir de sa folie.

author: mnbvcxz-xx
synopsis: Ever since Sirius Black befriended the Marauders, he seemed to get into all sorts of trouble. Each year he seemed to find more creative ways to get cursed or injured, which made Marabel Greengrass became the unofficial Marauder's designated healer by default. Sirius/OC. Oneshot.

author: reviews
synopsis: It was the Halloween five years after the Wizarding War. This year Harry did something different. This year, he wanted to visit his parents grave alone. But, did he really want to be alone? Was he the only one who wanted to visit the graveyard on this fateful day?

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Tom Riddle ha probado el poder, el conocimiento, el sexo y nada lo satisface. Quiere desesperadamente saber si hay algo más en este mundo o en otro. Leve crossover con Hellraiser

synopsis: Hermione Granger would do anything to pool the donation for S.P.E.W., but was it always worth it? Written for the assignment#7 for Hogwarts School of Witchcraft & Wizardry Forum Beta by Angel

synopsis: Harry and Tom have been fighting for 20 or so years, almost ending the world trying to destroy each other. When they end each other though, they have a little chat, wondering what it would have been like if they could have changed it for the better. being the Master of death gives them a chance at Redemption. Fem!Harry, AU, Eventual Lemon. Grey!Harry, DUMBle!Bashing.

author: reviews
synopsis: James wakes up in a well, dark, cold, disoriented. But he's not alone.
title: The Well

author: reviews
synopsis: It's yet another Halloween, but rather than feeling down about his parents, Harry has so much to look forward to. He knows they would understand.

author: reviews
synopsis: At the last minute Ron tries to repair his friendship with Hermione. Marriage Law.

author: reviews
synopsis: The memories of war slipped away, the residual trauma of loss was healed, and the bonds once thought broken were resealed. The brothers were reunited. Finally.

author: God's Muse
characters: [Ron W., Hermione G.] [Harry P., Ginny W.]
synopsis: Harry, Ron, Hermione, and Ginny never knew the horror, suspense, or mystery they'd find embarking on their 6th year at Hogwarts. They couldn't know that the Hogwarts Express would be attacked before term even started. And how could they guess that by Halloween, Voldemort would try and capture Ron and Hermione for his greatest ritual yet on the Isle of Drear...
title: Harry Potter and the Isle of Drear

author: reviews
synopsis: Scorpius asks Rose on a date, but of course she turns him down. But the way he looked at her when she said no tugs on her mind. Maybe pity is a start. Drabble, Scorpius/Rose. Please review!

synopsis: Being reborn into Harry Potter is hard enough, can someone tell me why I'm a female knock off of the protagonist?

synopsis: "I raced through soundcheck just to meet you..." They have to fall apart, fall back together, and find themselves somewhere in the middle. Muggle/Rock Band AU, Second Chance Romance

author: reviews
synopsis: One shot of a night spent between Narcissa and the Dark Lord

author: onlyjavel
synopsis: When you pass through that door, you will be judged by five powerful mages. Mages who have been chosen and imbued with a portion of the ancient power the founders had at the disposal. Should you be found unworthy you will be sent away and never again welcomed within these halls. If you are judged worthy you will be brought in and taught magic like nothing you have ever experienced

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry is feeling lost after Hermione is Petrified, but he finds the healing he needs from an unexpected source: Professor McGonagall, who is feeling every bit as lost and alone as he is. Together, they confront their fears and find the hope they thought they had lost. Sequel to "Gift of Gratitude."

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Severus S.] Lily Evans P.

synopsis: When Professor Slughorn thwarts Draco's attempt to brew Polyjuice Potion for 'extra credit' by partnering him with Harry for assistance, things couldn't have gone any worse for them and their history of botching brews. - — Gift for secretfanficlover

characters: Harry P., Severus S., Eileen P.

synopsis: Taking a nosedive into the SuperCarlinBrothers Theory of the same name, this story tells the stories implied or inferred by Jon Carlin in the video. One-Shot. synopsis: Tonight, on All Hallows' Eve, Harry and Hermione will make their annual trip to Godric's Hollow and find comfort in each other's arms

author: reviews
synopsis: Oneshot! At age 11, he was annoyed by her ability to capture his attention. At age 14 he had fantasies about her. At age 17, he realised his physical attraction involved something akin to feelings... but he also knew he could never have her. So, at age 21, he hired her... Just to have her in his life in some capacity. But now, age 27, she is about to switch jobs. And so, he asks.
title: And so, he asks

author: reviews
synopsis: "Wow," Harry whispered to himself. "Is that you? Am I feeling your heart beating?" He was looking into her eyes now and she nodded. "I feel yours too" The words came out on a breath.

author: reviews
synopsis: UA - Depuis le collège, Harry et Draco forment le plus beau couple de Poudlard. Un jour, l'un des deux amoureux meurt et tandis que l'autre tente de se reconstruire les choses s'enchaînent très vite... Et vous vous croyez-vous au fil rouge de la destinée ? Enfin la question devrait plutôt être croirez-vous encore à ce fil après avoir lu cette histoire terrifiante ?
title: Le fil rouge de la destinée

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ginny W., Albus S. P.
synopsis: A Halloween one-shot in tribute of October 31st 1981. Harry reminisces, Albus is curious and James and Lily are proud.

characters: Gabrielle D., OC, Olympe M., Morgana
synopsis: Mauvais Augure, la Légion et le Cercle d'Argent ont tous échoué à mettre fin à la prophétie de l'Opus Tenebræ. Le plus puissant des ducs infernaux, Gamaliël, a tout détruit en provoquant une guerre civile entre moldus et sorciers. Dix ans plus tard, Mathis et quelques survivants cherchent désespérément la seule issue possible : retrouver et tuer le démon. (Multivers Parfum-Potter)

characters: Harry P., Draco M., Scorpius M.
synopsis: UA - Avez vous déjà entendu parler de Hachishakusama ou la femme de Huit pieds de haut ? Non... Eh ben cette histoire va tout vous expliquer... après tout c'est mon histoire... - HPDM
title: La légende de Hachishakusama

author: reviews
characters: [Fenrir G., Rodolphus L.] [Bellatrix L., Lily Evans P.]
synopsis: It is said that when a werewolf finds their mate, much like a penguin, they mate for life. But what no one ever tells you is that the chosen mate is automatically the Omega. Rodolphus Lestrange has kept his and his partner's, Fenrir Greyback, lifestyle a secret. But sooner or later it will come out. It always does. Omegaverse!AU.
title: Rodolphus's Mate

author: Murai-Sakura
synopsis: SEQUEL to The Potions Journeyman. Harry decides he doesn't want to be an Auror anymore but rather a Potions Master and will need Snape's supervision to become just that. He creates a potion that will allow him to speak with the dead, which doesn't bode well for Snape's internalized struggle. And then there's the stray Death Eater's. Mentor story. No slash.

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco Malfoy becomes an alcoholic, when Luna tells him she wants to have a school reunion, he decides to help her, and finds out that he could have had what he wanted all along.

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry asks Hermione to attend the annual Potter Halloween party. With nothing else to do, she reluctantly agrees and assumes it'll be like any other get-together. [cross posted on AO3]

author: reviews
synopsis: When Hermione gets caught up in playing an old Slytherin Halloween game, she finds herself teaming up with Draco Malfoy to evade capture until Midnight. But as the old saying goes: strange things happen on Halloween.

synopsis: How different would the story of Harry Potter be if Draco Malfoy had been a secret friend, all those years at Hogwarts, to Hermione Granger?
