author: Mrs.Drusilla
synopsis: Cassiopeia Black(OC), resignada sangre pura, es obligada asistir a Hogwarts. Ahí conoce a Severus Snape, un alumno brillante, incomprendido y tan taciturno como ella. Ambos inician un enigmático juego de miradas y roces que los conducirá a mucho más que el anhelado contacto físico, sino que a descubrir en ellos el amor que ambos creían ser incapaces de volver a sentir. *Clasif. T-M
title: Mon amour, enséñame a amar

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: [Os] " Il ne se souvenait que vaguement du soir où cette tradition avait commencé. C'était Lily qui, spontanément, avait placé la première photographie. Et elle avait continué, chaque fois qu'un de leurs amis était tombé." Dans la nuit du 31 octobre 1981, une nouvelle photographie s'ajoute à celles où les visages de ceux qui sont déjà tombé sourient encore.
title: Ad vitam aeternam

author: Docteur Citrouille
synopsis: Septembre 1981 : Maggie Fox est une heureuse petite sorcière lorsqu'elle reçoit sa lettre d'admission pour la célèbre école de sorcellerie Poudlard. Cependant, lors de la Cérémonie de Répartition, son nom n'est pas annoncé. Y'a t-il eu une erreur? Pourtant, Maggie sait qu'elle y a sa place, même si la Nécromancie est la branche la plus obscure de la Magie Noire...
title: La Symphonie du Corbeau

author: DaisyCloud
characters: Harry P., Andromeda T., Teddy L.
synopsis: Teddy celebrates Halloween with Harry and Andromeda. A out look after the war.

author: reviews
synopsis: 'And you're slowly falling in love with him, free falling like a skydiver, and you wonder if it's called falling in love because you don't get to decide when you stop.' / Lily and James, as they fall in love.

author: PBO
synopsis: An 8-part mystery starring four young wizarding students battling the spirits of villainous witches and wizards they accidentally unleash from Chocolate Frog Cards. Part 1 of the Wizarding School Mystery series.

author: reviews
synopsis: Not all rescues are heroic. — A Halloween submission written for The Houses Competition, Year 5, Round 6
title: Moonchilde

synopsis: Kreattur veille. Chaque jour, il s'occupe de sa pauvre maîtresse Walburga. Et chaque jour naissent un peu plus de fantômes.

synopsis: En Halloween pueden pasar las cosas más locas como, por ejemplo, que termines practicando magia por una galleta.

author: TigresseOtaku
synopsis: Par une nuit de pleine lune, un petit garçon se fait attaquer par ce qui semble être un animal enragé. L'affaire est vite oublié mais très vite les sorciers se rendent compte que ce n'est pas finit, alors qu'ils étaient sur d'avoir réglé le problème. Et si l'animal le plus dangereux n'était pas celui qu'on croit
title: lune sanguine

author: reviews
characters: Ginny W., Luna L., Colin C.
synopsis: Ginny struggles with the aftermath of the events in CoS. Trigger warning for fairly graphic cutting/self-harm.

author: reviews
synopsis: Best Smut Winner for H&Co's Halloween Writing Challenge. Runner-up for Comedy Genius. Harry Potter and Hermione Granger have a lot of Halloween Traditions together as the best of friends. A birthday dare and a Jack-o-lantern finally opens Harry's eyes to understand the truth about his feelings for Hermione in the most unexpected way. ONESHOT.
title: The Hottest Jack-o-Lantern

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Severus S., Ginny W.
synopsis: His style is gothic. I question all the things he finds interesting. I find him interesting. All it took was one look.

author: Sandungera
synopsis: Natsumi is the absolute apple of Lily Evans' eye. Her best friend. Her confidant. Her light in the darkness. And Lily's going to keep it that way. Damn the consequences. [Yandere, OOC, Dark Themes, Slow Burn, Canon Divergent, Commissioned Fic, Monthly Updates]
title: And I would be the one (to hold you down)

author: reviews
characters: George W., Fred W., Gideon P., Fabian P.
synopsis: It's the day were candies and pranks walk hand in hand and some twins are going to enjoy this day!

author: ulil.olala
synopsis: Setelah lima tahun menghilang, Harry dikejutkan dengan perintah kementrian untuk mengawasi Malfoy sebagai asisten pribadinya. Jarak pernikahannya dengan Ginny semakin dekat, namun hubungan rahasianya dengan Malfoy delapan tahun lalu—mulai menghantui Harry lagi. [HarryxFem!Draco] [Multichapter]

author: ontzilore
characters: Lily Evans P., Severus S., OC
synopsis: ¿Qué hubiera sido del destino de Severus Snape, del de Hogwarts, del de todo el mundo mágico, si él se hubiera decidido a realizar un simple y tímido gesto en una dirección que nadie sospechaba podría tener tales consecuencias? Segunda parte, la primera se titula "El Año de la Revolución. A la Tercera va la Vencida" y la tercera "El Año de la Revolución. La Maduración del Fruto"
title: El Año de la Revolución II El Descubrimiento de la Amistad

author: lorbie05
synopsis: What happens when Hermione Can't find the hat for her Halloween costume? *** There was a naughty little picture posted in the Restricted Section facebook group, and it put this little plunny in my head. It's just a little one shot.. :)

author: reviews
synopsis: After Fred wakes up as ghost, he decides that he needs to put Peeves in his place once and for all and show him who is the most legendary prankster Hogwarts has ever seen

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco is struggling to sleep because his husband is keeping him awake.

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco embraces his dark side as a task from Voldemort gives him (more) reson to take teasing to a whole different level when it comes to his favorite mudblood. Will Hermione break or will she be strong enough to resist him? And in the end, will she even want to resist Draco? Set at the beginning of HBP, this is a dark adult-themed story with an intense and at times disturbing mood.
title: Fifty shades of green and silver, scarlet and gold

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Ginny W.
synopsis: Harry pensó que todo iba segun lo planeado, pero ¿qué pasaría si después de todo sus sentimientos hacia Ginny no eran reales?¿y si despues de todo no habia amor?. Posible Harmione y tal vez un poco de Dark Harry...
title: El que busca, encuentra¿y luego?

author: SCM3543
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Narcissa M.
synopsis: Both Dumbledore and Voldemort underestimated just how powerful Lily's sacrifice for Harry really was. There was nothing she wouldn't do to ensure her son had a life full of the love and happiness he deserves. She'd make sure of it. "The power of love is a great thing. Terrifying. But great." Harry!Harem Harry/Multi, Genderbent!Voldemort, and lemons.

author: Justin52
synopsis: Memories are tricky things. Sometimes, they cause us to lose nights of sleep. Sometimes, they bring light to darkness. Sometimes, they change the course of destiny. Set after the events of Fourth year. Follow Harry Potter as he finds his way across his strange problems, his notoriety and of course, the resurrected dark lord trying to kill him. AU. Powerful! Harry, Harry/Daphne.

author: Unown1224
synopsis: we all know that Harry died towards the end of Deathly Hallows and meets Dumble-dork. But what if at the end of their discussion a shadowy figure appears and proceeds to tell Harry about all the things Dumble-dork has done to the poor boy... and AU of an Evil Dumbledore and a Master of Death Harry...Slytherin!Harry Manipulative!Dumbledore Manipulative!Weasleys...NOT A CROSSOVER

author: Dani Valdez

Je vous propose de plonger dans les pensées de chaque personne côtoyant de près ou de loin le couple le plus controversé du Monde des Sorciers.

Just a fluffy story with some humour, friendship, a little romance, and mostly in character

Does Harry want power or family? Or is family, power?

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Cormac M.
synopsis: Sequel to Lurking In The Shadows. Creature Harry Story. Hermione is having a hard time focusing at work as she fantasizes about her fiance. Unbeknownst to her, Cormac McLaggen is also finding it hard to concentrate because of her presence. As the mate of an Incubus, Hermione discovers how aggressively protective her fiance could be. ONESHOT.
title: Shelter From The Shadows

author: reviews
synopsis: Au lendemain de la guerre qui a sévi dans le monde magique, les jeunes sorciers de la génération d'Harry Potter retentent l'expérience de Poudlard pour effectuer une nouvelle septième année. Dans le lot, nos sorciers favoris : Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, et tant d'autres... Mais surtout Hermione Granger, et contre attente Draco Malfoy. Comment soigner de telles blessures ?
title: Il faut bien un début à tout

author: thejilyship
characters: [James P., Lily Evans P.] Sirius B., Mary M.
synopsis: With only a month until she's set to take the throne of Gryffindor, Lily is informed that she'll have to get married before then or chose to give up her throne. She never thought she'd have to even entertain the idea of an arranged marriage. Enter James Potter.
title: Let Me Love You

author: Iminesia
characters: [Draco M., Hermione G.] Harry P., Ron W.
synopsis: Two unlikely souls make a unique connection through a shared memory that neither of them can explain. Diving headfirst into the secrets that bind them, they resurface having bitten off a lot more than they can chew. When faced with unfathomable dangers, they must make a choice: sever the bind and stay alive, or risk everything to cherish even just one more second together.
title: Worship the Flame

author: reviews
synopsis: A KingsleyHarry emergency services!AU. Paramedic Kingsley finds himself drawn to the dark-haired, green-eyed man he helps save. For Bex. Warning: mentions of blood.
title: We Found Love (In a Hopeless Place)

author: reviews
synopsis: Universo Alternativo. One-Shot. Um novo semestre começou na escola, mas a única coisa que James tinha na cabeça era a garota nova.
title: Ruiva

author: reviews
synopsis: In celebration of Alterations gaining over 500 favorites and followers, I am presenting a teaser chapter to a related story that follows Alterations, Harry Potter and the Agents of Fate. This story includes adult erotica, so be warned. It takes place right after the Battle of Hogwarts. While in the world beyond (the Veil), Harry has found he has much to do to keep his fate true.
title: Harry Potter and the Agents of Fate

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Severus S., Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Amidst the stresses of his fifth school year, the horcrux within Harry begins to become sentient; its intentions unclear but possessiveness evident. Consequently, things take a dark turn as Halloween approaches.
title: Halloween

author: Nargled
synopsis: One of two ideas I had for Fudge's trial. Needs some tinkering, but I need to get something posted, it's been too long. This time Luna gets to shine.
title: Fudge's Trial

author: Izzy
synopsis: Series of Harry/Luna drabbles written in 2004 and 2005 for various livejournal community prompts.
title: Walks Through Hogwarts

author: demigod ravenclaw
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., OC
synopsis: Harry was used to people knowing who he was- he wasn't used to knowing them too. I DON'T OWN THIS SERIES!
title: Sprinting

author: Aristocles Prionsa
characters: Draco M., Harry P., L. Moon, Lily Luna P.
synopsis: Sencillamente una explicación al por qué el nombre de Lily Luna que surgió en una noche de invierno
title: Lily Luna Potter

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Voldemort, Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Harry est un tatoueur sous le règne du Seigneur des ténèbres, Tom voulait juste passer inaperçu pour une grosse pièce.
title: Encre et magie

author: HP Slash Luv
synopsis: After Ariana is killed, Gellert deals with what that means for him. Told from Gellert's point of view.
title: Sorry Isn't Enough

author: MrsHufflepuffMS
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Minerva M., OC
synopsis: Athena Potter, thinks she is an ordinary girl - until one day she is rescued by a tall stern looking woman who takes Athena home with her and shows her what family really means. This is an alternative reality story, which shows how a female Harry causes events to turn out differently. However, some events are fixed in time. Pairings later Warning possible fem/slash. (Female Power)
title: Athena Potter

author: reviews
characters: Draco M., Lucius M., Narcissa M., Kreacher
synopsis: Narcissa has sat alone in Malfoy Manor while her husband is in prison and her son is off on a suicide mission. She sits and she waits and she dares her hands not to shake. Soon, she grows sick of waiting. Narcissa had been a Black once and she still is; her marriage did not take that from her. Perhaps it is time that someone of the Black family shakes the foundations of the world.
title: Unleashing the Magic in her Veins

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Luna L., Parvati P., Daphne G.
synopsis: If Harry Potter thinks that he gets a chance to go hilariously bonkers and not take Luna Lovegood with him, he's got Another Thing Comin! Cue Judas Priest guitar riff!
title: Groundhog Harry 2: Luna's Ecclectic Boogaloo

author: reviews
synopsis: Oneshot; a look at Dumbledore's Army ten years after the Battle of Hogwarts. Written in article format; for the NEWS challenge on the Golden Snitch Fanfiction Forum.
title: Dumbledore's Army: 10 Years Later

author: dear-lovely
synopsis: Draco doesn't know how to deal with his demons. With the support from his late mother and an unexpected visitor, he tries to do better.
title: The Privilege Is Mine

author: wen.portatil
characters: Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Es difícil recuperar la confianza que perdí. Pero será aún más duro, si no recupero a las personas que perdí por ti. Inspirado en la canción de Kanny García - Para volver a amar. Publicado originalmente en el 2011
title: ¿Podré amar de nuevo? AU

author: reviews
synopsis: A year post-war, Dudley seeks to make amends. one shot.
title: Amends

author: Jetainia
synopsis: Before Salazar Slytherin, before Hogwarts, there was just Helga and Aaron.
title: Aaron's Legacy

author: reviews
synopsis: The curse cast by Voldemort failed but instead of being destroyed, he was reduced to an infant with no memories of his previous life. He ends up living with the very boy he intended to kill and grows alongside him. As they start Hogwarts and learn magic, they begin to encounter things that don't make sense. The question is, do they want to know the answers?
title: One Cannot Live Without the Other: Book 1

author: MidnightEmrys
synopsis: There will come a time when we all must choose a side. When your friends start getting married and your classmates start dying. Eventually there will be a rebellion. Every rebellion needs a leader. A leader of both light and dark. She wears the mask of a snake, and dress robes made from the tears of the hungry. And from the streets of Pompeii, she watched the world burn.
title: The Rowan Rebellion

author: NicoDiAngeloLover7
synopsis: What if Harry never remembered going to the Graveyard and witnessing Voldemort being resurrected, Dumbledore is the one claiming Voldemort's return. And he's the reason why the Ministry is running his name through the mud. What will that mean for the war? This will be slash (M/M), don't like. Don't read. I don't own anything, all rights go to J.K Rowling. 3-Shot!
title: Trials of the Misguided

author: BarelyAWriter
synopsis: SSXHG - following Hermione from the start of her 4th year. Dumbledore has requested that she begins to privately tutor Harry so he can better prepare himself for the upcoming war. If she uses her time-turner she might just be able to find the time to make this work, and with the guidance of Snape she may even be able to pull it off. Slow burn. Eventual Marriage Law during 6th Year.
title: Let Me Protect You

author: B. Weasley
characters: Hermione G., Fred W., George W., Katie B.
synopsis: Halloween is coming and certain redhead twins have a tradition of carving pumpkins.
title: Pumpkin heads and smiling faces

author: Erza Robin
synopsis: Cela fait dix ans que la guerre est terminée. Dix ans que nous essayons tous de mener une vie ordinaire, ponctuée de cauchemars et d'insomnies. Nous avions cru pouvoir avoir la vie que nous méritions. Mais quelqu'un semblait s'amuser avec notre passé. Ce fut le signe que nous n'en avions pas fini. Nous étions nés pour nous battre. Peut être étions nous nés pour mourir en bataillant
title: La Descendante de Serpentard

author: Avethanis
synopsis: Désirant la paix, il a fuit le monde sorcier. Maintenant, des années plus tard, une petite fille et deux détraqueurs viennent bouleverser son isolement. Maintenant qu'il est retrouvé, il doit faire face à son passé tout en protégeant ceux dont il est responsable.
title: Le Gardien et son domaine

author: Kaoru Black
synopsis: Cuatro historias en homenaje a cuatro personas que ya no están. Esta historia participa en el reto #40: Día de los Muertos del foro Hogwarts a través de los años.
title: Se honra a

author: reviews
synopsis: (AU/Harco) Draco Malfoy había sido elegido como la siguiente Reina de Picas, la marca real en su piel era el único comprobante requerido para probarlo.
title: Naipes

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco Malfoy is not a morning person.
title: I'm Awake Now

author: reviews
synopsis: These students were not similar in any way; a group that did not seem to have anything in common, nothing at all that would give them a reason to meet up at the crack of dawn on Christmas Day of all days. Except, there was a similarity between each student.
title: The Christmas Club

author: Les Kinagies
characters: [Harry P., Draco M., Severus S.] Lucius M.
synopsis: [Ange Phoenix] Le QG et Poudlard avaient été envahis par les mangemorts. Ce fut ainsi que tous les membres de l'ordre se retrouvèrent en plein milieu de la nuit à toquer à la porte du 4 Privet Drive sans se douter que leur vision du survivant changerait du tout au tout.
title: Entre Guerre et Chasse
pairing: Harry P., Draco M., Severus S.

author: reviews
synopsis: Summary: Una dulce melodía se extiende por aquel oscuro pasillo del castillo. ¿Quién es la dueña de aquella melodiosa voz? [Fictober, Dia 11]
title: Beautiful Melody

author: Lili76
synopsis: Les années ont passé. Voldemort est mort, la guerre est terminée depuis bien longtemps. Désormais, les héros d'autrefois ont fait leurs vies. Harry voit ses fils entrer à Poudlard, bien qu'il soit pris par son métier d'Auror. Il avait rêvé sa vie autrement, mais peut être que cette nouvelle année scolaire lui apportera la prise de conscience nécessaire pour enfin changer de vie.
title: If You Dare 5

author: Tessa01
synopsis: ADAPTAÇÃO. Aos 17 anos, Hermione Granger tornou-se noiva de James Potter, Marquês de Granville um dos mais promissores diplomatas da Inglaterra. Oito anos depois, ainda esperando o casamento, Hermione já tinha herdado um castelo, tinha amadurecido e não estava mais disposta a ser a piada da cidade. Ela estava decidida a romper o noivado. Bom... Isso se Harry permitir.
title: Diga sim ao Marquês

author: AnonymousPandaWriter
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: After losing everything in the future after the Battle of Hogwarts the Golden Trio decide to create a new life without Voldemort and his Death Eaters. Doing this they give up any connection to the future that they have. However, they may have overlooked one thing when creating this plan, Voldemort was attending Hogwarts in the 1940s
title: To Rewrite A Story

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco gets turned into a cat, and assuming it was Harry he goes to his nemesis to confront him, finding out something a lot worse than a prank was going on.
title: Superstitions

author: Spock99
synopsis: Albus Dumbledore, the most powerful wizard of his age, messed up. His plans for becoming a ghost after his death were well thought of. But apparently not quite as well thought through. The headmaster sees how strange becoming a ghost can be.
title: Easier said than done

author: secretfanficlover
synopsis: Lily finds herself moving in across the hallway from her childhood friend Bellatrix, but a jealous roommate is intent on getting between them just as love begins to blossom.
title: My Doll

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Luna L., Pansy P.
synopsis: Summary: Quizás debería dejar que le leyeran nuevamente la fortuna [Fictober, Dia 10]
title: Fortuna

author: JustBored21
synopsis: This is just any and all 1 shots I may write. They are not intended to be brilliant or even good, they are just ideas that I may have. Some I may turn into stories in the future, others I may just write for the hell of it. These are just random ideas from my mind
title: 1-shots

author: reviews
synopsis: A reunion thrown by a quirky Ravenclaw brought all those from the older classes of the years from the war back together in one room. Though he had not intended to come, in the end the temptation was too great for the Malfoy heir. His expectations were dashed when a shadow of his past tried to lure him back to darkness and an unexpected savior intervened!
title: Dare to Hope

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry loves time spent with the Weasley family, but he's most fond of his time with one in particular. Post Deathly Hallows Harry/Ginny one-shot. Fluff.
title: Marcid

author: FanFicKawaiiness
synopsis: Draco meet Hermione in slythrien territory.He learns a serect and uses it agasint her.But what happens when he falls in love?
title: Backfired

author: reviews
synopsis: Remus would get married in a heartbeat if he knew of a place where that kind of love belonged. Oneshot.
title: Who We Belong To

author: 3Seat
synopsis: Transfer Student Alexandra Grainger is a student athlete and comes to Hogwarts to complete her final year of magical education after transfering from Durmstrang in Harry s 4th year. She doesn t take part in the Triwizard Tournament but still manages to grab the attention of the students. Follow the story of the GoF from a different perspective.
title: Wizards can do muggle sports too

author: reviews
synopsis: Hogwarts isn't only a place of learning for our heroes: as they reach adulthood, carnal urges, unexplored desires, and the mess of emotions that come with them will consume our beloved characters in this hot and steamy story.
title: Lessons in Temptation

author: reviews
synopsis: It's the 5 year Hogwarts Reunion. Hermione hasn't seen her friends for 3 years, she has a secret that she has not yet told them about, which may involve a certain blonde... Dramione One Shot. Rated M just in case.
title: Hogwarts Reunion One Shot

author: jina-the-gemini
synopsis: I feel like I stared him in the eye for too long now. Scientists say the average eye contact is only 3 to 4 seconds. I quickly look down and dust off my skirt. "Thank you, for uh helping me, Oliver, and-" I look around to where the, now fallen, stack of books ones stood. "-helping me," I add grimacing. Not really knowing how to phrase it anymore. Oliver Wood X OC
title: Sparks

author: DoreaSnape
synopsis: Four years ago, all the doors were closed on him. Four years ago, he was reminded of all what he was worth. Four years ago, he lost his home. Four years later for his sick daughter, he ran towards those closed doors. Crushing his hurt and hate away, he begged for his Zoey's life to be saved.! Warning: Mentions of Mpreg, AU.
title: His Companion

author: reviews
characters: Minerva M., Colin C., Sorting Hat
synopsis: Colin Creevy has a very distracted bit of conversation during his Sorting Ceremony during his first year. One the Sorting Hat will never easily forget.
title: Sorting Colin Creevy

author: LegilimensKbzd
synopsis: Daphné, sans contacts, elle est pâle et froide. Elle dit que ça ne la dérange pas, qu'elle n'a jamais eu besoin de personne de toute manière et qu'elle sait bien que ça me plairait, de pouvoir la ramasser, de la voir s'éparpiller.
title: Daphné

author: reviews
synopsis: Things don't go as planned when Hermione indrudeces her new boyfriend to the Weasly family. Will her friends be able to overcome their prejudice? Or will they lose her forever?
title: Beneath the Surface

author: reviews
synopsis: Il tremble. Il ne peut plus s'arrêter. Et tous ces objets, il ne laissera personne les jeter. Ces inconnus, avec leurs mains glacées, ils vont tout salir, ils vont tout détruire.
title: Cédric

author: Izzy
synopsis: Post OotP drabble written in honor of my grandmother.
title: A Year Later

author: SfoCrazy
synopsis: Harry Potter is a loner. He has a power he can't control but he slowly learns to use.
title: Whoops

author: reviews
synopsis: Lilas Evans, la sœur jumelle de Lily, ressent la mort de sa sœur et après s'être remise du choc, elle rentre en Angleterre pour s'occuper de son neveu. Peu importe qui se dressera sur son chemin. Ou avec qui elle devra s'allier, même Lord Voldemort en personne, tant qu'elle peut protéger Harry et lui permettre de vivre vieux. Grey Harry. Manipulative Dumbledore. Good Dark Side.
title: L'amour d'une sœur

author: NotSoSirius92
synopsis: The first time he saw her, she was in his 1st year Potions Class, and he remembered thinking that she was the prettiest thing he'd ever seen. Written for Sing Me A Rare - Volume 3. Winner of Admin Fave and Best Use of Song! A big thanks to my Alpha KickyNikki and Beta Katalina Riddle. Song- Ain't No Sunshine by Bill Withers
title: Matches

author: reviews
characters: [Hermione G., Draco M.] Harry P., Ron W.
synopsis: "Now is not the time for dramatics, Malfoy. We have a crisis on our hands!" Harry gestures wildly with a butter knife as Ron nods solemnly next to him. A crisis indeed.
title: We Have A Crisis

author: reviews
synopsis: Prompt: An uncommonly hot spring day has arrived in the U.K. We'd be crazy not to take advantage of the great outdoors, wouldn't we? ...A chance encounter between two unlikely people sets their souls on fire. The weather wasn't the only thing that was hot... A response to HP Drizzle Fest 2019
title: Tropic Of Virgo

author: reviews
synopsis: Luna and Hermione have become closer friends in the years since leaving Hogwarts. Oneshot. Complete.
title: The Spare Bedroom

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione Granger and Draco Malfoy hate each other. But fate had other plans in mind... Winner of Beyond The Books "Restricted Section Comp" for best Erotica
title: Unexpected Encounters

author: reviews
synopsis: "The question that drives me hazy: Am I or the others crazy" - Albert Einstein "What are you afraid of?" he asked her again, gently. The words escaped her lips in a soft whisper, but still, the impact they made was deafening. "Everything." A response to Fairest of the Rares Sing Me a Rare Volume 4.
title: The Weight of Words

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco's response to Hermione's list of seven reasons why she hates (or tries to hate) him. Sequel to 'Seven Reasons Why I Hate You'. DMHG, ONESHOT
title: Seven Reasons Why You Hate Me

author: Alana Dunne
synopsis: La competición está a la vuelta de la esquina. No solo deben seguir compitiendo entre casas, sino que, ahora, también hay alumnos de Ilvermorny. La batalla de las casas se ha intensificado y todo ha cambiado. Es hora de dejar atrás algunas rivalidades. Es hora de ponerse en pie de guerra porque Howarts siempre fue la mejor escuela de Magia y Hechicería pero... ¿lo seguirá siendo?
title: Entre leones y serpientes

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Draco M., Daphne G.
synopsis: A short that takes place at the end of the 2nd year in the common room. If Harry is supposed to be cunning, he should do what he can to strip his enemies of their power as soon as he can.
title: Harry In Slytherin One Shot

author: raienetta
characters: Draco M., Lucius M., Voldemort, Narcissa M.
synopsis: One-shot written for the IWSC. Draco realises why Voldemort loves using the cruciatus curse.
title: Slight Remarks

author: reviews
synopsis: A kiss at new years or more?
title: New Years

author: ArtemisJackson1205
synopsis: Harry Potter was never a normal child. He always made strange things happen around him, like the time he set Dudley's pants on fire, and the other time when he magically appeared on his school's roof! One day Uncle Vernon realizes that he could just stuff Harry in his cupboard with a few books and let him be. On hiatus, though I will get back to it soon. Sorry.
title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's stone (Of course, my version of it)

author: reviews
synopsis: "It's been like…like something out of someone else's life these last few weeks with you. But I can't…we can't…I've got to do things alone now." Before all that, Harry takes Ginny to the Shrieking Shack, because not all adventures involve death. One-shot.
title: Hold, Fall, Break

author: reviews
synopsis: Dramione War Fic; "This is a war Hermione, not a god damn Arithmancy test!"
title: When the Fallen Rise

author: Yosoyeli
synopsis: A EWE story or redemption and forgiveness. Trying to give Hermione the kind of attention and treatment she deserves. She will be courted properly. She finally realizes her relationship with Ron is full of resentments and low key aggression. Meanwhile, Draco has the opportunity to repent and apologize.
title: Muggle Magic

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry Potter, the British Daredevil, will retire from Quidditch soon. As he prepares for his Quibbler interview, he uses pictures to recall highlights of his life after the war. As he thinks of an answer to this question, 'As the British Daredevil, you seem fearless. So, we want to know, what are you afraid of Harry Potter', he looks back on how truly blessed he is. ONESHOT.
title: The Daredevil's Fears

author: reviews
synopsis: That incident by the lake changed everything - Severus Snape does not exist anymore.
title: SEIR

author: reviews
synopsis: A short piece on the different house's eyes.
title: Eyes of houses

author: squishychickies
synopsis: Harry Potter has a complicated plot that requires complicated potions. Fortunately, Draco Malfoy is very good at those. In other words: Harry is a worse potions-maker than ever, Draco has mastered the art of pranking, and neither of them quite know what they're doing until they're doing it. An eighth year story.
title: Expiration Invalidation

author: reviews
synopsis: Para entender y saber como murieron sus padres, Harry quiere que Hermione saque ese recuerdo de su mente y puedan verlo.. Hermione acepta y juntos ven ese triste recuerdo..
title: Recuerdo (Harry-Hermione)

author: harmionespast
synopsis: Hermione Granger is tasked by Dumbledore to befriend Tom Riddle, but what if he had more than friendship on his mind?
title: A Mysterious Thing, Time

author: adeadlife44
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Neville L.
synopsis: AU: Harry has his world turned upside down when he is taken from the Dursleys. Vernon and Petunia will spend five-years in prison for child abuse and neglect. Harry struggles through his new life at a boarding school for military bound boys. Harry struggles to fight his demons and learn about magic when he is brought into the wizarding world three years later at the age of eleven.
title: Book 1: Harry Potter and the Choices that Matter

author: Naoko Ichigo
synopsis: Draco Malfoy siente una extraña obsesión por Hermione Granger. Lo cual es riesgoso, ya que él tiene un siniestro y oscuro secreto. Si se acerca demasiado, ella podría descubrirlo. Dark-fic.
title: Retorcido

author: fizzybubbles13
characters: Remus L., N. Tonks, Molly W.
synopsis: Tonks and Lupin break up, due to his insecurities (break up fight not included, sorry drama loving folk). Molly plays matchmaker. RLNT.
title: Purple and Grey: 5

author: mayghaen17
synopsis: The first time had come out of nowhere. There had been nothing; no build up, not so much as a single word to indicate that it was even a possibility. The second time was a surprise simply because there was one. Every time after that blurred together. / Eighth Year.
title: Out of Nowhere

author: reviews
synopsis: Su relación no lleva etiquetas, simplemente no pueden clasificarla. Mi participación para la actividad organizada por Cristy 1994.
title: ¿Odio o amor?

author: reviews
synopsis: [Ange Phoenix] Ce n'était plus la joie ou la colère qui brillait dans leurs yeux, c'était le désespoir. Le désespoir de devoir faire quelque chose d'impardonnable pour survivre. Le désespoir de se faire du mal, de gâcher une querelle d'enfant et de la transformer en quelque chose de douloureux. Après tout... ils n'étaient que des enfants... des enfants qui devaient grandir.
title: Devoir de grandir

author: reviews
synopsis: Ginny and Draco wake up in Draco's bed, wandless and with no memory of the night before. Together, they will embark on a twisted journey of self-discovery as they follow clues to retrace their steps. Can they stop bickering long enough to solve the mystery of their missing wands and memories?
title: Dude, Where's My Wand?

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry comes back to Hogwarts for his last year, but something happened in the Summer Holidays that changed him completely. His strange behaviour may have something to do with none other than Draco Malfoy... Drarry.
title: The Summer That Changed Everything

author: Deathofme
synopsis: [Cold war AU. Re-imagines major events in Canon] What if Harry wasn't the Boy Who Lived? What if the Order had lost? Hermione Granger is thrown into the middle of a guerilla war, groomed and trained to be pitted against the formidable Severus Snape in a deadly game of Spy versus Spy.
title: The Shadow War

author: sovimo
synopsis: Inspiré pour le défi des clichés Dramione, Draco Malfoy est nommé préfet en chef et est horrifié de constater que Hermione Granger est préfète elle aussi, il décide que la seule chose qui rendrait la situation supportable est de séduire la petite je-sais-tout. Il élabore un plan infaillible - mais connaît-il vraiment la princesses de Gryffondor aussi bien qu'il le croit? pov Draco.
title: Head games ( Traduction )

author: reviews
characters: [Barty C. Jr., Kingsley S.] N. Tonks
synopsis: Kingsley Shacklebolt has deep dark secret. One that he will go to any length to cover up. Any length at all. Including erasing the memory of one his closest friends.
title: Kingsley's Secret

author: sevlandexplorer
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., Severus S.
synopsis: Severus has been in a coma for three years. They have kept him from aging but he'll never get those years back. Slow burn, young Severus Snape.
title: The Three-Year Stand Still

author: Logan Rollo
synopsis: Started as a Harmony flash. What happens when Hermione wakes up with no idea who she is?
title: Harmony Interrupted

author: L0UP
synopsis: Cassy avait vu les cicatrices de sa mère et le tatouage de son père. Elle savait que son père aurait dû aller en prison. Mais elle n'avait connue que le vent glacé des berge de l'Alaska et l'air moite de la jungle du Costa Rica. Alors tout cela lui paraissait secondaire, jusqu'à ce que cet guerre dont elle entendait à peine parler frappe à sa porte.
title: Enfant de la Lune et de l'Étoile

author: KoraKunkel
characters: [Hermione G., Draco M.] [Harry P., Ginny W.]
synopsis: "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single pureblood wizard in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife." A rewrite of Pride & Prejudice, with Harry Potter Characters. (and yes, still magic.)
title: Pride & Purebloods

author: starspangledpumpkin
synopsis: Hermione needs to change her ways before going to Hogwarts. Just not in the way she thinks she does.
title: Advice For Friendship Making Will Backfire

author: OzzyOsman
synopsis: Dark Hermione all the way. Hermione is adopted and begins to carry on her life in Slytherin. Will she survive? Who would ever take her under their wing? Dramione and Ron bashing, Voldemort is good and Dumbledore bad. Don't own anything but my character I have created. All rights to J.K Rowling. Enjoy :)
title: Queen Of Night

author: reviews

characters: Draco M., Pansy P., Blaise Z.

synopsis: The muggles began to wonder why. Why their nation was so dark. Why their daughters died. Why their minister did nothing. Why fog stalked their land for years. Until they learned. What happens when magic isn't might.

author: reviews
synopsis: He longed for winter's end. He yearned for the softness of spring. He hungered for her brilliance alone. [ AU, Post-Hogwarts, Post-War ]

author: Princesssibnashay
characters: [Hermione G., Lucius M.] Lily Evans P., Bellatrix L.
synopsis: Hermione is thrown back into time after being tortured during the final battle. She meets the fates and the essence of magic itself. Their they will give her extraordinary gifts. She will then be sent back to the the Marauder's Era where she will find friends and love.

author: squishychickies
synopsis: Draco Malfoy is as dead as can be-this small hindrance doesn't stop him from appearing in this kitchen of the Boy Who Lived and wreaking havoc upon Harry's quiet life.

author: reviews
synopsis: What if Lily had survived? What if James' sacrifice protected both her and Harry? How will Lily respond when she learns of Snape bullying her son? One-shot. [Snape criticism. Don't like, don't read]

author: Irene Garza
synopsis: When Hermione hears a muggle fortuneteller's fair prophecy about her love life, she couldn't believe on it; until Draco Malfoy appeared at her door. author: KatieBY
synopsis: Was that all a life was worth? A beautiful box, an elegant suit, and the most expensive area to place the coffin. In the end, all of his material possessions didn't matter. One day a person is breathing, eating, committing evil deeds, doing good, loving, hating, and the next day, it's as if they didn't exist.
title: Tale of a non-friendship

author: SehunsBae37
synopsis: Fenrir Greyback has never really desired anything in life outside of respect. Well, except one other thing: a mate. He had come to terms with never having one until a chance encounter makes him believe he just might have found her. Turns out, it is none other than Hermione Granger, best friend to Harry Potter. Fenrir desires his mate, and he will have her. Set during HBP.
title: Mate of My Desire

author: reviews
characters: Luna L., Xenophilius L., Rolf S.
synopsis: "Daughter, do people who are as sick as I am die?" She, bearing a small and ignorant smile of what the future would bring them, had only answered, "No, Dad, everything will be fine." He'd been pleased with her response, closed his eyes, and said, "Fine, because I'm really afraid of dying"
title: Peaceful place

author: PotionChemist
synopsis: Head Boy, Head Girl, shared dorm in eighth year... Need I say more? I was prompted on Tumblr, and it got a bit lengthy.

RATING AND PAIRING ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE!

author: reviews
synopsis: I have very strong opinions on all the HP couples and I don't support any of the main canon couples so here are my versions and a list of their kids. This "fic" is basically going to be random facts about the Next Generation (my version) such as their sig. others, friends, Quidditch positions, birthdays, etc. THIS IS MY VERSION! NOT CANON! K to be safe
title: Harry Potter: Next Generation: Facts: My Version

author: secretfanficlover

author: Baroquen Down
synopsis: A short look into Barty Crouch Jr...

Then the Minister of Magic turns up with devastating news, Ron is dead and she is to be placed in the protection of Draco Malfoy.

author: FED-NS

When he was 7, he grew smart enougth to keep his power in total control. And secret. And now nothing changed. He still was alone. And still hunted. Super!Potter. Snape's alive. Abuse. Year eight. MA

synopsis: A series of short stories and drabbles featuring some of my favourite first meetings, and meet-cutes, from film, television, and literature, adapted for die-hard fans of Harry Potter, and especially fans of the Marauders Era.

characters: [Hermione G., Rodolphus L.] Harry P., N. Tonks

He stated calmly, the corner of his mouth lifting up into a smirk. Written in Response to a Darkness Reigns prompt (FB Group Death Eater Groupies)

synopsis: AU. Dramione, read A/N in beginning. A curse inflicted upon Hermione by Morgan Le Fay. She can't love, so what will she do?

The introduction of a soulmate and some au!wizarding culture providing the backdrop for true growth and healing.

synopsis: It starts as a joke in Haley's forth year. From there it becomes increasingly more complicated than anyone would have guessed from a relationship with Fred Weasley. Fem!Harry Potter/Fred Weasley

characters: Hermione G., Lily Evans P., Marauders
synopsis: Thrown back, and across, and THROUGH. Hermione had no clue of what awaited her, moving forward. She could only clutch her notebook and hope, against all hope, that she would survive this. Because judging by the trouble she had already gone through, it seemed that the Essence of Time was a well sought after commodity.

How will Harry and Lily deal with living with Snape?

No dialogue.

synopsis: Harry and Ron go back in time. Unfortunately, the punchline for this joke got lost somewhere in the Veil. Drabble fic.

pairing: Alice L., Bellatrix L., Frank L.

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Sybill T.
synopsis: Professor Trelawney predicted in her third year that her future husband will say this to her during their wedding reception, "I love the way you are. Never ever change." After Ron cheated on her with a gorgeous half-veela, her self-esteem is at an all-time low. At a photo exhibit, she sees herself through Harry's eyes and discovers two major realizations. Fluffy Oneshot.

synopsis: Since some of you, readers, never believe me, so I decided to edit this greeting, because some of you are sticklers for your english. As a writer, and being on here, gives me the opportunity as not to be such a stickler, or a bland, boring, overweight or obese reader that I believe that many of you are overweight or obese. If Not prove me wrong.
title: Greeting from the real JK Rowling (AGAIN)

author: TheGoodPA
synopsis: Sirius knew a lot about Remus Lupin.
title: What He Knew

author: everlovingdeer
synopsis: When he caught my eyes, my mind instantly flickered back to something I'd dreamt. Something random and strange and … domestic. Slowly, I asked, "We've never met before have me? Like, before you first walked into the shop?" He continued to watch me. Only, this gaze deepened like the answer to my question was much more complicated than I'd thought. Just – it made no sense.
title: Something Familiar

author: FanficWriterLovesWriting
synopsis: After the events of TPS, Hogwarts is destroyed. The school is relocated in Greece. Harry and Hermione meet many new students including a Siren named Sallia.
title: A Siren's Song

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Neville L., Molly W., Poppy P.
synopsis: Neville bribes Harry into seeing Madame Pomfrey. They start talk about their adventures. Sequel to For the Want of Coffee Trick or Treat Challenge- Malfoys 5. Dialogue.
title: Tales From the Infirmary

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Neville L., Andromeda T.
synopsis: Emotions run high in the Great Hall after the Battle of Hogwarts. EWE Sequel to The Headmasters Office and The End is Just the Beginning. Trick or Treat Challenge- Dursley 14- Coffee
title: For the Want Of Coffee

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Severus S., Fenrir G.
synopsis: Fenrir and Severus want a mate. Enter Harry.
title: Gentle Beasts

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Fleur D., Gabrielle D.] Hermione G.
synopsis: AU: Takes place after Goblet of Fire. Harry's life has already turned upside down knowing the truth about so called Friends and A manipulative Dumbledore. Now things can get worse or better. When Harry owns both Fleur and Gabby a life Debt. That Makes him a Veela. Mated to Fleur and Gabby. May be more. Bashed Weasley. Expect Ginny, Fred, George. FEM HARRY. More Inside.
title: A Different Life
pairing: Harry P., Fleur D., Gabrielle D.

author: dirtydexter79
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Ginny W.
synopsis: Muggle A/U: Harry Potter, aged 12, has had to move to the strange town of Hogsmeade when his family is threatened. He meets new friends and truly discovers how mysterious the town really is. Rated M. Very different from the books and is more Sci-fi and Mystery Horror then anything else. Hope you enjoy.
title: Harry Potter and the Mystery of Slytherins Tomb

author: Balam Yohualli
synopsis: ¿Qué sabemos acerca de esa máquina de vapor que va desde King s Cross a Hogwarts? (One-shot)
title: El primer viaje

author: excessivelydramatic
synopsis: Harry lets himself be struck down by Voldemort, only to survive once again. Arriving in King's Cross Station, he finds his mother instead of Dumbledore. Being in possession of all three Deathly Hallows, and having impressed Death himself with his Horcrux hunting, he is given a second chance. A second chance to change things, to keep people alive. Eventually Harry/Fleur.
title: The Boy Who Returned

author: Brittany Reynolds
synopsis: This is a Drabble about Remus/Luna! Feel free to comment!
title: The Feast he will Partake

author: reviews
synopsis: Goretober Day 19: Execution. Bellatrix is on death row and is rather eager for her own demise. A warning on this one for suicidal ideation.
title: A Fine Day

author: See266
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: Having lost all of the light forces during the trio's time on the run, the Order of the Phoenix has fallen to ashes. Harry, Hermione and Ron have retreated into their own dark corner and have left the light behind, aiming to start an unrivalled fire of rebellion.
title: To the dark alleys of rebellion

author: NewHPwriter
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Ginny W.
synopsis: Harry's side have almost lost the war. When George, Seamus, Lavender, Dean, Ginny, Luna, Neville, Hermione, Draco and Ron are captured by the enemy, they must find a way to escape before all of them are executed. A story about the last days of war. Mostly canon-compliant.
title: The Last Of Us

author: reviews
synopsis: One shot; Friendship Story between Ron and Harry based on the song How to safe a life from The Fray
title: Had I known how to safe a life

author: reviews
synopsis: Haria, acara take me out, dan penipu yang membawa Haria balik ke rengkuhan sang tunangan. Sebuah komplikasi dari cinta sepihak.
title: TAKE ME OUT

author: reviews
synopsis: Recevoir une lettre peut changer beaucoup de chose… Ou TOUT. Yaoi/Slash.
title: La beauté

author: reviews
synopsis: A veces es bueno tener la conciencia tranquila por el bien propio en vez de dejarse sumergir en las oscuras aguas de la ira y el miedo. Eso aprendió Harry al enterarse sobre la verdad de su profesor de pociones. Inspirado en el maravilloso mundo de J.K. Rowling y la hermosa canción de la banda de metal sinfónico holandesa, After Forever. En memoria de Alan Rickman.
title: Recuerdos Vacíos

author: BellaBlackEvans
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: El cuarto año acaba de empezar y Harry está feliz de no ser el centro de atención, pero justo cuando empezaba a relajarse, llegan siete libros del futuro que prometen ponerle fin a sus problemas, el detalle es que se tratan de su propia vida y hay que leerlos delante de todo el gran salón. cuarto subido y tercer capitulo corregido:)
title: Leyendo la Piedra Filosofal

author: RavenWolf99
synopsis: Harry and Severus bound by fate?
title: The Soul Crystal

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry and Draco's encounter in the girl's bathroom takes a different turn when, instead of fighting him, Harry tries to reason with Draco to help him. Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince.
title: What if?

author: oOoPlumeStilinskioOo
synopsis: Colin Crivey et Mandy Lupin sont en danger...Ils sont poursuivis par des rafleurs depuis le début de la guerre.
title: La cible du rafleur

author: reviews
synopsis: Durante la primera fiesta de Halloween después de la guerra, Hermione es capaz de escapar del pasado gracias a un murciélago en particular. Fragmento de When All is Lost, One is Found.
title: Sombras del prejuicio

author: reviews
synopsis: You and your best friend have secret crushes. But it aint easy to get ‘em! Making sure your not offending anyone!
title: George x Reader A fight for love

author: reviews
synopsis: During the first Halloween party after the war, Hermione is able to take a get away from the past, thanks to a particular bat. Part of When All is Lost, One is Found.
title: Shadows of Prejudices

author: reviews
synopsis: Sirius survives the batle at the Department of Misteries. However, t hat survival comes with a price.
title: The Cost

author: vach.tm
synopsis: "I cannot live another day more without telling the truth. That's what I am doing right now, writing my memoirs. If I cannot say it out loud, then I am going to write it. Someone or something other than me needs to know what happened that day." (Post-Hogwarts, Canon compliant..ish)
title: Regrets

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry and Kingsley manage to get away from the zombies just in time, but can they help others from their own fate? Apocalypse AU- Violence, angst, loss, death
title: Dead Inside

author: reviews
characters: Albus S. P., Harry P., Hermione G.
synopsis: Albus Potter descubrirá que el mundo muggle también tiene un lado mágico en Halloween
title: Halloween con los Abuelos Granger

author: Kneazle
characters: [Mrs. Granger, Dr. Granger] Hermione G., OC
synopsis: Albus Dumbledore once said "[...] death is but the next great adventure," but when a premature death causes her to 'wake up' as Cordelia, Hermione Granger's older Muggle sister before the events of HP canon, she calls BS. What's an SI supposed to do if she's not around Hogwarts to help save the day?
title: Between Then and Now (We Can Only Go Forward)

author: MidnightContemplations
synopsis: This is about the Boggart lesson in PoA but with some other characters that weren't included in the scene such as Luna Lovegood.
title: Of Boggarts and Fear

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Teddy L.
synopsis: "TEDDY!" Harry roared. "Apologize to Hermione! You cannot speak to her like that!" "Why?" the thirteen-year-old looked angrier and angrier. "She is not my mother!" Being a parent was never easy, being godparents for one Teddy Lupin was even more challenging. Written for The House Competition Year 5 Round 5
title: The Godparents

author: reviews
synopsis: On the eve of Graduation, Hogwarts' Seventh Years take the Potter Potion formulated by Hermione Granger, many years ago. As a seventh year, will James Sirius finally know the true history of the potion before he takes part in the pre-graduation tradition? Fluffy Oneshot.
title: The Potter Potion

author: DolphinReader
synopsis: Harry is the King of Magical empire and betrothed to Tom Riddle .Evil Dumbels. No Voldemort.
title: King Hadrian

author: reviews
synopsis: I am searching for this story
title: Finding a story

author: Roger23
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Fleur D., Daphne G.
synopsis: A twist of fate sends Harry down a much darker path. The question is not how far he will fall, but how many others he will take with him. This is also going to be a Godlike Harry fic, as well as a 'Harem' story. Lemons, Dark!Harry ,Powerful!Harry, Slytherin!Harry and Harems.
title: Harry Potter: Lord of Darkness

author: poisonrationalitie
synopsis: Molly Eleanor Weasley is the youngest-ever attendee of the FLEW camp, and she won't let anyone forget it.
title: warning

author: Maggie Zel
characters: OC, Marvolo G., Merope G., Morfin G.
synopsis: La place de la Dragoncelle à toujours eut un impact important sur le destin des membres de la famille Gaunt...
title: L'ombre du Basilique

author: Liline09
synopsis: On suit Lily et James, ainsi que les membres de l'Ordre, de la naissance de Harry jusqu'à leurs trahison. Et si le traître était démasqué? Et si les Potter survivait à la guerre? Que deviendra la guerre en cours?
title: Et si j'avais

author: RoyalBubbles
synopsis: WARNING:Spanking Oneshots. Enter at your own risk.
title: Harry Potter in Trouble

author: MelodyByrd
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: So we know that the marauders and Lily are a tight-knit group, but were they always this way? Only rated T for cursing. (All characters belong to JKR. The only thing that is mine is the plot.)
title: Braiding

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: It was November 22 and 23 days and 42 minutes since it had happened. Since they had died and Voldemort had died and Harry orphaned. 23 days and 4 hours, tally marks etched into his mind 23 days since he's been in Azkaban, 3 weeks, 2 days and seventeen hours since he's been alone.
title: Twenty-Three Days After the End of the World

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione Granger-Weasley struggles with being a first time mother. But she gets sage advice from the least likely of people. Her husband, Ron Weasley.
title: Baby Blues:One Day at a Time

author: reviews
synopsis: One long week, two disguises, and a wealth of desire help Hermione and Cormac blow off some steam with a little game of cat and mouse. Cormione
title: Cat & Mouse

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry Potter AU. Hermione J. Granger, Potion Mistress, 29 years old, believed that fate had forgotten all about her. She was single no romantic prospects ahead until one day as she was walking home and encountered an odd sight. A little girl, crying, scared and scruffy. One act of kindness shifted her world, because, there is no greater power than Mother's Love.
title: Mother's love

author: reviews
synopsis: Enfrentarse a Voldemort provoca que Hermione Granger sea lanzada atrás en el tiempo sin imaginar lo que el destino le tiene deparado. Decidida a cambiar ciertos sucesos de la historia, Hermione se propone a cambiar el negro corazón de aquellos que de una forma u otra tuvieron que ver con la destrucción de su mundo lo que no espera es poner su corazón como ofrenda para uno de ellos.
title: A través del tiempo

author: Solecitoyanass
synopsis: Harry Potter se ofreció a hablar en el juicio de Draco Malfoy después de la segunda guerra mágica. Lo que no sabía era que el rubio había adquirido cierta herencia durante el verano. ¿Qué obtienes cuando arrojas un Alfa no enlazado a una habitación con un Omega recién manifestado? Lo averiguaremos... [TRADUCCIÓN; Autora: dracosbadfaith] Primera parte de Harry's Omega
title: Scents (Aromas)

author: gwenriss
characters: Draco M., Fleur D., Luna L., OC
synopsis: We all know that the Malfoy House came from France long ago, but what if there was still members of the House there? What if their heiress was part of the Beauxbatons delegation for the Triwizard Tournament? That's the sole base of this story, the 'coming back' of the heiress in Britain. (there will be some femslash later, don't like don't read thanks)
title: Another Malfoy at Hogwarts?

author: Socoobo
synopsis: Centuries after the events of Harry Potter, the magical world is in ruins after countless wars, while the muggle world thrives under the rule of artificial intelligence. But when the A.I. discovers the existence of magic, worlds collide in a war between magic and technology.
title: Of Magic and Muggles

author: reviews
synopsis: No hay mucho que hacer en una casa sola, sin electricidad, con libros que preferirías quemar, y e incluso muebles y elfos que te detestan... Sirius Black lo sabe...nada más que... ¿comer?
title: Sin mucho que hacer

author: Su.Snape
synopsis: Hermione abandonou a magia anos atrás e se vê novamente à frente de uma decisão que mudará sua vida para sempre.
title: Stay

author: Izzy
synopsis: Remus/Sirius post-OotP ficlet written for a song title challenge (I made a blind selection, and was given an instrumental piece by Bond called "Quixote"), before HBP came out.
title: Quixote

author: Purebloodpony
characters: Alecto C., Amycus C., Rabastan L., Antonin D.
synopsis: Once upon a time, Alecto Carrow dreamed of a life with Rabastan Lestrange. Instead, she was forced by her father into an arranged marriage. Alecto finds herself alone, far from her friends and family. Trapped by a violent, psychopathic, narcissist, she is pushed to the edge of her sanity. Only one man will be able to bring her back.
title: Broken Toys

author: calileane
synopsis: Il y a bien des façons d'attendre un cœur. Un cœur est précieux et parfois magique. Attendre n'est pas le problème. C'est le manque d'espoir qui menace de vous engloutir qui l'est. Parfois un seul événement peu tout changer. Les Harry Potter de deux dimensions se rencontrent. Leurs deux mondes sont différents en bien des points mais leur rencontre annonce un renouveau.
title: Dans l'attente d'un coeur

author: WaterPh0enix
characters: Lily Evans P., Severus S., Petunia D., Marauders
synopsis: I know what you all thinking. Some sappy or cringe parody were Snape is that emo Opera Ghost and Lily is that singing girl, but no. This is a story about Severus as a child, first Hogwarts year, starting from the premise of him choosing to be a Gryffindor instead. I tried to write in in the same fun, yet dramatic and enchanting style JK used in her books.
title: Severus Snape and the Phantom of the Dungeon

author: o0No-e-mi0o
characters: [Hermione G., Severus S., Lily Evans P.]
synopsis: After Professor Snape dreamed of Lily, things changed for Hermione Granger, who found herself risking her academic, professional and personal life for nothing more than, indeed, a dream.
title: A Dream Repercurssion
pairing: Hermione G., Severus S., Lily Evans P.

author: reviews
synopsis: "There is a world, similar to the one we live in now. They have magic too but use no wands. They have power over the elements. They are called Elementals. And you, Lydia Lovegood-Scamander, or should I say, Lydia Fay-Scamander, are their only hope..."
title: Lydia Scamander And The Last Fay

author: sheyamiku
characters: [Andromeda T., Ted T.] Bellatrix L., Narcissa M.
synopsis: Andromeda loved her sisters and her sisters loved her. They were her world. There were no secrets between them. Until Bellatrix met Rodolphus, and suddenly there were. And the more she tried to make things right, the more Andromeda realised that she didn't know what "right" was. And as she let others into her heart, she realised that maybe her world did not have to feel so small.
title: Andromeda's Galaxy

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry James Potter, the Boy-Who-Lived, was born with his mother's fiery red hair and his father's soft hazel eyes. (Please note that while I will use the books and movies as a backbone for this story, I will be taking heavy liberties with some details. I will write characters as I recall relating to them. Not perfect, but well-balanced and flawed.)
title: You mean you're not a Weasley?

author: apparevestigium
synopsis: Embark on a new journey through a familiar world with Hogwarts student Runa Skaldmær.
title: Runa Skaldmær: September 1st, 1991 - The Hogwarts Express

author: GracieSnow
characters: [Hermione G., Draco M.] [Ginny W., Harry P.]
synopsis: When Hermione finds out she's had her mind altered, she can't stop thinking about it, even three years later. And the only person who can help her is the one who obliviated her in the first place, who just so happens to be Draco Malfoy. [EWE] A story told in three parts.
title: Loose End

author: reviews
synopsis: Petit OS très court. Ginny est une jeune sorcière avec du caractère et qui ne recule devant rien. Mais jusqu'où est-elle prête à aller pour conquérir, enfin, le cœur d'Harry Potter?
title: Love Potion

author: TakaSobieFAnka
synopsis: My lyric Llama #2, where we learn about the source of Hermione's strength. Inspired by the lyrics: "And I know it hurts and I know you feel torn, but you never gave up this easily before, so why do you choose today to give it all away…" from the song No Giving Up by Crossfade. I claim no ownership of it, I only used it as an inspiration.
title: Marching Orders

author: reviews
synopsis: Salazar Slytherin is the only one who knows about what happened to Helena Ravenclaw. The only one alive that is and he's willing to do anything to make sure it stays like that. Warning for in canon character death.
title: Salazar's Secret

author: sylverwolf666
synopsis: Harry Potter never had a chance to be normal. So when his uncle beats him so bad he loses the ability to see, headmaster Dumbledore and professor snape take it upon themselves to "kill" the boy who lived and introduce the wizarding world to severus's "daughter" Lillianna Ivory Snape
title: Harry potter and the family of misfits

author: VulpesCanidae
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: When Harry Potter sees his godfather transform into an enormous black dog to save his life, his interest is piqued. When he hears stories that his father could do exactly the same, his attention is well and truly grabbed. And when he hears that his father and godfather attained this ability while still in school, there's nothing that can stop him.
title: Amato Animo Animato Animagus

author: ILikeToastedBagels
synopsis: Friendless and all alone, aimlessly flying on an empty quidditch pitch. All she feels in her stomach is an unsinkable pending doom. One she thinks she can't get out of this time. Where Fem!Harry meets a guy called Krum. She's quite the convoluted mess. Take a step into her mind, see how far she's fallen and how he caught her. Starts in the 4th Year.
title: A Seekers Catch

author: reviews
synopsis: After everything she's heard about new Herbology professor Neville Longbottom, Vivian dreads her first lesson with him. (OC-centric.)
title: Quick to Judge

author: Skellington Drocell C
synopsis: Había cosas que Draco no admitiría. ¿Drabble? Harco/Drarry.
title: Tecnología

author: KyleLandy
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Voldemort
synopsis: Would you kill Baby Hitler? When a strange time phenomenon occurs, a familiar foe from the past returns with one significant side effect, With time and opportunity slipping away, it is up to Harry and his friends as they try to decide on the most important decision of their lives. Mostly canon.
title: The Voldemort Paradox

author: LycorisSnape
synopsis: Alors que la Première Guerre des Sorciers se termine, Minerva McGonagall rencontre Sybille Trelawney. Elles que tout oppose vont apprendre à se connaitre et s'apprécier. Leurs vies seront mouvementées, mais elles pourront toujours compter l'une sur l'autre. Jusqu'au jour où...
title: Un parfum de Xeres

author: AndyRiddleMalfoy
synopsis: Even if it meant having to die, Neville would do anything for Severus if he could see him with a smile. Sneville. Slash
title: To see you smile I will do anything

author: reviews
synopsis: Ron the zombie infects Hermione, who in turn tries to find a cure to save them both. Humor, sexual comments, Ron bashing. But will she succeed before she starts wanting brains too?
title: Brains

author: Korpsman of Krieg
characters: [Harry P., Luna L.] Molly W., Xenophilius L.
synopsis: Christmas has come, and as her first with Harry, Luna feels a mix of excitement, customary Christmas warmth and some anxiety about how everything will pan out. But with Harry keeping a certain surprise under wraps, how much of that will matter? Midquel to my fic Satisfied Mind! C C loved and appreciated!
title: Don't Let the Bells End!

author: princessesierra
characters: Sirius B., Severus S., Albus D., OC
synopsis: A young woman arrives at the Leaky Cauldron with no memories and only a vague sense of what she was sent there to do. She sets about on her quest with a growing certainty of one thing, and one thing alone - no one should be left behind. [AU]
title: None Left Behind

author: reviews
synopsis: A Drarry post-break up one-shot fanfiction. Draco's point of view. It's short. It's sad. Give it a try.
title: Ever Since You

author: katiedu946
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., OC
synopsis: Pourquoi laisser le destin décider pour lui, pourquoi est-il obliger de subir sa vie? Il vas apprendre qu'il peut choisir son futur. Pour cela, arrêter de se lamenter, et commencer a se bouger. A ce moment seulement, il vas changer. Etes-vous prêts a voir ce qu'ils vont devenir. Ils? Venez tout simplement voir comment l'histoire vas changer. Crossover HP/Twilight
title: La Confrérie des chevaliers d'Orion

author: reviews
synopsis: Regulus Black is dead. Or is he? Kingsley seeks out a small shop in Muggle London to see if that statement is true.
title: What The Heart Wants

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco returns to Hogwarts to finish his seventh year and finds himself a pariah. A helping hand is reluctantly offered.
title: Malfoy's New Clothes

author: AndyRiddleMalfoy
synopsis: Aún si significaba tener que morir, Neville haría cualquier cosa por Severus si podía verlo con una sonrisa en el rostro. Sneville.
title: Por verte sonreír

author: reviews
synopsis: The words rang repeatedly in her head. A constant reminder. Of her unrequited love. That he would never think of her as more. Yes, that was all she was to him. That was all she could ever be to him. She would forever be cursed to watch him from far away, blissfully unaware of the pain he had caused her. So, she disappeared.
title: Selfish

author: tstar785
synopsis: Rose and Scorpius have history from their days at Hogwarts but he'll return that things had changed when he returns after a few years in the US. Rated T for later chapters
title: What Became of us

author: Jem Doe
synopsis: In a House where everyone was hyper-focused on getting the best grades possible and sticking for the rules, Luna Lovegood did not fit in, sticking out like a sore thumb as she rambled, excitedly, too excitedly, about fantastical creatures that did not exist.
title: Oh, it's what you do to me

author: reviews
synopsis: How, exactly, does Crookshanks end up with apple slices?
title: I Have Your Cat

author: Lyla0i
synopsis: La nuit précédent son anniversaire, un an après la bataille de Poudlard, George reçoit une visite qui va le faire réagir et reprendre sa vie en main. (Mini-fic)
title: George

author: reviews
synopsis: It was supposed to be the happiest day of her life; a day she'd dreamed of for years. And yet... something was missing.
title: Aunt Amelia's Gift

author: reviews
synopsis: Dudley brings his girlfriend home to meet his parents. There, he finds out there is so much more to this woman than he initial thought. Will he be able to handle her secret? Will she be able to handle his parents? Dudley/OC. AU where Big-D falls in love with a witch.
title: If you go out in the woods today, you're sure of a big surprise

author: reviews
synopsis: looking for a story where Sirius and Severus become parents
title: need help looking for a story

author: Turtlerose555
synopsis: Tired of pining over Remus, Tonks listens to Molly's advice of taking time off work and visiting Charlie, who she hasn't seen since Hogwarts, in Romania. Tonks and Charlie reconnect over their childhood bond as she rediscovers herself outside of Remus. For her, Charlie was the one who was always there. For him, Tonks was the one that got away. HBP-DH cannon. RL/NT/CW love triangle.
title: Nymphie and Charlie

author: reviews
characters: George W., Percy W., Oliver W., Fred W.
synopsis: Uh oh. Someone spiked the punch at the Gryffindor Halloween party, and Percy is NOT amused. (Implied underage drinking.)
title: A Hellish Halloween Party

author: Herochick007
synopsis: Victoire Weasley takes a potion to see if she has a soulmate. Amelia(Amy) Bones has dreams of a blond ice princess. Will a day shopping bring the girls to finally meeting? Soulmate AU! Victoire/OC
title: Finding Amelia

author: hunter dude
synopsis: *DISCLAIMER* ABUSE HEAVILY MENTIONED IN CHAPTER 1. Harry is taken from a heavily abusive home when Vernon tries to gain influence with the local police, see how Harry's life changes when he is not only allowed to use his intelligence and guile, but is no longer influenced by the plans of a senile old man. Criticism and flames welcome and encouraged.
title: Harry Potter, The power of Sight

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione is bullied because of her muggleborn status, her looks, and her smarts. What can having friends do to change that? WBWL Cold!Harry Pretty!Hermione
title: Looks, They Change Everything

author: Dylan Conoe
synopsis: Après avoir été innocenté, Sirius se retrouve face à de tout nouveaux défis ; le regard des autres et créer un environnement agréable pour son filleul ne sont que des détails face à ce qui l'attend. (Suite de Twisting the plot Twist : Book 3)
title: Twisting the plot Twist : Book 4

author: FanofStuff69
synopsis: Holly Potter, The-Girl-Who-Lived, has a very interesting life. Rated M for Sexual Scenes.
title: Holly Potter

author: LadyHawkKathy
synopsis: Quick little one chapter that is a link piece between Descendent of the Falcon and a new story titled Rewined. Title says it all
title: Halloween 2002

author: Cary Swirls
synopsis: Voldemort is defeated and peace is finally here. Or so everyone thinks. Little did they know a girl named Dahlia might just be the next She-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named. (Based off J.K Rowling's series "Harry Potter." All rights to J.K Rowling.)
title: The Rebirthing of Darkness

author: Priestesses of H.I.S.S
synopsis: (Dash #43) The wizarding world had not gotten any less prejudiced or any more just...it had only turned the tables on who was persecuted and who was revered. Hermione was on a mission to fix what the most recent wrong and may have tripped up and had to learn along the living with ferrets might not be so hard after all.
title: How to Live with Ferrets

author: the.goal.is.greatness

Je vais vous racontez mon histoire... Ma longue est dramatique histoire. Marauder one day, Marauder always

When it is said it caters to all tastes, what does that mean? What happens when long-held secrets are revealed that night.
title: ice Cream Castles

author: OrchidSonata
characters: Harry P., Regulus B., Ernie M., OC
synopsis: Harry Potter thinks he is an ordinary boy - until he meets an honest-to-goodness witch! Soon finding himself enrolled in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, his dull life is replaced by a magical world of infinite possibilities! But not all is well at Hogwarts; a hidden enemy lurks the vast corridors of the school - one that would see young Harry lose his very soul!
title: Harry Potter and the Book of Lost Souls

author: Brockster550
synopsis: A series of one-shots of Harry and his friends encountering hilarious phenomenons come to life when certain phrases are spoken. Updates will be occasional. Rating changed to 'T' as of the second one-shot.
title: Harry Potter And The Hilarious Phenomenons

author: msmerlin13
synopsis: How much is a five pound note worth? For Harry, it's bought him a lifetime of happiness with the one witch whose always had his heart.

author: reviews
synopsis: Los herederos de Salazar Slytherin. Los últimos. No puede terminar así.
title: Descendientes

author: Excited-Insomniac
synopsis: Nita Linese is a Muggle-born witch for whom Hogwarts is a haven from her mother. This is an AU of Goblet of Fire in which my OC takes Cedric's place in the Triwizard Tournament. OC/Viktor Krum, mostly canon plot, Harry included. COMPLETE
title: Champion

author: reviews
characters: George W., Ginny W., Fred W.
synopsis: Incestuous smut! Between siblings! Ginny seeks comfort in the twins' bed(s).
title: Ginny in the Middle

author: Arian2423
synopsis: Harry is hit by a misfired undoing spell in third year and starts to remember things causing him to flee together with Hermione and a few others, including a godfather he didn't know he had. For Wizarding Britain and Dumbledore in particular old oaths and secrets are now brought to light. Dumbledore bashing, AU. / Story ends at the end of third year.
title: One Misfired Spell Later

author: reviews
synopsis: What more can be said about the decisions you make due to the actions of those you love? Written for Sing Me A Rare: The Soundtracks for Fairest of the Rare. Song Prompt/Inspiration was 'This Way' by Khalid & H.E.R.
title: Make Me

author: Orion242
synopsis: AU, Harry Potter was four years old when The Dark Lord attacked, Harry vanquished the Dark Lord but his baby brother takes all the credit. Dark but not evil Harry! Super Powerful&Smart Ravenclaw Harry. Starts with Harry's fourth year. HP/FD

author: reviews
synopsis: Harriet's plan to escape goes downhill when she is interrupted by someone unexpected, and the night takes a very surprising turn. Soulmate AU. Female Harry/Tom Riddle Pairing. Rating M. This is mature content.

author: Mrs.Drusilla
characters: [Hermione G., Draco M.] Severus S., Theodore N.
synopsis: Hermione J. Granger estaba contra la espada y la pared, debía tomar una decisión que cambiaría su vida para siempre. Draco Malfoy estaba siendo devorado por la oscuridad y el miedo. Una historia alternativa donde Hermione toma las riendas y asume peligros con el fin de proteger a sus seres queridos, sería una Mortifaga y Draco Malfoy tendría que ayudarla.

author: reviews
synopsis: Bored Ron, engrossed Hermione and a rainy day. 6th year AU fluff fic based on art by Hello-Sweetie-1994, written for @callieskye.

author: reviews
synopsis: Albus Dumbledore has a little over a year to live. One year to ensure the fall of Voldemort. One year to find if he has to condemn an innocent young man to his death. One year to show the dark lord and the world that Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore will not go gently into the night.
title: Rise of the Phoenix

author: SlytherinishRavenclaw
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: Harry wants to save them all. He wants to fix the past. But to do so he will have to give up something important...What's more important then people's lives? Pairing undecided. Powerful!Harry, Timetravel!Harry

author: reviews
synopsis: "The legends say it should be right here…" Luna mused, using a cutting spell delicately on the Black Forest's vegetation, guiding him, hand in hand.
title: Curse-lifting kiss

author: reviews
synopsis: Em que James Potter volta a Hogwarts como professor substituto, e tudo que Lily Evans menos queria era ter que encarar seu ex-namorado quase dois anos depois do término. RA para o Jilytober 2019
title: Professor Potter

author: wine witch
synopsis: Nach zwanzig Jahren findet die Direktorin des St. Mungo-Hospitals, Hermione Granger, endlich einen Weg, ihrem Langzeit-Komapatienten zu helfen. Was wird sie finden, wenn sie in die Geheimnisse seines Geistes eindringt? SS/HG, HDT-konform, jedoch ohne Epilog. Übersetzung aus dem Englischen von "Awake" von Theolyn.
title: Awake – Wach

author: reviews
synopsis: Colin has saved up all his life to be able to take a photography master class. But what was supposed to be the best time ever soon turns sour when Colin realizes that all other participants are Purebloods. And they don't even take the class seriously. Except for Ben, who might be more than meets the eye.
title: Promise

author: Natacha Nicole
synopsis: Mon nom est Natacha, je me suis endormi dans mon lit, avec mon chat. Quand je me suis réveillée, j'était quelqu'un d'autre. Dans un autre pays, une autre langue, un autre monde. Je me suis endormi Natacha, je me suis réveillé Lily Evans. Moi qui connait l'histoire de Harry Potter par coeur. Je sens qu'il n'y aura rien de pareil dans cette version.
title: Qu'est-ce que je fais là?

author: RubberDuckiez
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., OC, Selwyn
synopsis: (Sequel to "Thistle & Black") Ellie Selwyn has always seen her mother as her personal hero (more than Harry Potter). But when she returns home after her third year, she finds that while they are finally free of the domineering Evan Selwyn, it has come with a price. Part of which is coming to terms with the fact that she is the daughter of Sirius Black.
title: Becoming Ellie Black

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione wants some help from Neville in a herbology assignment. When she finds him alone in his dorm he is in a rather compromising situation.

author: Kazlerox
synopsis: Harry had a lot more relatives, and grows up loved with his uncle Lucien Potter. Heir Black is going to take the world by storm.

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Fleur D., OC
synopsis: High school AU! Harry Potter is a musical prodigy that comes once in a lifetime. Supremely talented but unmotivated he's spent the last few years coasting on little effort. With the recent murder of his and his sisters parents, not to mention his killing of the bastard Riddle, he's found a fire under his ass. Follow his journey through hormones, temperamental muses and teen romance
title: A musicians muse and temper

author: Fred-the-Moose
synopsis: And that was how Harry found himself in this situation, eyes locked on Remus' strong fingers, as they delicately dropped his customary one sugar cube in his tea. Unable to look away as they grabbed the spoon and stirred, the utensil gently clinking on the allowed Harry those few stolen moments to appreciate the man, however dangerous it was.
title: This Situation

author: reviews
synopsis: Laura quería una vida mejor, al menos mientras dormía. Sin embargo, ella misma se buscó aquel destino, así que de una forma u otra, debía olvidarse de soñar. [Colección "La Copa de la Casa", edición 2019-2020]
title: Ni lo sueñes

author: reviews
characters: Severus S., George W., Rufus S., Fred W.
synopsis: Hogwarts has depleted the funds reserved for orphaned/poor students as a result of the Second Wizarding War. Dumbledore and his co-conspirators have devised a plan to raise the necessary funds, a Mr. Witch Beauty Pageant. To give the illusion of unanimous support, Dumbledore has required all of the wizard faculty members to participate in addition to any outside volunteers.
title: Witch Wizard?: Hogwarts' First Annual Witchless Beauty Pageant

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: Lily and James have left Harry with Sirius again. You would think that they would learn. Or that Sirius would. Sequel to- Babysitting is Hard To Do. Trick or Treat Challenge

author: reviews
synopsis: During a monthly outing with Lucius, Severus sees a new side to the Princess of Gryffindor. Will he like what he sees?

synopsis: The marauders are lazing around one morning and discover a mysterious book that's from the future. Sirius decides to be stupid and put it on his head. They end up in 1993, and things are getting weird. Lily/James Co-written with James Potter2833 (Ichigo Briefs)
title: Marauders - Back in Time, Time is Back - Book 1

author: PPygmyPuff
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., OC
synopsis: She had just been hit by a car. It had gone right through her. "So, I'm dead then?" "Kid, you're dead. Just not gone." Who knew death would involve landing in the world of your favourite book? At least she still had Jamie...

synopsis: Did you learn sign language so you could talk to me? He made a motion as if slicing his right hand through his left – Of course He wanted me to ask why he'd put all the effort into learning an entire language for me. So, I asked – Why? He sighed slightly, speaking aloud yet quietly as he said, "I wanted to be your friend."
title: Another Kind of Communication

characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.

Blue-black like midnight, like memories. (Note from Harry to Theo, Muggle AU)

(SLASH léger dans le premier chapitre) Voldemort élève Harry

Powerful/OP! Harry
