synopsis: A girl crashes into Flitwick's 1977 NEWT level charms class, clutching a dead body to her chest. Who is Holly Potter? Why does she look so much like James? And why does she reek of dark magic? Dumbledore and two advisors travel into the Pensieve and witness a life of family and war. (Harry has a Ravenclaw twin. Pairings change as the characters grow. Not too much bashing.)

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Viktor K.
synopsis: After the tumultuous events of 4th year, the last thing Harry expected was to find out his best friend Hermione would be spending the summer with Viktor Krum. And when he has to face that head-on when arriving at Grimmauld Place, he finally comes to realize something about his feelings ...
title: Harry's Heavy Heart - A Viktor Hermione Short Romance

author: reviews
synopsis: They said he was gone, destroyed. That evil, black book she had poured her heart and soul into could do no more damage. But Ginny soon realizes, that while the book may be gone, Riddle never will be. Some marks you can never be rid of. Ginny's train ride to Hogwarts is interrupted when a Dementor, looking for Sirius Black, attacks her. Short, dark one shot.

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Peter P.

author: RiddikulousRay

synopsis: After many years away, Hermione is back in England, but it is not a friendly visit. Teaming up with the ministry, she must race against time to solve one of the most dangerous mysteries to ever plague the Wizarding World. Ruined relationships and past friends are the least of her worries, especially when she has her own band of Slytherins to fight right by her side.

author: Ayumi Fubuki
synopsis: Comme toutes les sorcières de son age,Maya entame sa 1ère année à Poudlard. Entre les cours de potions magiques et les rencontres insolites elle n'a pas le temps de s'ennuyer. Mais les ombres de la disparition de son frère et des caves maudites planent sur scolarité. Pour retrouver son frère, Maya devra ,elle aussi, emprunter des chemins interdits. Basé sur le jeu Hogwarts Mystery.

author: reviews
synopsis: Lily Evans says goodbye to the boy she grew up with. Not all things are meant to last as she sets fire to the rain and turns her back on the past. "She wanted to turn around and apologise, to hug him, to kiss him, to leave some trace of sweetness in their goodbye, but her body decided otherwise."
title: Set Fire to the Rain

author: Gojirahkiin
synopsis: Powers - classified as such instead of gods because wizards dislike feeling small - are transcosmic beings. Which is to say they are not confined to our universe or any of the existing parallel ones. Rather, they each possess their own plane from which they can observe and meddle with others as they see fit. Harry Potter, in a moment of desperation calls on any of them for help.
title: Harry Potter & the Powers Beyond

author: Rosie Moriarty
synopsis: After the War, Harry returns to Hogwarts for an eighth year. However, he has to deal with some after effects of the War, his feelings for Draco Malfoy and the fact that strange things are continuing to happen at Hogwarts. Drarry fluff.

synopsis: Bonjour , je recherche une Fanfiction oú Harry est maltraiter est adopter par Sirius. Il peut être accompagner de Remus mais pas en couple ... Je trouve cela irréaliste. - pour plus d’infos

synopsis: Sometimes, fate has a way of doing what is needed. Even if it seems like everything has been messed up. And Albus has learned to just go with it.

synopsis: "Mais tu es déjà à genoux, Severus. Fais comme tu as toujours fais. Sois lâche. Abandonne. Tu n'es plus à une loyauté fourvoyée près." Dans la nuit, il y a vingt ans, il avait fait une promesse. Ne l'a pas tenu. C'est sans compter sur un fin stratège du nom d'Albus prêt à tout pour remporter cette guerre. Quitte à employer un peuple dénué de toute pitié. Ainsi que sa Némésis...

author: coniurationum
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P., Regulus B.
synopsis: Walczyli głównie sami ze sobą. Ale nikt nie miał prawa tego oceniać. ﾟ Są także dwa słowa-klucze i każdy dobrze to wie, jak trudno przed nimi uciec. Wybieraj: tak albo nie.
title: Wszyscy zabłądziliśmy

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco has a flair for the dramatics
title: Dramatic Packing

author: Irene Disldoe
synopsis: Hydra était aux Malfoy ce que Sirius était aux Black. Déterminée à suivre sa propre voie, la jeune fille se détourne de celle tracée par sa famille, quitte à défier cette dernière et à s'allier au camp adverse. Du moins, jusqu'à ce qu'elle attire l'attention du Seigneur des Ténèbres... L'intérêt d'un Mage Noir n'est jamais à prendre à la légère...
title: Hydra Malfoy

author: marauders4evr
characters: Harry P., Regulus B., Dudley D.
synopsis: On 31 July 1991, Harry Potter adopted a cat and Dudley Dursley saved it. Neither child expected that the cat would adopt and save them, in turn. Yet, that is exactly what Regulus Black does, transforming his appearance, his life, and their world. The family grows closer, stronger, and greater, by the day. For anyone who needs a home is welcome at The Lilypad.
title: Lilypad: Year One

author: reviews
synopsis: ¿Cómo lo hace? Ni siquiera Ginny acierta todas las veces. Entonces ¿cómo logra Hermione distinguirlos todas las veces? ¿Qué es lo que está viendo ella en ellos?
title: La diferencia

author: RedFaether
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Fleur D., Regulus B.
synopsis: 1995. Regulus Black fait irruption dans la cuisine du 12, Square Grimmaud. 2003 : Même l'herbe ne parvient plus à pousser sur la terre brûlée du Royaume Uni. "Il n'y a pas d'après guerre". Les paroles funestes résonnent dans l'esprit d'Harry. Il n'y a pas d'après-guerre, et l'espoir s'enfuit de la boîte de Pandore.
title: Le Chagrin et la Pitié

author: Queen of the Northern Lights
synopsis: A brief moment is all it takes to change the course of history. When a split second decision sends ripples that threaten to drown the magical world, Hermione must find the courage to carry on when all hope is lost. With her friends gone, Hermione must rely on unlikely allies to right the wrongs of her past. Hermione X Regulus. Multiple pairings. Time travel AU. Complete.
title: A Stitch in Time

author: reviews
synopsis: UA, 2002. Harry a quitté Londres pour Liverpool quelques mois auparavant. Là-bas, il a rejoint un groupe de jeunes LGBTI dans lequel il se sent bien. Il a enfin trouvé sa place. Mais il se pourrait bien que sa tranquillité soit bien vite perturbée par sa rencontre avec un autre jeune un peu trop égocentrique pour son propre bien... / Illustration : Upthehill
title: Je veux ton corps

author: honeysweetcutie
characters: [Draco M., Hermione G.] [Ron W., Luna L.]
synopsis: [DARK] When Hermione spoke for Lucius at his trial, she didn't realize how big her sacrifice would come to be. Eighth Year begins, she is invisible, and Draco can't seem to keep his eyes off of her. Hermione is attacked and it sets off a series of events that will change their lives. [possessive Draco, OOC, semi non-canon compliant, trigger warnings]
title: Invisible

author: DramioneIsMyOTP5Eva
synopsis: When Hermione Malfoy gave birth to her baby girl, never once did she anticipate the sadness that came with her. Hermione, Draco and their family's experience with Post Natal Depression.
title: Pandora's Box

author: expectopadfoot
synopsis: There are two similarities between Harry Potter and Daphne Greengrass. Both of them are partial to their mothers and both of them hate each other passionately. When they are elected as the Head Boy and Head Girl of Hogwarts, can they put aside their personal issues and work together? AU with Neville as BWL. Rated M for multiple reasons.
title: Don't Look Back in Anger

author: caughtinblackseyes
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Neville L.
synopsis: Hermione is shocked to learn that her father is actually her Squib uncle and she was given to him to keep her safe. Hermione is ready to return to the Wizarding World to claim her legacy. She's going to take Hogwarts by storm while dragging along her friend Neville.
title: Hermione Dagworth Granger

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione recibe unas series de cartas de su futuro yo para que cambie 10 momentos a fin de no arrepentirse de lo que va a pasar. ¿Qué hará Hermione? ¿Qué puede cambiar con solo 10 momentos? Un fic que empecé a subir hace mucho tiempo antes de que me fuera de Fanfiction y que quería retomar.
title: Cartas para Hermione

author: SamiSaka
synopsis: Travail d'écriture / Histoire Participative. 2 Mai, quatre ans après la guerre, la vie de Harry n'a rien d'un rêve, plongé dans la dépression, il ne parvient pas à sortir la tête de l'eau. Réussira-t-il à s'en sortir et retrouver le bonheur ?
title: Graal

author: Creative Nothing
synopsis: Harry Potter and Tom Marvolo Riddle were born in the same year. No pairings. The year is 1962, their seventh and final in Hogwarts. The Cold War looms over the world, the goblins rise against one another, poverty and crime skyrockets. Meanwhile, Tom Riddle continues his search for the Chamber of Secrets, as well as for the secrets of immortality. /Jan 2020: I'm very busy, no update
title: Crimson Blood

author: Eric128971
characters: Lucius M., Bellatrix L., Cedric D.
synopsis: All Muggles hoard their wealth. In this land it is printed on plastic. In others as a pale green paper. All Muggles waste this wealth, dying surrounded by everyone's name except their own, names uttered with the same frequency and respect due jam, tea, and cake. Truer green is a spell that I know well. And true names are invoked only by those who do not fear death.
title: Voldemort Was Right: Serpents, Black Hair, and the Brass Triptych

author: paltropie
synopsis: In the Forbidden Forest, instead of death, a seventeen year old Harry Potter made one choice that has altered the course of history. People aren't who they're supposed to be, and nothing is as it seems. The Dark Lord won the battle, but who will win the War?
title: The Stars that Incline Us

author: reviews
synopsis: Besoin d'aide pour retrouver une fic
title: HELP

author: spitfyre1
synopsis: Magic is displeased with the abuse of one Harry James Potter, so it personally saves him. What will Harry's life turn out like with the resurgance of friends in the past he never knew he had. Watch out Dumbledore and Voldemort, the marauders have returned and they wont take the same crap they did before.
title: The northern fox

author: Spyglass1
synopsis: - Я, Гарри, сын Джеймса, внук Чарльза, наследник Домов Поттер и Блэк, явился в твердыню моего врага, Тома, сына Меропы, внука Марволо, наследника Домов Гаунт и Слизерин, и требую Переговоров! ...Вот и поговорили.
title: За столом переговоров

author: SiarrahKrum
characters: [Hermione G., Viktor K.] [Luna L., Neville L.]
synopsis: Post-war. Hermione, Harry and Ron were set to become successful Aurors. But she needed more. She finally decided to stop following her two best friends and make a life of her own. HG/VK.
title: Taking a Break

author: reviews
characters: James S. P., Fred W. II
synopsis: James Sirius Potter et Fred II Weasley sont cousins. Ils aiment faire des blagues et amuser la galerie même s'ils doivent supporter les retenues qui viennent ensuite. Cependant, cette année, leur voyage en train semble calme, trop calme. Quelle en est la raison? (Désolée, je n'ai absolument aucune imagination pour les résumés)
title: Qui est-ce?

author: tweety-src-clt9
synopsis: After the war, Harry's inner demons unleash a darker and more dominant side of him that seeks to exert control in all things, most especially on the one woman he's been secretly in love with for so long. Will Hermione be able to heal him and can she take all of his pains away? A BDSM story.
title: Exerting Control

author: TVfangirl46
synopsis: What would it be to get the Potions professor to let his walls down and fall in love? Come join me Hermione Granger as I tell my story of How I Fell In Love With My Potions Professor.
title: How I Fell In Love With My Potions Professor

author: reviews
synopsis: The first person to be sorted by the Sorting Hat was Hannah Abbott. That is clear. Look it up. Then why does Trivial Purtsuit: World of Harry Potter say that the answer to the question 'Who is the first student to be sorted by the Sorting Hat during Harry's first year' is Hermione Granger! Her surname starts with G! Granger clearly wasn't the first person to be sorted that year.
title: Trivial Pursuit Mistake & an extraordinary short Fanfic

author: Athenas de Aries
synopsis: Após o fim da guerra, Harry descobre algumas novidades, como o fato de ser um veela. A busca por seu parceiro e novas descobertas são contadas nessa história pós-guerra. Alguns personagens não morreram durante a guerra como Snape. Fic Drarry.
title: O futuro de Harry Potter

author: reviews
characters: [Andromeda T., Bellatrix L., Harry P., Narcissa M.]
synopsis: 1 man will be the real heir to Salazar legacy
title: THE TRUE HEIR OF SALAZAR SLYTHERIN
pairing: Andromeda T., Bellatrix L., Harry P., Narcissa M.

author: Gabriele Snape
synopsis: Severus Snape ao perder o amor de sua vida, Hermione Granger, decide usar o Vira-tempo escondido na Mansão Malfoy. Ao retornar para o ano de 1967 tem a possibilidade de mudar a sua própria história e daqueles que amava. Até que ponto isso interferirá nas regras do tempo e espaço? Plágio é crime! Originalmente publicada no Spirit Fanfiction
title: Ruínas do Tempo

author: BoxyP
synopsis: It's the mid-seventies, and there is a darkness growing over the Wizarding World: the First Wizarding War is about to begin. But behind every conflict, there are complex events and circumstances setting the world on its doomed path,just as there are those that will allow it to survive to see one of the greatest Dark Wizards fall at the hands of a mere babe. These are those stories.
title: How Doth the World Perish

author: RunningOnMusic
synopsis: Part I. Kenna Hope did not have a normal childhood. A normal childhood was not an option when she'd been adopted by Albus Dumbledore at age 7. But as a natural Legilimens, and with her other abnormalities and personal history, being normal was never an option in the first place. Eventual Charlie/OC Pre-Philosopher's Stone.

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Blaise Z., Daphne G., Hestia C.
synopsis: After his first year Harry comes to realise what the hat was telling him, taking things into his own hands Harry trains himself beyond anything else to become 'The Sorceror Supreme' a title only a select few have ever won.

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., Minerva M., Peter P.
synopsis: The day when Sirius realised that his teen-life crisis was nothing compared to Remus' full-life one. Or, Careers Day at Hogwarts.
title: Raison D'être

author: reviews
synopsis: Its indaverdently thanks to Harry that the Professor and Henchgirl get an idea that may be the worst one ever to hit Humanity.
title: Giant Robot Syndrome

author: reviews
synopsis: Even Sirius Black gets sexually frustrated, he uses polyjuice potion to get his frustrations out.
title: Sirius Black's Pleasurable Release

author: spilled-magic
synopsis: It's Ginny's wedding day. A LONG wedding day. She didn't think she'd getting married now, but she was and she couldn't be more excited. But then a shocking news comes in the morning, and suddenly she starts having doubts over her future with Harry. (P.S.: I am shitty at writing summaries.) (P.P.S.: This is my first fanfiction writing, so please feel free to criticize me.)

author: reviews
characters: [OC, Ginny W., Luna L., Hermione G.]
synopsis: Ginny, Hermione, and Luna have an affair with an american muggle. Remake of my other story, but with the muggle being aged down a bit. Plot? What plot? Porn without a plot. Underage sex. Dont like, dont read. Male reader x Ginny x Hermione x Luna
title: The Muggle affair (last edit)
pairing: OC, Ginny W., Luna L., Hermione G.

author: Jesse Chen
synopsis: Daniel Radcliffe loved remembering his time on the set of Harry Potter. One day, while walking through the park, he picked up a fallen branch nearby and swung it with an "Expelliarmus!" A streak of light streamed from the branch and knocked a walker's phone out of their hand.
title: Rupert Grint and the Tears of Osiris

author: Rikuriroxa
synopsis: When a surprise guest interrupts their honeymoon with an outlandish tale, Emily and Harry are dragged into a mystery involving betrayal, family, and most sinister of all, murder. But are things quite what they seem? The newly wed couple seek to unravel a plot that has haunted them for a decade, but they don't even know it yet. Fem!Voldemort
title: The Disappearance of Emily Potter

author: Kasy2112
synopsis: Narcissa está comprometida y no sabe cómo manejar eso, así que busca la consulta de una de las mujeres Black mas felices que conoce (incluso si es la única que no se ha casado)

author: reviews
characters: [Flora C., Amycus C.] Alecto C., Hestia C.
synopsis: M&MWP, oneshot. There was something missing in her family tree. With Amycus' help, Flora would burn it into her bloodline. *strong T*
title: bad blood

author: reviews
synopsis: This love left a permanent mark / This love is glowing in the dark / These hands had to let it go free / And this love came back to me
title: flicker

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Peter P.
synopsis: When you lie, someone always discovers the truth. For Remus, he tells his friends he was visiting his ill mum or such each full moon. Normally, when people discover the truth, especially when you're a werewolf, it is quite bad. But maybe his friends will understand. My short spin on what happened when James, Sirius, and Peter discovered that Remus was a werewolf.
title: When They Discover The Truth

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione receives a letter from the Ministry. She has been selected for Head Girl! but, during the Hogwarts war, the castle was mostly destroyed and isnt safe for students to learn in. A camp for all the orphans and students at Hogwarts, will take place in the Forbidden forest. As head girl, Hermione must run this camp with the Head Boy, Draco Malfoy. Great.

author: Sophie Mene
synopsis: Después del ataque al señor Weasley, todos los chicos fueron a Grimmauld Place, en un intento por subir los ánimos, Sirius les suelta más alcohol del que debería, esto le dará a un par de ellos el empuje que necesitaban para decir lo que llevaban tanto tiempo ocultando.
title: What if?

author: lovetoomanyfanfics1
characters: [Harry P., Charlie W.] [Sirius B., Severus S.]
synopsis: Welcome to the world of one Harry James Potter. He and his fifth year friends are all a year older than in the books to support this story. Harry finally thinks his life will calm down...to bad that's too much to ask, after all he wouldn't be who he is if he got a quiet life. This time most of his "excitement" comes from his love life. Warnings: mpreg, miscarriage, Merlin's Heir
title: Other Half of My Soul

author: OneMinuteBack
synopsis: Draco se permite por fin ser un adolescente normal. Y, ¿qué hacen los adolescentes? Contemplar a chicos calientes mientras hacen ejercicio. Y hacer el ridículo para llamar su atención, obviamente. [Drarry/Harco]

author: Cazadora Oscura
synopsis: Relatos de 100 palabras sobre diferentes escenas del mundo mágico en distintos tiempos y lugares.

author: WitchyLove14
characters: [Bellatrix L., Hermione G.] Harry P., Ginny W.
synopsis: Dumbledore could hear the commotion below. They were almost out of time. The Death Eaters would be there soon, and he wouldn't get another chance. He pulled out a token and held it out for Draco to take, eyes pleading with urgency. "You must trust me on this, Draco. When the time is right, you'll know. This will give the world a second chance to be better."
title: Let the Light Come and Take Me

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Remus L., James P., Peter P.
synopsis: In their defense, they just wanted a little fun... (Marauder's Era, headcanon credit to maruaders4ever)

author: reviews
synopsis: The man was unreadable on a good day, but she had a sinking feeling he was being painfully, stupidly obvious for her sake. This wasn't going to be easy. "As I said when I first got here: I want to be your apprentice." (oneshot, hg/ss)
title: apprentice

author: Hun in the Sun
synopsis: Harry saves a first-year Slytherin girl from an ambush. As a close bond starts to form between the two of them it turns out she has her own luggage to make his school-year of dodging dementors and Sirius Black even more interesting.

author: reviews
synopsis: (Dash, #85) The game of truth or dare just got a little more serious and personal but she was determined not only to win the game but to win a moment with the very dark and untouchable man she had admired for years. (Another Title Challenge Fic for the Coven)

author: reviews
characters: Remus L., N. Tonks, Andromeda T., Ted T.
synopsis: The chances that Ted Tonks would get a single minute, much less a life, with Andromeda Black were very thin. He intends to leave proof and evidence that these memories and this joy are real. Oneshot.

author: The Red Flag Flies
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Draco M., Severus S.
synopsis: In a world where witches outnumber wizards four to one, a secret ties Harry to the man who sought to plunge the world into war. Britain has barely caught its breath, but the war will soon return. Caught between Dumbledore, Voldemort, and the Ministry, the Boy Who Lived must forge his own path. Mild AU

author: reviews
synopsis: Luna and Ginny end up in St Mungos mental asylum, where Tom Riddle tries to trick them into escaping, but he has some inside help. Warnings: Language, manipulation, violence

author: reviews
synopsis: Lessons with Alecto Carrow definitely isn't fun for anyone. Warnings: Violence, abuse, torture

synopsis: What if Harry just couldn't take everything after Sirius death? What if he gave up? A Short one-shot. Au ending of 5th year, were Harry commits Suicide.

author: reviews
synopsis: "She had told him the muggle stories of romance in this quiet Scottish town, well known for centuries. He wondered if she'd known of it all along, the reason she wanted to visit on the way back into their cluttered reality." Remus quietly muses on his engagement, but Tonks has other ideas. Very short and sweet. Fluffy Oneshot set between HBP and DH. RLNT.

author: reviews
characters: Severus S., Hermione G., Ron W.
synopsis: Todos los caminos me llevan de vuelta a ti.

author: Flumet
synopsis: A Drarry Fanfiction WIP. Another Gryffindor vs Slytherin quidditch match. But what happens when The Golden Boy gets knocked off his brooom and The Slytherin Prince takes a dive to save him? Will secrets be revealed, and if so, what will the consequences be?
title: Secret Snitches

author: closetfangirl98
synopsis: Hermione wakes up naked with a naked Draco after a drunken night.

author: reviews
synopsis: Drarry- Oneshot. Harry and his friends, including Draco are sent to make sure the underwater dome they created is inhabitable, in case of another Hogwarts emergency they would hide all the students in the Black Lake Dome.
title: Black Lake Confessions

author: secretfanficlover
synopsis: Myrtle Warren is a first year at Hogwarts, and she gets the attention from her family name, but it is more than she thinks she can live up to. AU!Pureblood. Warnings: bullying, prejudice

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Teddy L., Victoire W.
synopsis: Teddy Lupin will marry Victoire Weasley tomorrow and Harry Potter still has not written anything for the Father of the Groom's speech. As he watches his peacefully sleeping wife, he remembers a secret he shares with Teddy that he uses as an inspiration for his wedding speech. ONESHOT.
title: The Wedding Speech

author: FirstSilverKing
synopsis: The world didn't end as the masses suspected. Not fire, ice and nuclear fallout. Not a meteor that decimated life on Earth like it did for the dinosaurs. No, the end of the world came with eight people. Not just any people though, Witches and Warlocks. How do I know this you might ask? My name is Harry James Grindelwald and I, with my wife Luna, were involved. Time-travel fic
title: The End of the World As We Know It

author: lubelle321
synopsis: An idea of what would happen after the war. Everyone is pulling the heroes in directions to best suit them, but what do our heroes need? Beginning chapters will highlight healing and acknowledging the need to heal.

author: JustBored21
synopsis: Dumbledore was surprised when Harry Potter, the boy-who-lived, came to Hogwarts. He expected a saviour, what he got was a damaged boy who has no interest in playing hero for anyone. What does Harry want? He wants to be left alone. Harry's only friend is also Voldemort's daughter. Dumbledore, Hermione, select Weasley bashing. Dark/grey, strong, intelligent Harry.Harry x Fleur.

author: The Hufflepuff Marauder
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: Lily and her friends embark on a NO MAGIC weekend at a 1940s event in Birmingham and they meet some interesting muggles with story's of their own to share... (Short Story) LE/JP/OC

author: Night Hawk 97
synopsis: There's a reincarnated time traveller loose in Hogwarts. She's meddling with politics and Horcruxes just to start with, and the fallout is spreading across Britain. Some of her plans work and the outcome is good, even if there are side effects. Others go so wrong it's almost like someone is out to get her.
title: An alternate point of view

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Severus S.

author: reviews
synopsis: The Second Wizarding War solidified Slytherin's reputation as the House of 'evil' witches and wizards. Life has become increasingly difficult for former Slytherins. So, when Damian Greengrass is sorted into Slytherin, he puts all his effort into a revolutionary idea – abolishing the Hogwarts Houses altogether. Next Generation – 2017-2024.

author: revabhipraya
synopsis: It was just Hermione's sensitivity towards stress on every single spell that she heard.

synopsis: Harry goes to the goblins and gets his inheritance. Creature!Independent!Semi-animorphmagus!Harry. Could be k rated but I'm not sure about all of what will happen later in the story.

synopsis: “Apa maumu kalau begitu, Malfoy?” “Terserah. Disini, di ruangan ini, kau mau betulan duel atau cuddling denganku, Potter.” Sindir Draco.

author: HPstorys
synopsis: Fem Harry Potter The next generation travel back for 2020 to revel The Golden Trio Secrets. (M)Some violence, minor coarse language, and minor suggestive adult themes.

He will need to be careful to find those who will look out for him in this dangerous new world he is thrust into.
title: Harry Potter and the Trials of Lordship

author: Deydre
synopsis: El cuento de hadas que imagino nunca existio. Ahora tiene que decidir si quiere quedarse ahi o mirar al frente y seguir. Pero que hacer cuando te han quitado a ti misma.

author: Usernametouse
synopsis: Harry Potter needs an actual bus to pick up a wooden box. Neither Harry Potter nor Neville Longbottom know what is in the wooden box.

author: SlytherClaw4lyf
characters: OC, Harry P., Ginny W., Ron W.
synopsis: Kayleigh Potter (OC) is the daughter of Caelum (James older cousin) and Kendria Potter granddaughter to Charlis and Dorea greatneice to Fleamont and Euphemia Potter and cousin to the famous Harry Potter. But she didn't know that not did she know that speaking to snakes was bad but then again Freaks are always bad. Did I mention that she's an orphan? no? well she is.
title: Kayleigh Potter and Slytherin's Beast

author: reviews
synopsis: While sorting through her jewelry box, Petunia finds two rings from her childhood.

author: Melanie09
synopsis: Hogwarts nunca habia vuelto a ser tan interesante... Hasta que todos vuelven. Un reencuentro de clase de nuestros heroes tan escandoloso que hara que sus actuales alumnos queden en pañales.

author: reviews
synopsis: Après 7 années de lutte contre les forces du mal, nos héros méritent bien de profiter de leur adolescence et enfin écouter leurs hormones! Venez suivre la suite des aventures de notre trio d'or à travers l'adolescence!

synopsis: Harry Potter learns about the magic running throughout his body and learns to harness it through sacrifice and rituals. God!TimeTravel!Grey!Intelligent!Inventor!Harry, this is a person who wants to enjoy the world of magic but gets dragged into other peoples' conflicts he wants no part of. There will be violence and sexual content (depending on how good I am at writing it). Enjoy!

Chaos reigns when the Marauders' heirs aim their mischief for the wizarding world. Told mostly from Azalea's POV.

author: reviews
synopsis: It had been three weeks since Hermione had worked up the courage to tell Draco how she felt, which meant it had been three weeks since she'd seen him or spoken to him face to face, because it had been three weeks, to the day, that he'd shot her down. / EWE, Dramione
title: Thursday

author: reviews
synopsis: '"Knut for your thoughts, dear, Draco?" She chuckled. Harry looked at Draco with a sparkle in his eye. Narcissa was now intrigued about whatever Draco was thinking. Clearly, Harry knew what was going on.' Mentions of Dramione. One shot.
title: New Dynamics and Brotherly Love

author: reviews
synopsis: Dos amores no correspondidos,una boda,¿que saldrá mal?
title: Lluvia

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: Todos le mienten a Harry... y él está harto de esto, ahora, con este encantamiento, nadie le volverá a mentir... O QUIZÁ DESCUBRA QUE LAS MENTIRAS NO SON TAN DESAGRADABLES COMO LA VERDAD.
title: Tras la verdad está… la locura

author: reviews
synopsis: It was an ancient celebration dating back to the time of the Peverell brothers. It was a day when muggles loved magic. It was a day of lighthearted terror, merry morbidity, and other unproductive contradictions. Primarily, it was a nuisance, and this year wouldn't be any better.
title: The Headmistress Hates Halloween

author: Gabriele Snape
synopsis: Narcissa está desesperada por ajuda e vai atrás do seu grande amor para que ele possa salvá-la. Um Oneshot Snacissa para as fãs do casal Originalmente publicando no Spirit Fanfiction

author: Varangian9
characters: Harry P., Draco M., Voldemort, Daphne G.
synopsis: Being a history of the resurgence of the Dark Arts in the years when Harry Potter was a student at Hogwarts. Slytherin Harry AU.
title: Great Wizarding Events of the Latter Twentieth Century

author: LillsBills
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Hermione is 25, the Minister's Undersecretary, and living her life as best she can. But something odd has been happening in the past year, and suddenly her life is over run by Slytherins who bud into her life when and where they can. Dramione. EWE.
title: To Be Happy

author: River9Noble
synopsis: War is hell and PTSD doesn't discriminate. Harry might be wizarding world's new hero, but how is Hermione coping with the after-effects of the war? A certain Slytherin turns out to be the only one who understands. DracoXHermione, Dramione.

author: reviews
characters: [Lily Evans P., James P.] Harry P.
synopsis: Harry thought himself very dull and normal, sure weird things happened around him sometimes. But he was sure that happens to everyone at some point. But then again it seems he was in fact not normal after all He can see is Parents not-Ghosts, and wasn't that a hard one to explain to others...Oh yeah! Apparently he's a Wizard too.

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., OC
synopsis: Can it be so? Is it possible that redemption is something that can be achieved after all that they've done? That's what the friends of Andrew Potter have to find out once the truth about Harry Potter is revealed.
title: Can It Be Possible?

author: reviews
synopsis: Alone in exile and bereft of his memories, Draco Malfoy has been living a solitary existence. Until one day a girl arrives, and he already knows her from his dreams. Dramione.
title: Alone Out Here

author: Sorcerer's Muse
characters: [Harry P., Ginny W.] [Hermione G., Luna L.]
synopsis: The sixth book in my Slytherin Harry series, covering Harry's fifth year at Hogwarts. Come see what happens next as the repercussions of the graveyard and the steps the Order of the Serpent took against Voldemort's resurrection unfold.
title: Harry Potter: Flesh, Blood and Bone

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Blaise Z., Theodore N.
synopsis: femHarryPotter (Evangeline Potter), set in her 5th year. Evangeline Potter has never despised anyone as much as she does Delores Umbridge at this very moment in time as now she must endure as the whole school reads books about her life. And to top it all off? she cant seem to stop thinking about 2 Slytherin boys. WARNING: the final pairing is Blaise Zabini/femHarry/Theodore Nott
title: Evangeline Potter and the truth revealed

author: Bird in Blue
synopsis: As brown eyes met blue, Maggie could not help but wonder - how had she gone from hating Charlie Weasley's guts for the better part of a decade to suddenly feeling weak at the knees around him?

author: ThePurebloodPrincess2604
synopsis: Severus Snape/OC. Sometimes, school sucks, even at a school like Hogwarts. Alistair Leroy can attest to that, being in a class of kids who are two years younger than her, including the Boy-Who-Lived. School drama, homework and a certain dark-haired, moody Professor only make it worse!

author: reviews
characters: Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M., Minerva M.
synopsis: People change and so does love, after everything. Pairing: Hermione/Ron & Hermione/Draco

author: reviews
synopsis: Antonin and his adorable daughter manage life well until a certain French witch decides to go after what she wants. AU - #thewardidnthappen. Written for Sing me a Rare: The Soundtracks
title: Of Kneazles and Macarons

author: TheDRAGONMASTEROFBERK
synopsis: One of the mermaids of the Black Lake always wanted more she wanted to not only to be not ugly and vicious but to be human and a Hogwarts student Thanks to a witch she gets what she wants but there are two ways where she might get turned back If she doesn't receive true love kiss before shes done with school or dying. Will Hogwarts go after her and love her for her If that happens?

author: reviews
synopsis: Tributo para Cristy1994 y DragonGrin, por la historia "Mugglefied" (He leído la traducción). ¿Qué pasaría si Lucius Malfoy conociera la logoterapia mientras está preso en Azkaban?
title: El sentido de la vida de Lucius Malfoy

synopsis: The unseen life of Neville Longbottom. Keeping to canon during his Hogwarts years, but changing after Graduation. Keeping to the books in the beginning, some from the movies from GOF on. Rated T for now, just in case.

author: reviews
synopsis: Sometimes your life doesn't go the way you want it too. This very much reflected the way Harry's life had gone up until this point. Honestly, he had thought himself destined for greatness. After all, he had been born with magic and talent, surely that meant something? But in the end his life and fate turned out less than glamorous. If only he had another chance.
title: Memento Mori

synopsis: My Alpha knows very well what he can put me through.

author: reviews
synopsis: A few weeks before the Battle of Hogwarts, Ginny Weasley reflects on her relationship with Harry and has a heart to heart with her mother.

author: reviews
synopsis: Nadie sabe dónde ha ido y eso le esta matando."Este fic participa en el minirreto de octubre para La Copa de la Casa 2019/20 del foro La Noble y Ancestral Casa de los Black."
title: Lágrimas de alivio

author: reviews
synopsis: Restless Lily spends part of the night with a sleepy James in the common room, even if he doesn't quite remember it. Just some Jily fluff :-) TW: brief cancer mention.

author: secretfanficlover
synopsis: Harry discovers Lucius is a vampire, and he also discovers... that he is in love with the vampire. Blood, VampireAU, Smut

synopsis: Just a sweet, late night exchange between two boys starting over. Implied/Mentioned PTSD, 8th year, pre-slash.

synopsis: Life can throw a lot at you but it only gives you one more chance to make it right.. and It's up to you to make the best out of it. *** NOTE: I don't own anything it all belongs to the amazing J k Rowling and her fantastic world she created for us to enjoy! ***

author: Witch of Truth
synopsis: The polyjuice potion seems like the perfect tool for getting revenge on bullies...but something resembling fairness seems to still exist on this world, and taking things too far may result in a karmic backslash of sorts. A sort of comedy of errors where things will oscillate between being fine and getting worse by the second.
title: A Comedy of Errorsand Polyjuice

author: reviews
synopsis: Cuando Belladona Potter queda embarazada a la fuerza por Lord Voldemort, es cuando entiende que el poder de una madre supera cualquier cosa y logra entender más a fondo las acciones de Lily Potter. Salvara a su hijo al costo de cualquier cosa, aunque sea su vida. (Fem Harry) One-shot.

synopsis: Ginny's had a rough week at Quidditch, but luckily, Harry knows just how to relax her. She definitely owes him. One-shot, slight smut.

synopsis: Hermione drinks a potion made by the Weasleys and Snape; chaos ensues. Hermione/Lucius

Featuring POC!Harry and Hermione. Slow-burn HPTMR.

synopsis: alecto meets a man who knows all too much about her for this to be coincidence.

But where do you go from there? (Dramione)

synopsis: Charlie finds a way to help Hermione cool off.

synopsis: Luna visits Oz

author: reviews
synopsis: Soulmate!AU, VoldemortWins!AU. When Harry wakes up in a cell, he cannot help but wish he'd made a different choice when he was at the foggy King's Cross with Dumbledore.

synopsis: Written for Y5 House Competition. [Song Prompt] Go the Distance from Hercules Not Submitted to the Contest.

author: TomHRichardson
characters: [Hermione G., Harry P.] Ron W., Ginny W.
synopsis: 4 September, 2017: It has been nineteen years and some months since the Battle of Hogwarts; and three days since Hermione and her husband Ron led their two children to Platform 9-3/4. Hermione Weasley wakes up sick, thinking she has the flu. But actually, twenty years' worth of potions all are wearing off. This is a post-Epilogue H/Hr story that bashes Molly, Ron and Ginny.

author: reviews
synopsis: After the war, Draco doesn't think he deserves forgiveness or redemption, no matter how much he wants it. A meeting with his soulmate doesn't change much, until Harry comes to talk some sense into him. PercyDraco.

synopsis: Sirius comes face to face with Death after he falls through the veil, but do they have a proposition for him?

author: reviews
synopsis: Instead of Killing Harry, Voldemort took in Harry and raised him instead.

But when The Golden Trio starts getting into trouble, will Alyssa lend a helping hand? OC-Centric. NO SLASH

synopsis: Two souls who have faced hell will meet, one imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, and another cursed with a body that doesn't match her soul. (Trans-Harry)

author: SuryKat
characters: [Hermione G., Charlie W.] [Harry P., Ginny W.]
synopsis: Hermione cherche à aller de l'avant, tout comme Charlie. Sans que cela ne soit prévu, leurs routes vont se croiser et s'emmêler pour leur permettre d'atteindre leur but. [HG/CW] [M]

author: Amber1408
synopsis: Lui pardonner après ce qu’il a fait ? Il en était hors de question et ça même après tous les évenements qui étaient sur le point de se reproduire. Mais heureusement pour nous que tout ne se passe pas toujours comme prévu.

author: AkibasOmega
synopsis: This is the Drabble for Round 4: The House Competition Harry is left with pounds of grief and sorrow for those lost in the war. The grief and pain of his friends and families death plagued him, as he stayed in Grimmauld Place. He knew he needed to move one, but how?
title: Unspoken Grief

author: reviews
synopsis: The kitchen is one man's domain. It's just how it is.

synopsis: Dobby borrows Death's horse in order to return through time and rescue Harry from the Dursleys.

author: LadyBookwrm
characters: Hermione G., Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: The losses of the 2nd wizarding war were immense. Hermione lost so many people dear to her. Time has healed some of the wounds but some still chafe with every breath. Hermione decides to travel back in time to kill Voldemort in order to save countless innocent lives. What she did not plan on was to fall for a black-haired, motorcycle riding marauder while doing it!

author: RecoveryxZero
synopsis: When Walburga Black gave birth to twins, nobody expected them to turn out how they did. Sirius and Amaris Black are more than a handful, and when they begin attending Hogwarts and become unlikely friends with James, Peter, and Remus, surely only chaos can follow.

synopsis: Ted Lupin picks up a stray

synopsis: The war is over and our favorite Golden Trio is back at Hogwarts to finish their final year. A new Ministry Law throws everyone for a loop and changes their entire outlook on the school year and beyond. Will they rise to the challenges before them, or will they crumble when the curve balls keep coming? HG/DM, HP/PP, RW/DG, BZ/GW. Marriage Law.

author: Xioni101

synopsis: Harry's adventure through the graveyard at the end of GoF is slightly modified and he see's his godfather Murdered. Harry then discovers that he has a Godmother who has no idea until Sirius is killed. Harry's life changes as he moves in with an unlikely Godmother. Takes place at the end of Goblet of Fire. Rate M for Language and Mature Themes

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco may be free but he still feels imprisoned. This was written for The House Competition: Y5R4.
title: Lonely Freedom

author: WeaverofDreams45
synopsis: After Harry dies on a mission to capture the last few rogue death eaters, Hermione does the only thing she can with her grief – channels it into research. On the eve of the sixth anniversary of Voldemort's death, Hermione finally finishes her research – a timeturner with an unlimited span. It will be a one-time trip, but if she times it right, one time will be all she needs.
title: Determination, Destination, Deliberation

author: reviews
synopsis: Sirius is dead. Here's Remus's reaction in the aftermath of the battle of the Department of Mysteries. Takes place during 5th year, a drabble for the Houses Competition. Prompt: [song prompt] Empty Chairs at Empty Tables

author: Gabriele Kazlauskaite
synopsis: A fun little one shot I made.

author: Sangito
characters: [Sirius B., Remus L.] [James P., Lily Evans P.]
synopsis: Serie de drabbles de los merodeadores en época de Hogwarts. Lily x James - Sirius x Remus

synopsis: All first years have dreams when they first step onto the Hogwarts Express. Some dreams are big; some dreams are small... Not everyone will achieve their goals, but the hopes of a first year are strong.

author: reviews
synopsis: "Fortunately, I am someone who is quite gifted in magic. It is something I have always been really good at, and I have decided to invest it in miserable people, wizards and talented witches in need. I can help you. Do you accept young man? Greatness awaits you. It is in your hands to choose the right side of a new world order; you can be part of the greatness of the future"
title: Poor Unfortunate Wizard

author: reviews
synopsis: One-shot, Fleurmione. Curator Hermione Granger was finally given the opportunity to work on the project of her dreams, restoring magical impressionist paintings. Unfortunately, she had to work alongside one of the curators she despised the most, Fleur Delacour.

synopsis: Pansy as a witch conquering the muggle world

author: reviews
synopsis: One afternoon, Harry finds Draco having a philosophical crisis after watching Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. Before he can help him, Harry has to figure out what the problem could possibly be. A short, fluffy one-shot. Post-Hogwarts-EWE. Autumn 2010.
title: Draco's Prejudice

author: Dancingwithmyshadow6
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M., Astoria G.
synopsis: A marriage law is implemented by the Ministry and couples are forced into marriages. Hermione faces her worst nightmare.

author: reviews
synopsis: If you dig deep enough, you'll strike oil, and if you peel back a scab, you'll find fresh blood. / While cleaning out Grimmauld Place in the summer of 1995, Hermione comes across a most unusual locket.

author: IRiSEaGLes
synopsis: Written for The Houses Competition Year 5. Set in the 7th year, Horcrux hunt when Ron Weasley leaves Harry and Hermione behind. Based on the song Defying Gravity by Stephen Lawrence Schwarts Greydog Music. All rights belong to them.

author: 222RunOnSentences
synopsis: The fantasy in my head that I finally had to make an account for. I cannot promise a regular update schedule. This, in an attempt at self-therapy, is going to be unapologetically M and femslash. Set directly after the Hogwarts battle. Constructive criticism much appreciated. Enjoy yourselves, loves.
title: After all this time?

author: reviews
synopsis: Solo sexo. Cero celos. Cero expectativas. Ese era el trato que tenían Rose y Scorpius. ¿Pero que tan rápido puede irse todo lo acordado a la mierda cuando no sean capaces de mantener las emociones alejadas de su relación física?. Sí, esto se va a poner feo. ADAPTACIÓN LIBRE: UGLY LOVE de COLLEEN HOOVER.
title: Trato hecho

author: peacocktruter
synopsis: Fem harry potter

author: reviews
synopsis: Dans un monde magique où il n'y a aucun registre magique qui écrit chaque naissances d'enfants sorciers, il faut bien que quelqu'un fasse le boulot. Malheureusement, le sort s'acharne parfois même sur un enfant qui n'aurait vraiment pas dû être oublié. Et même si Voldemort n'a jamais existé, cela ne veut pas dire que de mauvaises choses n'auraient pas pu arriver... OS
title: Enfant oublié

author: unlikely2
synopsis: The imprint that should have become a portrait was rejected. Across fields of time and possibility, a murmuration of realities twinkling like starry raindrops, in ruined world, where years ago a schoolboy was killed by a werewolf, help has been foretold. Time is unwound. Severus Snape finds himself back in the tunnel with a furry, not so little problem.

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Susan B., Daphne G.
synopsis: Post Hogwarts, post Voldemort. A dirty trap is set for one sneaky reporter. Add in a touch of political hilarity/stupidity and smut and voila. Harry/Susan/Daphne.

synopsis: James Potter knows that his time has come... but he still wished that he could have more time.

synopsis: Something tragic happens that changes the relationship between Albus and Gellert forever. homophobia, murder, blood

synopsis: Dementors are born freezing. From the moment they enter the world in some twisted form of infancy they are cold.

author: reviews
synopsis: Avec la présence des 2 écoles étrangères, le directeur de Poudlard décide de confier à Mery, parlant le Français, la tâche des guider les élèves et la directrice de Beauxbâtons. L'enfant fera honneur à ses aïeux perdus et impressionnera ces nouveaux venus d'un bout à l'autre de la visite.
title: Visite guidée par l'héritière Flamel dans toute sa splendeur

author: bellatrix92
characters: Severus S., Voldemort, Minerva M., C. Fudge
synopsis: J'y suis prêt  . Il a dit cela sans ciller, mais d'une voix blanche. Il a juré et rien ne pourrait le détourner de sa mission. Mais à ce moment précis, il a juste terriblement peur. Fic de la Série "Adieu Severus".
title: J'y suis prêt

author: petals-to-fish
characters: [Lily Evans P., James P.] Peter P.
synopsis: Red. It was such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got jealousy, fear, and frustration. Maybe that's why James thought the nickname fit Lily so well. (Bodyguard!James/Celebrity!Lily)
title: Fearlessly Red

author: Jem Doe
synopsis: There's a pattern to their meetings, secretive as they are. Historical, dubcon.

characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G., Voldemort

Ikuti petualangan The Golden Trio disisipi kisah persahabatan, kasih sayang keluarga dan percintaan (Canon Couple)

synopsis: Traveling back in time to raise a dreaded enemy in hopes of a second chance - not quite unprecedented. Him possibly raising THAT wizard, of all people? Not even considered. Yet. One-shot with surprise characters.

synopsis: This is how Drarry first came to be and how they started go have feelings forr one another

author: reviews
synopsis: Colección de drabbles ambientados en la época de Halloween.

author: TarnishedHeart
synopsis: SS/HG After the war Hermione feels alone and seeks solace in the unlikeliest of people. However, it isn't without a few obstacles and whomps from the Whomping Willow.

author: Alexandra525

synopsis: He did not know why, or how, but a certain bushy-haired, brown-eyed girl suddenly became his heart's desire. H/Hr, N/L, Alternative universe. Slight bashing (Mainly Ron, Ginny and Molly Weasley)

author: reviews
characters: Ron W., Luna L., Draco M., Hermione G.
synopsis: Ron Weasley as Dimension Traveller supreme. Or is he?

author: Trace Carter
characters: [Harry P., Ginny W.] [Ron W., Hermione G.]
synopsis: They won. They won the war against Voldemort, but they lost so much in return. Their friends, their family, so much sacrifice. When Death visits them and offers a deal to go back and change it all, it is too good a chance tor refuse. This time, they'll do it right.

author: reviews
synopsis: Neville decides to act
title: Resolution

author: Dark Nebula120400
synopsis: Stuck in the shadow of his twin brother, the boy who lived, Harry is ignored and cast aside. Slowly he is lowered into a heart of darkness and betrayal. But there is a secret. Damon Potter is not the boy who lived. Can the Wizarding World realize their mistake, or will Harry be lost to the darkness, doomed for his soul to break?
title: When the Soul Breaks

author: reviews
synopsis: Complete. One-shot. What could go wrong with Lucius Malfoy living as a Muggle and learning to cook in a Muggle kitchen? In my opinion, a lot. Enjoy this funny, yet captivating story, as Lucius Malfoy discovers the true meaning of insults and forgiveness.
title: The Many, Many Mistakes of Lucius Malfoy

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco Malfoy never thought they'd be in this position. Two years of working side-by-side at the Ministry, and he never once presumed to think for a moment that Hermione Granger would be his partner on a mission, let alone stuck on the side of a cliff wall with her. If her shallow breathing and pale face were of any indication, neither did she. [ONE SHOT]

Or, la rencontre avec certains camarades et la formation de liens puissants vont peut être changer le destin de toute une génération...

The other was the all-powerful CEO of Malfoy Enterprises International. Clash of the titans erupts as Draco's ambitious business ventures require Ministry consultation and approval. WIP.

author: reviews
characters: Delphi Riddle, Bellatrix L., Draco M., Narcissa M.
synopsis: What happens after Delphi's birth? Parody! Humour!

author: Jessica-Doom
synopsis: He was being played like a well-tuned violin. (Or, perhaps, something less graceful like a tuba?) And it was just so easy to let it happen…. Especially when those lips tasted so decadently of icing sugar and the ghostly tang of raw ginger. "We're talking about this." It was Harry's last attempt. It was futile. (( A sequential 31-day Drarry challenge. #Writober ))
title: Crisp & Golden

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Minerva M.
synopsis: A change here, an accident there, a choice made or unmade, a prophecy unknown is a prophecy unfulfilled. Lily uses some different magic, Harry has an accident and makes a choice, unbound by ideas of Seers.

author: reviews
synopsis: Severus never wanted a cat. He dislikes the creatures greatly. Of course, Hermione has a cat. A cat he's stuck watching for a few days.

synopsis: Fred Weasley has finally plucked up the courage to ask Hermione out to dinner. But she's had a pig of a day and only wants to go home and get into her PJs. How will he feel about her suggestion of an alternate plan?

Will they ever answer her truthfully? Or are the details on how their relationship changed from best friends to lovers be forever kept a secret? ONESHOT.

Worse yet, the person that claims to have been an older version of herself said the baby was someone near and dear to her heart. Will she tell him? What will happen to her life?

Snape POV oneshot Jily Marauders Era

author: Ania Lupin

Nunca imaginaria que o amor da sua vida estaria há horas de se mudar para o apartamento que havia acabado de ser desocupado ao lado do seu. Assim como não tinha como saber que o que colocava ao redor de seu pescoço era mais do que um simples colar.

Morirá por tener la sangre manchada e ideales distintos. Morirá por ser Hermione Granger, la mejor amiga del difunto Harry Potter.

Después su madre, a la que lleva en un retrato y sueña con volver a abrazar. Y ahora Bathilda Bagshot, la vecina, tiene un secreto dorado de ojos azules que quiere llevarse a Albus, su hermano.
title: Muerte velada

author: SurfCurse
synopsis: Stubborn, defiant, and audacious. I really thought I could handle those Slytherins and future death eaters on my own- too bad the Marauders keep getting in my way. Being friends with Lily Evans doesn't help either. How will seventh year play out when tensions between the houses reach a boiling point?
title: Of Moons, Monsters, and Mayhem

author: reviews
characters: Hermione G., Voldemort, Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Hermione is sent back in time by Dumbledore to try and end the war before it starts. But nothing goes to Dumbledore's plan, and the ramifications are more significant than anything anyone could've expected. She left as Hermione Granger but who does she return as? (Hermione x Tom Riddle) All characters and references to Harry Potter belong to J.K. Rowling.
title: Hermione's Odyssey

author: reviews
synopsis: M&MWP, oneshot, femslash. "You still like your Quidditch players?" "Yeah. You still play Quidditch?" "Maybe, if the world doesn't end." -—Demelza and Romilda, as their world shrinks to that of the Room of Requirement.
title: free skies

author: reviews
characters: [Marius B., OC] Dorea Black/Potter, Cassiopeia B.
synopsis: A Marius Black le fue negado el don de la magia, por lo que tiene que labrarse su propio camino en el mundo muggle. Ir a la guerra, casarse y formar una familia, no parece un plan tan descabellado cuando se tiene posibilidad de triunfar.
title: En la guerra como en el amor

author: rossiex
characters: [Abraxas M., Hermione G.] Tom R. Jr.
synopsis: Draco Lucius Malfoy, tidak pernah dalam hidupnya akan membayangkan Hermione Granger sebagai neneknya. Itu adalah hal yang sulit untuk ditanggung, bukan begitu?
title: Lord Malfoy

author: SoftRosess
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: "It seems as if you've been, ah, misplaced." Melody Deadrose and Harmony Violette were just two almost ordinary girls at an orphanage in London, that is until they get sucked into a book. Albus Dumbledore generously lets the two orphans stay to learn at Hogwarts, and in all due time, secrets slowly start revealing themselves to the young girls. Secrets that will change their lives
title: Misplaced

author: poisonrationalitie
synopsis: When the goblin army comes dangerously close to the school she loves, Elizabeth Greengrass wants to join the fight. An Unbreakable Vow has other ideas.
title: promises unsaid

author: reviews
characters: James P., Lily Evans P., Severus S.
synopsis: He's got it down. Well, James Potter has a lot of things down, he's James Potter. But what he's most proud of at the moment is The Stare. The Stare that says oh-yes-I-am-listening-Professor-honestly. When in reality what he's actually doing is straining as hard as he can to hear the whispered conversations of a certain redhead sat behind him.
title: Got It Down

author: reviews
synopsis: Draco Malfoy es un cazarrecompensa del Ministerio de Magia cuando se encuentra con Harry Potter, el indeseable N 1, el hombre más buscado de Inglaterra, cuya cabeza vale 1.000.000 de galeones y la libertad de su familia.
title: Se busca

author: RaveMalfoy
characters: Lily Evans P., Severus S., Marauders
synopsis: Muggleborn Lily Evans has two boys interested In her, The show-off James Potter and the dark arts boy, Severus Snape. Lily Is best friends with Severus, after all they met before Hogwarts. But James really wants the girl and keeps bullying Severus. Who will Lily pick or will she even pick?
title: The Girl

author: reviews
synopsis: Blaise Zabini learns what love is, one year at a time. How to love the world, how to love himself, and then to be loved in return.
title: Love in My Twenties

author: reviews
synopsis: Lily can't really explain the impulse, not even to herself. But she's been more than happy to argue for it, yes. Oh, yes. Because her husband is far too caring for his own good. Rated T for a bad-tempered, heavily pregnant Lily.
title: Nesting

author: DaisyCloud
synopsis: Harry has been behaving rather oddly, the Order of The Pheonix hatches a plan to find out just what is going on. Rated T to be safe. Harry/Bill.
title: Steak Out

author: IamnotJackMesser
synopsis: In the 1920s, a raid on a speakeasy contains an unexpected twist for a Prohibition Agent, casting him headlong into a world lurking in the midsts of the one he's always known
title: Jack Messer and the World Beyond

author: Maybenotahufflepuff
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Theodore N.
synopsis: As the first of the young Azkaban inmates are being released, Hermione decides to try and build a bridge by having a conversation with Theodore Nott. This ends up being the first step on a path towards building an empire. Not sure of pairings yet.
title: Empire

author: reviews
synopsis: After Death envelopes Severus Snape an old friend seeks his whereabouts.
title: One out of a Billion

author: reviews
synopsis: Headmaster Tom Marvolo Riddle settled back in his chair to take in Harry in his entirety. "Cheeky Slytherin," he mumbled. "Arrogant Ravenclaw," Harry shot back. [AU what-if snippet: Slytherin!Harry, not-Slytherin!Voldemort]
title: aftermath

author: Ghostwriter71
synopsis: He is he true "darkest wizard", but who is he? What are his intentions? Who is the beautiful woman they call "The Dark Lady" who accompanies him everywhere? Who is the child that they have raised as their own? How do Minerva, the Malfoys, and the Potters fit into it all? (Fits into cannon, yet certain things outside of cannon, but not really "non-cannon")
title: Father's Child

author: Shayunn
synopsis: Die Hexe Hermine Granger und ihre Freunde mischen sich in die Angelegenheiten des Phönixordens ein. Derweil nimmt der Zauberer Severus Snape einige Dinge selbst in die Hand. Beginn ab Der Halbblutprinz mit Snanger Ship
title: The inner circle

author: Loony cat
synopsis: Tonks and Lupin... They survive. There are a lot of flashbacks but it is happening during the sixth and seventh book.
title: A wolf set free

author: terianoen
characters: [Harry P., Draco M.] [Lucius M., Severus S.]
synopsis: Sequel to These Blooming Hearts. Severus finds himself distraught by Lucius' simple question, Harry confused by Draco's affectionate behavior, and Draco left with the impossible task of trying to figure out how to be a werewolf and a boyfriend at the same time.
title: These Bare Eyes

author: reviews
synopsis: "Dis-moi Malefoy,qu'est-ce que ta putain de famille de Mangemort ne m'a pas pris ?"Ses yeux gris larmoyants et dilatés par la terreur rencontrèrent les orbes vertes luisantes d'Harry Potter, dont le sourire animal déformait les traits de son visage jadis si bienveillants.Le blond ferma les yeux, attendant impatiemment l'heure que la mort avait choisie pour venir l'emporter. OS dark
title: La nuit du chasseur

author: reviews
synopsis: This is just a short, fluffy one-shot. Draco and Harry go to an old Muggle park and laughter/kisses ensue.
title: The Muggle Park

author: Hufflepuffthemagicdragon
synopsis: Some tech-savvy muggle-born manages to patch wifi into Hogwarts. So the Hufflepuffs are all binge watching Netflix before exams, The Slytherins are pirating Billie Eilish, The Ravenclaws are editing Wikipedia, and it takes months for the professors to figure anything out.
title: Sherbert lemon with a capital S

author: reviews
synopsis: Un pequeño oneshot que surgió de la nada. En un intento de hacer notar la obsesión de Tom por Harry, en aquella escena del bosque prohibido, en el que La Luz verde de la maldición asesina nunca llegó, en cambio, Harry fue sumido en un sueño profundo, en el que vive normalmente como un estudiante normal en una escuela muggle, en el que Tom Riddle lo tendrá atrapado ahí para siempre.
title: De almas e ilusiones

author: ListenCloselyWhileILie
synopsis: Snapshots of Hadley (fem!Harry) and Dracos friendship. possible relationship. What will Draco do when he finds Hadley alone so close to the edge, wind whipping her hair and a precipice beneath her feet.
title: Listen Before I Go

author: reviews
synopsis: Sequel to Blame It on Me. Harry's thoughts on his relationship with Ginny, starting at New Year's Eve ball 2001 and ending just before Astoria's Christmas party.
title: If You Could Read My Mind

author: reviews
characters: Ron W., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Hermione wakes up in an unfamiliar room. An unfamiliar bed. She doesn't know how she got there, has no memory of it. But she isn't alone.
title: Unfamiliar

author: Mariya-Munro
characters: Remus L., Severus S., Albus D., Poppy P.
synopsis: An ex Slytherin student with secrets of her own, now works in the heart of Hogwarts alongside her colleagues Severus Snape and Remus Lupin. Attracted to these two very different wizards and struggling with her confused loyalties to The Order of the Phoenix. Which direction will she choose?
title: Absolution

author: reviews
synopsis: how is Hermione and Draco handling their first pregnancy, and which bumps on the road do they meet? my first fanfic ever so... here we go.
title: Dramione pregnant

author: peacocktruter
synopsis: Hi
title: fem harry potter story

author: SiriuslyHooked
synopsis: Rosalie Dursley has always felt like the outsider in her family. Whereas they can be judgemental and cruel, she shows compassion and kindness. When long buried secrets are revealed, she finds herself joining Harry at Hogwarts, against their wishes, and is thrust into a dangerous game that could decide the fate of the wizarding world, torn between the light and the dark.
title: Every Rose Has Its Thorns

author: reviews
synopsis: Following the Battle of Hogwarts, life must go on... Hermione/Ron. Chapter 2 Coming soon!
title: After the Battle

author: Kira5Awesome
synopsis: (AU/ Harco) En un mundo donde las personas nacen con un verso que dirá su alma gemela cuando la conozcan grabado en su muñeca, todos esperan oír esas palabras mágicas.
title: In Bloom

author: reviews
synopsis: Post-war sadness and ghosts. Angsty one-shot. Or actually two versions of the same story: the first one without SSHG, the second one with SS/HG.
title: The Destiny of Cuthbert Binns

author: miui
characters: Draco M., Lucius M., Narcissa M.
synopsis: The Malfoys are given the chance to go back and change the outcome of the war.
title: The Road Once Travelled

author: Tyler Christopher Durden
synopsis: Albus Dumbledore has made many mistakes over the years. But the biggest mistake he ever made, was placing Harry James Potter in the custody of the Dursley’s.
title: Dark Lord Potter

author: reviews
characters: Sirius B., Regulus B., Walburga B.
synopsis: El mundo de Regulus Black era uno de absolutos blancos y negros. Las cosas eran bastante sencillas en general, la verdad: su familia era blanca, sus protectores y aliados; el resto era negro. Sin embargo, esa mañana del primero de septiembre todo estaba en ruinas. Este fic participa en el Reto #38: "Los que no van a Hogwarts" del foro "Hogwarts a través de los años".
title: Natural y antinatural

author: BelleCarth
characters: OC, Phineas Nigellus, Kendra D., Eupraxia M.
synopsis: During her final year at Hogwarts and much to her disgust, Astra Blishwick's family are busy plotting her engagement to the lucrative Constantin Prince. But, contending with the ailing condition of her sister, Eily, and the constant interference of her Head of House, Astra has formed other plans for her future and the only person they frequently feature is Kendra Frey.
title: Astra Blishwick and the Pure-Blood Prince

author: imagineHP
synopsis: It's 1976, and Lily Evans and James Potter are in their sixth year at Hogwarts. As they face teenage drama and struggle to find themselves as they grow up, the political atmosphere around them is getting slowly darker. They, and their friends, are children of the crossfire, their teenage troubles plagued by the war brewing around them.
title: Deep Purple

author: Genuka
synopsis: Voldemort never thought he would discover another parselmouth much less two and to find that one of his most trusted was sworn to protect Potter? Well at least he wasn't insane any more. The pair weren't going anywhere now that he had his hands on them. {No Pairings. Manhandling/Cuddling. Insane!Dumbles. Hedwig dies for a bit & comes back. Designed as a Fun & very AU fic. WIP}
title: Hatchlings

author: reviews
synopsis: When Harry begins Hogwarts, his childhood imaginary friend is still hanging around. (one-shot) Fic Submission for the first annual Tri-Writing Tournament. A response to 'Alexannah's challenge 'Potter and friend'.
title: The Mountains Say

author: GryffindorHealer
synopsis: It's a press and paparazzi feeding frenzy when one of Wizarding Great Britain's most famous couples announce their engagement. They expected that, but when someone from the Ministry unexpectedly moves to take over the planning of their big day, Ginny becomes most unhappy. Harry tries to set things right for her.
title: When Ginny and Harry Eloped- Sort Of

author: Mayura Seno
characters: [Harry P., Draco M.] Ginny W., Blaise Z.
synopsis: Draco ne peut pas rester à ne rien faire alors que son âme sœur, Harry, vient de se marier avec Ginny. Sur fond policier.
title: Mon âme soeur

author: reviews
synopsis: ONE-SHOT. For the first time in her life, Rose attends the Hogwarts Battle Remembrance Ball. When she runs into Scorpius Malfoy, her heart skips a beat. A few years ago he had promised her that he would never see her again and disappear out of her life completely. Obviously, he had failed. Written for the Houses Competition round 4: BONUS Stage and Screen.
title: Never Enough

author: OfMiceAndLice
characters: Harry P., Fleur D., Albus D., Gellert G.
synopsis: Today had to be the worst day of Dumbledores life. The Potters are dead, Harry is with the Dursleys and his sister Iris had to be brought to an orphanage. But to top that off: Gellert Grindelwald escaped his imprisonment. What will happen to the boy-who-lived? Who will reach him first? Forces of darkness are lingering in the shadows. Harry is the son of Grindelwald.
title: The Son of Grindelwald

author: LizzieMusketeer
characters: Draco M., Oliver W., Marcus F., Theodore N.
synopsis: Récit parlant d'Yseult Nott et de son amie Mina de Longbourn. Deux élèves de Poudlard, l'une est à Poufsouffle et émancipée lors de sa sixième année car rejetée par sa famille à cause de son dégoût pour la magie noire, l'autre une Choixpeauflou des quatre maisons qui a finalement choisi Serdaigle. De nombreux élèves croiseront l'histoire de ces deux amies.
title: Orgueil, Sombrals et Préjugés

author: Tsuruga Lia1412
synopsis: Harry Potter siempre estuvo obsesionado con Draco Malfoy, y viceversa, hay demasiadas cosas malas para un posible futuro juntos, es por eso que los ojos de Harry no pueden dejar a Scorpius… ¿Qué sucede en el caso de Draco? Harry Potter & Scorpius Malfoy
title: Amor Reemplazado

author: ScoroseStories11
synopsis: Having shocked her family and the world with her sorting, Rose Weasley adjusts to her new life with the help of an unexpected friend - Scorpius Malfoy. Excerpt: Without a word, he drew her tightly to him for a hug and pressed her face into his chest for a few moments. This story follows Rose as she grows up during her time at Hogwarts. Rated M for later chapters. Please R&R
title: Mistress Malfoy

author: femmedefoi
synopsis: The war is over, so where are Harry and Ginny now? Harry's finally settled into a position that's made for him, and Ginny is thriving as a chaser. Life is normal. Life is good. All is well. A one (maybe two) shot on where Harry and Ginny are post-war, inspired by a tumblr post and its responses.
title: All Was Well

author: Dentures
synopsis: Hermione works herself to the bone, futiley. Harry is struggling to figure out who he is after the fulfillment of his prophecy. And they both wonder why the world they worked so hard to save doesn't seem to get any better. A man struggles with his sins, and his family's. Can these flawed, marred people save Wizarding society from itself? Does it even deserve to be saved?
title: The Sins of The Mother

author: zcross1997
synopsis: 2013, Arthur Weasley has discovered a Muggle artifact called an iPhone. On there, he finds Muggles use social media to talk to another. He soon finds that not all Muggles are as fascinating or friendly as he hoped.
title: Arthur Weasley and The Consequences of Social Media

author: fizzybubbles13
synopsis: Tonks and Lupin are on an Order mission, watching Borgin and Burkes when Tonks has a run-in with Fenir Greyback. (RLN, or Remadora) It takes place a week before Christmas, OoTP. (Also, I put the second genre as 'horror' because I wasn't sure how to characterize the run-in with Fenir GReyback. It isn't really horror.)
title: Purple and Grey: 3

author: manic pixie nightmare girl
synopsis: When the war is over, Argus wonders if he truly belongs.
title: the rest is still unwritten

author: reviews
characters: Harry P., Ron W., Hermione G.
synopsis: ¿De cuantas maneras un HARRY puede salvar el mundo mágico? Harry Potter ¿jamás nació? y a causa de eso el mundo mágico trata de sobrevivir como puede.

author: reviews
synopsis: One-shot. While spying on Voldemort in the Shrieking Shack, Harry gets an idea, and things change very fast.
title: White to Move, Mate in Two

author: Baachus
synopsis: Pour une amie, qui aime trop les fanfiction. Rogue/Hermione Pas de synopsis pour le moment.

author: reviews
synopsis: And maybe in those memories, Fred never truly left him. A story about grief, loss and the strength to rebuild and create some mischief along the way. George-centric. Post DH.
title: i solemnly swear

author: Aline Black
synopsis: O motivo de tudo era ele, o único capaz de fazê-la ter dúvidas. (Snamione)
title: Aquela Melodia

author: reviews
synopsis: At the end of their first year, Ron and Hermione agreed that once a year they'd meet and talk things out. They managed that better some years than others.
title: Standing on the Stairs

author: slythadri
synopsis: EWE. Hermione Granger is titular of Defense Against the Dark Arts at Hogwarts. And now that Slughorn retired, a new professor has taken over the post of Potions Master. Dramione. Rated M for language and sensual situations. Oneshot.
title: The Professors

author: reviews
synopsis: It is not often that he gets to be in control. Not when she looks at him with that blazing look in her eyes.
title: To hear you moan my name

author: prina.dean.2
synopsis: Maxim Potter was a rational, intelligent, successful young man. The last thing he needed was to fall in love with his little sister's best friend. He should have known being Harry Potter's son wouldn't make his love life any easier.

author: Villainous Vixen
synopsis: Hermione ends up growing up as a McGonagall. Harry learns there is more to life than the prophecy he was dealt with. HEA. Some Weasley and Dumbledore bashing.
