author: reviews
synopsis: Harry finds something unexpected when he surprises Hermione at her flat one evening. One-shot.
title: Friends?

author: reviews
synopsis: En ce dernier jour à Poudlard, Hermione et Draco reviennent sur certains évènements du developpement de leur relation. Suite de Amour impossible et Et après? OS complet
title: Doux souvenirs

author: reviews
synopsis: The curse on the position of Defense Against the Dark Arts professor has long since been lifted, but people still decide to do other things from time to time. This, of course, leaves the Headmaster to choose a replacement. One-shot
title: The Newest Professor

author: reviews
characters: [Hermione G., Draco M.] Harry P., Narcissa M.
synopsis: Draco and Hermione get close at the beginning of Second Year when Hermione sat with Draco on the Hogwarts. Years later the pair are friends and are oblivious to their growing feelings for each other until Trelawney made a prophecy staring Hermione that forces them to face what's really growing between.
title: What Happens When You Mess With House-Elves

author: reviews
synopsis: The real reasons behind Remus Lupin's resignation at the end of Prisoner of Azkaban.
title: The Resignation

author: Glorioux
characters: [Hermione G., Adrian P.] Harry P., Arthur W.
synopsis: Dedicated to all who believe in second chances. There are at least two love stories here, but this is not a love story between Arthur and Hermione; it is about their filial love; of how they find true love once more. Heartbroken and betrayed Hermione meets Adrian Pucey. He loves her and waits for her while she helps undeserving Harry with his children. Mature Themes- HG-AP-HP
title: Second Chances

author: reviews
characters: Neville L., Alice L., Frank L.
synopsis: Neville goes to visit Frank and Alice at St. Mungo's to tell them about his engagement to Hannah. He gets an unexpected reply.
title: A Reply From The Dark

author: everlovingdeer
synopsis: "A smile," I insisted softly. "Maybe it's brave to keep smiling when the world seems hell-bent on erasing that smile?" "Well," he started slowly, watching me with eyes that were so gentle I almost couldn't keep looking at him, "then you're the bravest person I know."
title: Braver than the Bravest of Us

author: deathvalley101
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Draco M., Severus S.
synopsis: Harry Potter is a young boy(girl) who entered Hogwarts, like every other British witch and wizard does at 11. Except, what if this time around, Harry knew a little more about him(her)self thanks to a little outside influence. Trans Harry. Slytherin Harry. Modern Times. Author messes with Canon a bit.
title: Ye O Cunning One

author: MesmerAnto
synopsis: What happens when the bride needs saving from the groom, when she's dragged to the altar with no way out? When the people she loves smile at her while she wants nothing more than for the earth to swallow her whole. She tried to save the world, but who'll save her?
title: Decaying Wedding

author: reviews
synopsis: Luna Lovegood is prowling the halls of Hogwarts, providing protection for all who end up in her sights. But from what, and why?
title: Lovegood's Shield

author: SlytherinDog
synopsis: Harry Potter parent's are alive. He was sorted into Slytherin, of all places.His mum, dad, and godfather were all in Gryffindor. Everybody thinks he believes he is a Death Eater, and they are partially right. TO add onto the stress, he starts to fall for a certain redhead, Ginny Weasley.
title: A True Slytherin

author: DaisyFosterer
characters: Harry P., Daphne G., Tracey D.
synopsis: What will happen when Harry Potter makes friends with a couple of Slytherins? How will the famous Harry Potter change when he is consistently around Slytherins? An A/U version of Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's (or Philosopher's) Stone. *will have Dumbledore and Weasley bashing*
title: Harry Potter and the Slytherin Schoolmates

author: XxX Valar Morghulis XxX
synopsis: Sometimes silence is the only way to express things without truly giving away how you feel about the other person, lest you let those feelings get in the way of everything. Argon Dracon and Octavia Pandora are two such individuals who dare not openly say things, but choose to allow the silent moments to express how they feel. (All credit for Argon Dracon goes to ChiefyBoi.)
title: Silent Moments

author: king og the sky
synopsis: An ancient spell book that fount its way to Harry. James. Potter suposely written by the a-legend creator of the foundation of all that is known about magic. no one knows if he really exist but this old book is real so take that how you will (sorry for bad grammar. these spells are your's to use i will be on the look out for them ind story's of harry potter and hope they are used
title: Hexes, curses, and chames of magic by Gandalf The Grey

author: MarcelaBrjs
synopsis: Our heritage has been kept a secret for too long. Bide your time and never forget, the heiress doesn't bow to a madman, and most definitely not to a usurper. We are Pure-bloods, we don't bend the knee, we challenge those who seek to destroy the very magic that flows through our veins. Remind his followers what the Pure-bloods truly stand for, become an heiress worthy of Slytherin.
title: Heiress to Slytherin's Legacy

author: HarmonysAlchemist
synopsis: An AU sixth year story. An emotionally damaged Harry spends the Summer after his fifth year healing with Hermione. Their relationship deepens and as threats come from all sides during a turbulent school year, they come to realise they can only rely on each other
title: Harry Potter and the Alchemist's Cell

author: reviews
characters: [Harry P., Draco M.] Voldemort, Albus D.
synopsis: What happens when Albus decides to give second chance to Voldemort a night before the final battle
title: What did Voldemort see in The Mirror of Erised

author: reviews
synopsis: Well...you know how you wish for something to happen and when it does, you can't seem to understand what or how things are happening around you. That's how I feel right now...my wish...as was with countless others...Harry Potter the Boy-who-Lived and me the Boy-who-wished. I am here now and I have Magic...I will live my own way..even in this crazy and dangerous world...
title: The Reader's Wish

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione Granger is pregnant. Trouble is, she has not slept with a man during the past decade. Which is why the whole pregnancy business is rather unexpected, and the reason she sought out Harry and Ginny for advice. Postwar, EWE? Cracky.
title: An Unfortunate Coincidence

author: secretfanficlover
synopsis: Bounty hunter Regulus Black teams up with his brother, detective Sirius to take down a crime boss. MuggleAU.
title: Brother's Black

author: secretfanficlover
synopsis: Umbridge has a change of heart after being dragged off into the forest by the centaurs.
title: Worth The Risk

author: MischefCompleted
synopsis: What happens next? Will Harry And Malfoy Get together? Read to find out! This fanfiction will updated weekly i’m currently taking suggestions :)
title: Harry-X-Draco

author: reviews
synopsis: His attraction to her was not out of the ordinary – he was always painfully, depressingly aware of her presence anywhere, capable of identifying and discerning her from everyone else in the exact, suspensive moment when she entered any room – but her positive reaction to it definitely was.
title: the world is bloody awful but you are everything

author: reviews
characters: George W., Angelina J., Fred W.
synopsis: Lorsqu'il se tait, George a l'impression d'entendre la mer. Comme lorsque, enfant, il collait les coquillages à son oreille. Mais il n'est plus un enfant depuis longtemps.
title: Le bruit de la mer

author: J26596
synopsis: What if Sirius had a son who was raised like Harry in the muggle world as an adopted son and wanted to find his biological family when he went to Hogwarts? What if he became friends with Harry and together House Black and House Potter changed the course of wizarding history and the war? This is my first story so please review and enjoy
title: Rise of House Black

author: joemjackson
synopsis: After altering JKR's books [and assorted fanfics] 250 ways HDD hit retirement age. Never fear, his son picks right up. Anything may happen, be it canon or fanfic. Beloved character gets earful; villain redeemed; comic relief. Sequel 1shots are planned. Suggestions welcome.
title: Son of Harry Does Different

author: reviews
synopsis: Tom Riddle will stop at nothing in his conquest to live forever. **Crown's Choice and Winner of Slytherin Cabal's Death by Quill 2019 Writing Competition**
title: The Fourth Heir

author: reviews
characters: Albus S. P., Scorpius M., James S. P.
synopsis: Albus and Scorpius discover a way to make their next school year one to remember, but things quickly get away from them.

author: reviews
synopsis: Not even death can keep him from her. **Winner of Slytherin Cabal's Death by Quill 2019 First Round.**

author: reviews
characters: Lily Evans P., Severus S., Albus D., Horace S.
synopsis: Severus desires to be in Slytherin. But when Lily is sorted into Gryffindor, he changes his mind. But how is he going to convince Slughorn to make him a Gryffindor?

author: Paersephone
synopsis: COMPLETE. Hermione finds herself entrusted with the Hallows and someone's quest of power throws her in a never-ending dance. Tomione ficlet.
title: Pomegranate Seeds

author: Lia-the-slytherin
synopsis: A one shot about harry getting revenge against the Dursleys for the way he was treated. Rated M for violence and because i'm paranoid.
title: Blood

author: AzielleBlack4580
synopsis: "Avada Kedavra!" After Harry is hit by Voldemort's curse, he wakes up in his ten year old body. Follow Harry as he uses the information from his past life to defeat Voldemort and maybe save a lot of lives along the way.
title: Wake Up To Start Over: Book 1

author: MlleVioletta2100
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P., Severus S.
synopsis: A collection of Harry Potter drabbles in response to John Koenig's "Dictionary of Obscure Sorrows". Particular focus on Severus Snape.
title: Obscure Sorrows At Hogwarts: A Drabble Collection

author: AzielleBlack4580
synopsis: "And Pain, Misery and Death was him. " Harry gets sick over the summer with an incurable disease. Sad and emo.
title: Pain Misery Death

author: Harrison Aldrich Emrys
synopsis: A Time-Travel fic. Harry Potter in his 450 years of living has had many accomplishments to name, but he isn’t happy. Not since his first love was stolen from him, then murdered. There were others who came close to filling the bond, only to die in one or another, to the point where his heart is completely closed off. When he finally decided that he is ready to move on and walk throu
title: An Old Man’s Second Chance

author: applesten
synopsis: What if Bellatrix and Rodolphus Lestrange had had a daughter during the first war, who had to grow up without her parents, living among the winners of the war as a child of the losing side? This is the story of Cassandra Lestrange, a girl with the fierceness of her mother and the determination of her father, lovely and lonely, who belonged only to herself.
title: Solitary Daughter

author: reviews
synopsis: Theodore Nott was only a boy when he met Hermione Granger. But even though she doesn't remember him, he never forgot. A birthday gift for mcal.
title: Forgotten

author: reviews
synopsis: Hermione Granger is known for knowledge, but sometimes you need a little faith.
title: Faith

author: kagura2409
synopsis: Ou comment JKR aurait pu nous éviter le tome 5! Parce que Harry n'est plus un gosse, qu'il en à marre de se laisser faire, mais qu'il n'a pas besoin de convaincre tout le monde. Il à juste besoin de convaincre un seul homme. Et de devenir un chef de guerre! No bash, mais sérieuse mise au point pour Dumby :p Parce que mon Harry en à marre de laisser les autres décider pour lui!
title: Deux Mots Qui Auraient Pu Tout Changer

author: reviews
synopsis: Think of Cedric. How fast he had to run. All that training he did for the Tournament. / Cho grapples with an enemy she cannot name. / Title credits to 'Waves' by Dean Lewis.
title: it takes control of the person that i thought i was

author: reviews
synopsis: As her twenty-seventh birthday comes and goes, Hermione finds herself seeing the Potions professor in a much different light. It would help if she had any idea how to accept her feelings for what they've been disguised as all along. [ONESHOT]
title: In the Middle

author: Ashabel
characters: Harry P., Draco M., Daphne G.
synopsis: Umbridge demands all students be resorted. I bet you can guess where Harry ends up. Harry learns a thing or two with his own resorting. Harry starts to question his own beliefs and where is loyalties will fall. Especially after his best friends start to cold shoulder him, after his resorting. Will he still fight Voldemort? Only time will tell. Beta required if interested PM me.
title: Educational Decree Number 29

author: reviews
synopsis: The awkward "are we dating?" conversation. (Drabble)
title: Are We Official?

author: AngelsInTheMist
synopsis: A horcrux was never meant to be biological, Voldemort should've known the consequences, and now Harry pays for them
title: Illusions and Delusions

author: BlueWater5
characters: Harry P., Severus S., Minerva M., Padma P.
synopsis: Old prejudices still exist when Severus Snape's son starts Hogwarts. Students in the next generation have to come to grips with the past and overcome the challenges left by their parents. Not all will succeed.
title: Always the Beginning of Something

author: scarvletchaos
synopsis: "Draco's heart thudded in his chest, feeling like it was going to explode. He moved slowly down the corridor, his footsteps echoing against the stone underneath his feet. He was certainly taking his sweet, precious time getting to the Room of Requirement..." in which Draco lets his mind run wild a few moments before he has to let death eaters into the castle
title: A Vanishing Cabinet

author: MaxMizuhara
synopsis: Remus shares his love for music with Sirius one day at Hogsmeade. This starts complications for the two when Remus begins to wonder why he is important to Sirius and James. Rated for Language.
title: So What Now?

author: SPDrAnger006
synopsis: These are the thoughts of Lucius Malfoy, after the battle of the ministry in OP.
title: After the Battle of the Ministry of: Lucius Malfoy

author: rakesdanielle
characters: Severus S., Harry P., Hermione G., Draco M.
synopsis: Ella Snape is the daughter of Severus Snape the Professor of Hogwarts.
title: Hogwarts Life

author: reviews
synopsis: Andromeda Tonks remembers her sister.
title: Only Seventeen

author: reviews
synopsis: Après la guerre, une fois Voldemort vaincu, Harry a besoin de temps pour panser ses plaies. Entouré de ses amis, il essaie de reprendre sa vie normalement, mais certaines choses ont changé et ce n'est pas du goût de tout le monde... OS COMPLET
title: Rupture

author: Herochick007
synopsis: After another horrible day, Neville goes to the lake to be alone. There he discovers a secret his classmate Hannah has been hiding. Will this form a new friendship between the two?
title: Magic in the Water

author: reviews
synopsis: Piers has to get away, and he goes to the one person he thinks might help.
title: Almost There

author: reviews
characters: [Rose W., Scorpius M.] Albus S. P.
synopsis: Albus watches enviously as Rose and Scorpius pair up through the medium of a sex ed lesson. Written for Practice Round One of the International Wizarding School Championship.
title: Of Bananas and Brilliance

author: reviews
synopsis: Sirius does not fear that flash of lime-green light that has claimed the lives of so many whom he loved.
title: Angel of Small Death

author: reviews
synopsis: Filius Flitwick deals with his past and decides his future
title: Goblin Council

author: Jack Allen26
synopsis: *THIS IS BEFORE HARRY POTTER WAS BORN* A young girl named Hunter goes to Hogwarts. While on the train, she meets another first, Bennett. Bennett and Hunter get along very well, but once Bennett gets sorted into Hufflepuff, Hunter gets into Slytherin. Their friendship is torn apart. Every Slytherin needs a Hufflepuff, but can they make up before Hunter joins the Dark Lord?
title: I Hate You

author: reviews
synopsis: Jacob Kowalski is many things, but a hero is not one of them.
title: hero (n)

author: Hikaria360
synopsis: Harry est sur le point de mourir de vieillesse quand il se retrouve dans une gare King's Cross immaculée de blanc. On lui annonce alors qu'il a la possibilité de "jouer" à nouveau sa vie comme dans un rpg. Au début absolument pas tenté, Harry va faire des découvertes qui vont le faire changer d'avis et qui vont le motiver à se lancer sérieusement dans le Jeu de la Vie...
title: La Saga du Jeu: Tome 1

author: Flying Bufff
synopsis: When Harry lost everything he cherished to kill Voldemort, a Time Mage came to give him another chance to protect the ones he loved and perhaps something more. Harry is transported to an alternate timeline, a timeline where he is 10 years old again and everyone is still alive... and so are his parents!
title: The Reality He Wished For

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry knows just how to relax Ginny after a hard practice
title: All These Things We Do

author: reviews
synopsis: Sybill Trelawney's first prediction and its aftermath
title: The Seer and the Savior

author: reviews
characters: Minerva M., F. Flitwick, Andromeda T.
synopsis: Filius Flitwick was just like everyone else, until he received his Hogwarts letter and was introduced to some world shattering truths about who he was, and what. Goblins, one shot, Sorting
title: Filius Flitwick: Origin

author: SarahC1985
synopsis: Voldemort's evil knows no bounds, so he'll destroy anyone's dream, even the most personal ones. Once he has, can they be restored to come true in the end?
title: Captured for love

author: HDTaggart
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Severus S., Fleur D.
synopsis: Part I of Harry Potter Unbound. Harry Potter has been the outcast of Slytherin for the last three years. With the beginning of the Triwizard Tournament everything changes. Harry discovers hidden talents and allies, but also many enemies. The tournament is the beginning of drastic change in Harry that will alter the wizarding world. AU Slytherin!Harry, Gray!Harry, Ravenclaw!Hermione
title: Harry Potter Unbound: Fourth Year or 'Much Ado About a Goblet'

author: reviews
synopsis: Albus Dumbledore is looking for a new Charms Professor.
title: A Charming Fellow

author: ginnys01
synopsis: Filch meets the new librarian.
title: In need of a friend

author: KeepSmiling1
synopsis: For the Houses Competition Forum, Filius just wants to be known for something meaningful. Finding one's purpose, however, isn't an easy feat.
title: Finding Your Purpose

author: ginnys01
synopsis: Everyone loves a prank, no-one more than the Marauders, but has the last prank gone to far for Remus?
title: A Prank to far

author: reviews
synopsis: Written for The Houses Competition, year 5. There is a buzz in the Daily Prophet's newsroom and a certain bug is bound to find the scoop.
title: Strength Speaks the Truth

author: AkibasOmega
synopsis: This is a Standard, for The House Competition. Sybill worries about her interview for the Divinations position after a visit from relatives. Then the interview itself. She so badly wants the job. Slight OCness, no bad language or anything like that.
title: Her Determination

author: reviews
synopsis: Written for The Houses Competition, year 5. Sybill Trelawney is about to embark on her newest adventure - going to Hogwarts as the ghost of her great-great-grandmother gives her final words of advice.
title: A Future Most Seen

author: AkibasOmega
synopsis: This is a Drabble, for The House Competition! A Sphinx is waiting for a student. Harry had never seen the large creature that towered over him as it guarded the Tournament Cup. Of all of Hagrids dangerous creatures, this was what they had chosen for this opening? A Sphinx? Perhaps it wouldn't be so hard to get around her? There might be slight OCness! Rating is what it is.
title: Of All Things, Really?

author: reviews
synopsis: The Houses Competition Drabble Round 3. The evolution of Lily and Snapes relationship
title: Turning Tables

author: stillplayingpretend
synopsis: Argie's remembrall is making him remember some things he'd rather forget... A twist ending for a familiar character. A one-shot for the houses competition. Prompt: [Object] Remembrall .
title: I forgot

author: reviews
synopsis: The Houses Competition. Round 3 standard. What if there was a prophecy concerning a speaker that would bring about Voldermort and his end. What if the Catalyst was Argus Filch?
title: Whispers

author: reviews
synopsis: ONE-SHOT. Cornelius Fudge tried to protect Harry and Dumbledore the best he could. He did, he really did. Written for the Houses Competition round 3: Forgotten Heroes.
title: The Cerberus Project

author: KeepSmiling1
synopsis: For the Houses Competition Forum Humans haven't been seen by Nakhte's sphinx colony in centuries. Someone who looks familiar comes... Drabble
title: Passage of Time

author: reviews
synopsis: Harry and Draco open a magical toy shop, when Harry becomes ill they rush to the emergency room, only to find he has Hippogriff flu.
title: Malfoy's Magical Toy Shop

author: reviews
synopsis: Argus Filch got his first pet when he was six. It was a cruel joke—an unmagical, useless puppy for an unmagical, useless boy—from his father for his birthday.
title: Cloudy Blind Eyes

author: Celestia0909
synopsis: Seraphina Picquery is on a quest to find out more about her father.
title: Yes, My Darling?

author: reviews
synopsis: "Sirius! Quick! How do you describe how beautiful Lily's eyes are?" Started no sensible conversation ever, in the opinion of Remus Lupin.
title: The Marauder's Love Letter

author: amagicae
characters: Sirius B., James P., Lily Evans P.
synopsis: Lily Evans zna Syriusza Blacka - naprawdę zna. Co gorsza, Syriusz Black zna Lily Evans, mimo że uparcie nazywa ją Mary Davis. ・ . Czasy Huncwotów, trochę na opak.
title: Abyśmy nie upadli (czasy Huncwotów, trochę na opak)

author: Slytherclaw Black
characters: [Draco M., Hermione G.] Harry P., Blaise Z.
synopsis: Hermione Granger and Draco Malfoy have managed to become best friends in the years following the war. Is that all they will remain though? Is best friend status all they want to be? Dramione endgame
title: Forest for the Trees

author: J. Berrycloth
synopsis: Daphne Greengrass was Hogwarts most proper Pure-Blood Heiress. Tracey knew better, oh yes she did! As underneath that Icy facade of the girl sitting across from her, tartly sipping her tea with stuck out pinky, was a true rebel! Just the memories of last night almost made the fifth-year Slytherin growl, cursing the day that her girlfriend discovered muggle Punk and Rock music.
title: My troublesome Rebelling Rocker

author: reviews
synopsis: She got her old expandable bag and collected her belongings. All this negative energy had taken its toll; it was time to leave. She paused on some old photos of her and Ron smiling at Hogwarts. They looked happy. These smiling children pictured were only ghosts of a past that clearly would never return. They were very different people now, destined to take separate paths.
title: I can't

author: Euphemia Lovegood
synopsis: Disclaimer: All the characters on this story are created by the wonderful J. K. Rowling, not by me.
title: Some random Wolfstar oneshots

author: reviews
characters: Severus S., F. Flitwick, Xenophilius L.
synopsis: A thunderous sound startled him, causing him to lose his balance, and he fell. He rose to his feet and adjusted his robe as he regained his composure before investigating the source of the loud sound. What are those little rascals up to now? In the hallway outside, he found two Gryffindors assailing upon a lone Slytherin, who appeared flustered, being outnumbered.
title: The Ravenclaw Professor

author: reviews
synopsis: 1st September, 1998. Bowing to Ministry pressure (the tossers), Lavender returns to school for her eighth year. A story of purple weasel friendship.
title: Lavender's (Eighth) First Day of School

author: reviews
synopsis: There is a reason Jacob Kowalski spent six more years in Europe after the end of the Great War. Written for the Houses Competition Year 5! Standard One-shot!
title: The Fearful Letter

author: MiraculousMarauder
characters: [Sirius B., Remus L.] James P., Peter P.
synopsis: Ridiculous drabbles that follow classic tropes. Mostly Wolfstar. First drabble is based off of a scene from the big bang theory and the room mate agreement
title: Tropes

author: DaughteroftheOneTrueKing
synopsis: Seraphina Picquery begins her path at Ilvermorny.
title: On The Gordian Knot

author: reviews
synopsis: The children across the entire world disappear along with millions of adults but Harry has the answer. - Please note that if this actually happens you can find answers here or at least the reference to where to find the real life warning.
title: The Disappeared Children

author: Rapier124
characters: Harry P., Hermione G., Daphne G.
synopsis: Instead of Durmstrang Academy, Ilvermorny School of Witchcraft and Wizardry was invited to take part in the 1994 Triwizard Tournament. When Ilvermorny arrives at Hogwarts, Albus Dumbledore is shocked to see the long-thought-dead Harry and Lily Potter appear, as well as the missing Sirius Black and Remus Lupin. Harry/Hermione/Daphne; Gabrielle/OFC; Alternate Universe.
title: The Ilvermorny Champion

author: RayanneRegan
synopsis: Nothing is written in stone. The words her mother told her when she first had a vision of the future. Hermione and her twin brother James are just starting Hogwarts and while making fast friends and trying to stay out of trouble, things get complicated when she sees the future through the eyes of a girl 20 years in the future and she becomes a valuable asset to the Order.
title: Written in Stone

author: reviews
characters: Percy W., Molly W., Bill W., Charlie W.
synopsis: Molly Weasley was a lucky woman and she knows that, but that doesn't mean that she doesn't have doubts sometimes.
title: A mother's job

author: kpron2008
synopsis: This is a group of my oneshots of my pairing of Draco Malfoy with a Female Harry Potter. Please let me know what you think of them. Thank you.
title: Draco and Female Harry Potter Oneshots

author: reviews
characters: Hermione G., Luna L., Dean T.
synopsis: Luna, as the owner of The Quibbler, requests her friends submit articles for their birthday. It's Hermione's turn to write one for her fortieth birthday. This is what she has so far.
title: Forty for The Quibbler

author: reviews
synopsis: Rita comes face to face with a story that she can't cover. This was written for The Houses Competition, Y5R3.
title: The Election To End It All

author: LadyKenz347
synopsis: Sneaking away for a weekend in the woods with your fake boyfriend and your best friends is bound to have its hiccups, but no one could prepare for what this weekend has in store.
title: Couples Weekend

author: reviews
synopsis: SSHG Ronald uses a spell he finds in the library at Grimmauld Place to give himself what Harry's parents had: true love. Maybe he should have read a little more before trying it out. AU
title: In His Arms

author: SarahC1985
characters: Hermione G., Draco M., Voldemort, Albus D.
synopsis: Voldemort has a plan to ensure Draco Malfoy's loyalty, knowing there is no chance it will back fire, for more than one reason. Draco enters in to it willingly, for the varied rewards it will give him. The pain caused is of no consequence to him. One person learns how valuable true friends really are, when they pay the ultimate price. When the plan is complete, people will be dead.
title: a curse before a kiss

author: reviews
synopsis: Written for House Competition. Neville finds a relic from his past.
title: Unpacking the Past

author: Willowohwisp
synopsis: Written for House Competition. Argus doesn't understand.
title: The Unrequited Child

author: reviews
synopsis: A pilot in a fighter plane was much better than any wizard on a broom, and Argus can't wait to dominate the skies when he's older. After all, the Muggle world was better, cooler... safer.
title: Argus' Sky

author: reviews
synopsis: Petunia Dursley thinks back to the past, peppered as it is with thorny roses.
title: Uneasiness

author: TriesHardToWrite
synopsis: On that fateful night, Harry's twin brother becomes The Boy Who Lived… 10 years later on 1 September 1991, a forgotten Harry meets Hermione where they quickly become each other's first friend. Together the duo attends Hogwarts where tragedy, danger and mysteries arise. But will these events sow the seeds to darkness? Not your typical twin story, Slytherin!HHr.
title: The Forgotten Duo

author: DarknessQueen321
characters: Harry P., Sirius B., Remus L., OC
synopsis: Ariana Lupin née Gold is officially Hogwarts' new History of Magic teacher, and is fully ready to kick off her new job alongside her husband, Remus, who is now the Defence Professor. Aside from the fact that her old friend Sirius has escaped Azkaban, her godson Harry has no idea who she is, and dementors are now hanging around Hogwarts, what could go wrong? (Begins at POA)
title: The Wolf's Wife

author: reviews
synopsis: James is shipping himself with Lily. All the rest Hogwarts shipping him with Snape. Fem!Severus
title: Students Know Best
